Description: For the glamorous girl who is always the life of the party.  Though she’s a lover of the beautiful and feminine, she knows how to bend the rules and have a little fun.
ReviewText:
While I can't say anything bad about this scent, I can't say anything particularly good about it either.
This isn't a scent that will stand out, nor will it endear you to any one person. You would most likely find this bottle propped up on any number of young 20 somethings dressers, set aside for those weekend nights of drinking and fun at the bar. If thats what you want then feel free, but maybe try the different versions of the scent before you buy the whole bottle, they'll each change depending on which one you get even though they all say Viva La Juicy.
Title: Meh

Description: For the glamorous girl who is always the life of the party.  Though she’s a lover of the beautiful and feminine, she knows how to bend the rules and have a little fun.
ReviewText: I got this product on sale, but I would not buy this product at it's regular price. Although I do enjoy the smell, there is nothing special about it. I like wearing this perfume when I want a more musky scent rather than my typical fruity scents. My mother enjoys this as well, so it is enjoyed by all age ranges.

Description: Sample 10 of our most sensational fragrances. Select the scent you like best. Submit your scent certificate for a full-size bottle of your favourite one.
ReviewText: I bought this as a gift and got enough optimum points to buy one for myself. There are 10 fragrance samples of approx 1.2 to 1.5ml, just enough to 'test drive' each fragrance 2 or 3 times. (Approx the size of samples you receive at fragrance counters) The big bonus is that there is a coupon in the box for a full-sized bottle of your favourite! Most 'full sized' bottles offered with the coupon are 50ml bottles, which  generally retail for over $90. This is a great way to expand your fragrance wardrobe without making a major commitment to a fragrance you've only tried once.
Title: Fabulous Idea! Excellent Gift too

Description: Sample 10 of our most sensational fragrances. Select the scent you like best. Submit your scent certificate for a full-size bottle of your favourite one.

Description: Captivating and caressing, Jasmin Noir is an entirely new creation with multiple facets.  Infinitely sensual, infinitely addictive, its seductive scent is sublimely revealed by jasmine.  A flower whose beauty is as pure as it is tantalizing.  Jasmin Noir tells a voluptuous floral story.   Style: Floral. Sensual. Woody. Amber.             Notes: Green Sap. Gardenia Petals. Sambac Jasmine Absolute. Satiny Almond. Precious Wood. Licorice. Tonka Bean Absolute.
ReviewText: This scent is truly wonderful! Classy, and not cloyingly floral. I loved it from the first spray! Upon cool down, however the scent fades to nothing at all on me. Perhaps it's my personal chemistry but I was nonetheless disappointed. I will be returning this for a different perfume.
Title: Wonderful fragrance but fades very quickly

Description: Lolita Lempicka is an enchanting and alluring fragrance that gently balances the sweetness of ivy leaves and aniseed with delicate violet and iris root, and finishes with a smooth hint of vanilla and musk.  This sensual fragrance is pure, light and endearing.   Style: Sensual. Romantic. Enchanting.      Notes: Ivy Leaves. Aniseed. Licorice. Praline. Amarena Heart. Violets. Iris Root. Vetiver. Tonka Bean. Vanilla.
ReviewText: This is my signature fragrance since I was a teenager and no matter how many other perfumes I have, I always turn back to this one. It smells of powdery licorice with notes of vanilla and anise and has a woody musky depth that makes it so sweet and innocent but dark, spicy and feminine on the other side. I always get so many compliments when I wear this and people that know me for many years have related that scent with me.
Title: the scent of my life!!!

Description: This aquatic, aromatic fragrance opens with a splash of fresh, calabrian bergamot, neroli and green tangerine. Light, aquatic nuances mix with jasmine petal, crisp rock rose, rosemary, fruity persimmon and warm Indonesian patchouli to create a masculine s
ReviewText:
While I can't say that you could easily pick out the smells (from the description) out from one another, blended they do in fact create an incredibly pleasing cologne that could have women thinking of a tete a tete in the elevator.
The price is high but this is a very high quality product you wont regret purchasing; although you may find yourself smelling like more than a few others if you do. This is a scent that can take you from the boardroom to a restaurnant or bar and never skip a step. However if you do not wish to smell like everybody else, your search will take you elsewhere.
Title: Pleasing

Title: Smells pretty good

Description: Mon Guerlain, the House's new fragrance, is my faithful companion, at my side in every role of my life. It becomes one with my skin like an invisible tattoo, reassuring and revealing me. Mon Guerlain pays tribute to contemporary femininity, a powerful, free and sensual femininity reflecting the remarkable woman who embodies it and who inspires us. The fresh oriental fragrance enhances exceptional raw materials: Carla Lavender from Provence, Sambac Jasmine from India, Album Sandalwood from Australia and Vanilla Tahitensis from Papua New Guinea. It expresses the quintessence of a history replete with experiences, nourished by success, expertise and generosity, all infused with the same passion since 1828.
ReviewText:
This fragrance smells amazing. It smells heavily floral on first spray but mellows almost immediately into a nice warm scent. Its definitely a skin scent, and in the best way. I smelled it on the SA and it was glorious.

However, the sample i took home turned on my skin. Unfortunately, i have this problem with florals like flowerbomb and tory burch's love relentlessly, and apparently, this perfume as well.

That aside, this fragrance is amazing and you should try it out.
Title: Great Scent

Description: Mon Guerlain, the House's new fragrance, is my faithful companion, at my side in every role of my life. It becomes one with my skin like an invisible tattoo, reassuring and revealing me. It expresses the quintessence of a history replete with experiences, nourished by success, expertise and generosity, all infused with the same passion since 1828.
ReviewText: Amazing and delicious tonka, lavender and vanilla. Not very feminine. Almost unisex. Lasting power is great, silage is average. The bottle is true Guerlain luxury. Quite similar to the Mon exclusif version which is way more expensive. Unique and sexy !
Title: Divine

Description: Mon Guerlain, the House's new fragrance, is my faithful companion, at my side in every role of my life. It becomes one with my skin like an invisible tattoo, reassuring and revealing me. ReviewText: From the first time I tried this fragrance I could not comprehend why I was so drawn to it. I don't normally buy a lot of perfume because there are so many scent free places in Canada. I got a free sample and I used it everyday until it was gone. I would love to put it on before I went to bed so I could enjoy the fragrance all night!  I don't know if it's the lavender and vanilla together or just how this lovely fragrance reacts on my skin but I bought the large bottle! I have been looking for a fragrance to fall in love with for so long and I've found it ❤️
Title: A Fragrance To Fall in Love With ❤️

Mon Guerlain pays tribute to contemporary femininity, a powerful, free and sensual femininity reflecting the remarkable woman who embodies it and who inspires us. The fresh oriental fragrance enhances exceptional raw materials: Carla Lavender from Provence, Sambac Jasmine from India, Album Sandalwood from Australia and Vanilla Tahitensis from Papua New Guinea. It expresses the quintessence of a history replete with experiences, nourished by success, expertise and generosity, all infused with the same passion since 1828.
ReviewText: I've not worn a luxury scent like this for years ... but I treated myself to this new Guerlain fragrance and I'm so glad I did. It's sweet and lush - scent is such a personal thing ... for me it's divine!
Title: My new signature fragrance

Product Name: L'eau D'Issey Pour Homme Eau de Toilette
Description: A fresh, vibrant and elegant eau de toilette. A timeless fragrance with a very masculine signature. When the vibrating freshness of yuzu meets sandalwood.
ReviewText: My husband has this cologne and it's awesome! It's so fresh and invigorating! It lasts all day and is always pleasant.
Title: Great fragrance. Masculine and fresh!

Description: A sparkling floral, Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet is a composition fashioned like a dress embroidered with a thousand flowers. This new floral bouquet pays homage to Christian Dior's legendary passion of flowers. It glorifies the mandarin and the peony on downy notes of white musk. The peony is at the heart of this new signature. Its unique trail combines the rose Damascus essence with fruity notes to recreate the outstanding scent of this flower, elusive in its natural state.
ReviewText: While the price may seem high, this is a light, airy, enjoyable floral scent. Clearly meant for the ultra feminine in mind this is a high quality bottle of delightful fragrance. One spritz and you'll feel like you should be waltzing around your boudoir with that gentle old hollywood glow surrounding you as you bat your lashes irresistibly at your spouse.
Title: Old Hollywood Femininity

Product Name: Dahlia Divin Le Nectar de Parfum
Description:
A dazzling Nectar de Parfum that leaves every woman feeling divine. Dahlia Divin is a golden fragrance, an elixir of pure sensuality. The fragrance of a modern goddess who shines like the sun, captivates by her presence and exudes a Couture elegance.
Le Nectar de Parfum is the quintessence of Dahlia Divin, draping the women in an exceptionally sensual scent.
ReviewText: This fragrance smells amazingly luxurious. It also lasts a long time on the skin. The price is comparable to similar designer perfumes but this is a standout one. The best ever. And it's not crazy popular so you won't be smelling it on other people all the time. Try it out, you won't regret it.
Title: Absolutely Divine

Description: As suggested by its name, Versense promises a balance of the senses and revitalizing energy, and evokes freedom of open space. Inspired by nature’s elements, this beautiful fragrance is dedicated to confident, vital and sensual women.
ReviewText: It's mild scent is perfect! It doesn't hurt my nose. I can wear them all day..everyday!
Title: Fragrance is perfect!

Description: A hint of citrus. A wealth of flowers. A mix of emotions. Clinique’s best-selling women's fragrance interplays fresh, vibrant notes—ruby red grapefruit, bergamot—with soft, sensual ones—Hawaiian wedding flower, spring mimosa. Wear it and be happy. Allergy test. 100% fragrance free.
ReviewText: For several years this has been my go-to scent: it's refreshing and not overwhelming so is a great scent to wear at work as well as when going out. It has citrus notes but not that overly-sweet smell some other fruity perfumes sometimes have. It's a classic scent that anyone could wear and it does make me "happy" :)
Title: Refreshing scent

Description: Formulated with naturally sourced ingredients, it is our 1st paraben free and aluminium free deodorant certified by ECOCERT. This formula is entirely composed of deodorising ingredients of natural origin for 24-hour odor protection.
ReviewText: I've been using this deodorant for over five years now and have seen this product increase in price over the years.  It really does protect my clothes against odor.  It is not antiperspirant of course so I still sweat, but at least I'm protected against the smell!  I love the fact that it's "ECO CERT" which makes me feel safe wearing it every day.  The smell is citrus-y but not overly strong.  My only complaint is that it does go on wet and requires a bit of drying time, but otherwise a product that's part of my daily routine.  It lasts about 6 months of every day use (and has a shelf life of 12 months once opened).
Title: Best natural, safe deodorant!

Product Name: Love Story Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
Floral, fresh, and sexy, Love Story is the new unforgettable essence of seduction from Chloé. Orange flower oil opens the fragrance with a radiant, luminous, and intoxicating characteristic like the flush of new love. The seductive and joyful scent of stephanotis jasmine, often used in wedding bouquets, gives the fragrance its heart. Finally the scent is grounded by the sensual diffusion, strength, and freshness of cedar wood, creating a unified and complex base that endures. 
The design of the Love Story bottle was inspired by a lock and softened by unique feminine touches. Locks, seen on the famous Pont Des Arts “love” bridge in Paris, have become an international symbol of love. Locks have also long been part of Chloé fashion and are often used on the brand’s iconic bags and accessories.
ReviewText: Most perfume makes me dizzy and my eyes water. Except for this! Scent is superb!
Title: the only perfume for me!!

Product Name: Sweet Like Candy by Ariana Grande
Description: Indulge in the irresistible new fragrance from Ariana Grande. A luscious burst of sugar-frosted blackberry and juicy Italian bergamot sparkle with delicious addiction, while velvety layers of Crème de Cassis, fluffy marshmallow and sexy vanilla blend together to leave a sexy trail.
UserLocation: New York City, New York, USA
ReviewText: It smells like summer and it gives you a sexy feeling. One of the best parfumes I've smelled! I totally would recommend this to my friends.

ReviewText: I received this as a gift and I am absolutely in love. It reminds me of the Hello Kitty perfume I bought from Sephora a few years ago.. the scent is sweet in a fruity way, not so much like candy, which usually smells pretty cheap in my opinion. And for once, even though it is on the sweeter side, it doesn't give me a headache. It's light and fresh and sophisticated all at the same time!

ReviewText: This perfume smells like liquid soap!! LOVE it. I get compliments all the time. A little warning...use very lightly so the scent smells clean and soapy. If you use too much it can be strong and annoying. The plus of that is the bottle will last very long.
Title: delish

Product Name: Armani Code Femme Eau de Parfum
Description: With an intoxicating blend of fruity and woody notes, this Giorgio Armani fragrance will make a strong and sensual impression. Exude confidence and elegant luxury with this eau de parfum.
ReviewText: I bought this from beauty boutique at shoppers. Soo glad i found it there; it's a more intense version of the original Code. I think it's a limited edition. More sweet chocolate scent with dark undertone. Love it soo much.
Title: Armani Code Ultimate!!

Product Name: Armani Code Femme Eau de Parfum
Description: With an intoxicating blend of fruity and woody notes, this Giorgio Armani fragrance will make a strong and sensual impression. Exude confidence and elegant luxury with this eau de parfum.
ReviewText: I bought this fragrance last year on my b-day after I saw it in my friend's house and I fall in love with the smell .
Title: Armani Code Femme

Description: A long-lasting, quick drying, non-staining body mist infused with Yardley London's English lavender fragrance, subtly combining notes of eucalyptus, geranium, jasmine, chamomile and violet, enhanced with deeper, warm base notes of wood, vanilla and patchouli.  Containing calming lavender extract, moisturizing sweet almond oil, grape seed oil, glycerine and vitamin E to leave skin feeling soft, smooth and delicately fragranced.
ReviewText: This product when misted on the body feels like you stepped out of a spa
Title: Luxury

ReviewText: I liked the smell of the dry shampoo so much that I bought the body mist.  The smell of the mist is just as lovely as the other products and I am happy I bought this product in addition
Title: Smells Lovely

ReviewText: I love this product so much, I use it quite a lot, and I really like the consistency as well as the smell even though it is a little harsh if you spray it too much.
Title: Awesome product with a very strong lemon scent

ReviewText: The smell is a bit overpowering for me but the coconut smell reminds me of beaches and vacation time. It kind of smells like certain sunscreens.
Title: Smells like sunscreen

ReviewText: Love that I can use it on my hair and skin!!! Smells great too!!!
Title: great product!!!

Product Name: 007 for Women Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
The all new 007 for Women fragrance embodies the dangerously seductive nature of the Bond Woman. Conveying the mysterious allure of these enigmatic women, the scent is a modern interpretation of the mysterious oriental fragrances worn by women throughout the last century.

Dark yet feminine ingredients convey an air of thrilling intimacy. An initial burst of spicy Black Pepper enveloped in Rose Milk ignites an intriguing paradox of danger and sensuality. Alongside this, the instantly attractive, familiar fruity character of Blackberry is combined with the feminine softness represented by White Floral Jasmine. The rich, sensual dry down, which is the key to any Oriental signature is driven by Black Vanilla and tantalizing White Musk, with a touch of elegant Cedar wood.
ReviewText: I am very pleased with this fragrance: it puts me in a good mood every time I wear it. The scent is not overpowering, yet quite alluring. I also like the bottle and packaging design and logo. This fragrance is very reasonably priced.
Title: Aromatherapy at its best

Title: Such a good deal for this one.

Product Name: Modern Muse Le Rouge Eau de Parfum
Description:
Be daring. Be an inspiration. Experience the fragrance that captures your glamour, your sophistication, your bravado.

A sexy, provocative contrast of two distinctively different accords—rich roses awakened by ripe fruit, with a seductive velvet creme accord—provide an intriguing dual impression. It's a true innovation in fragrance design, as complex and fascinating as the woman who inspires it.
ReviewText: I love how it smells. It makes me feel young and fresh. The scent of the sexiness has got me going something. It's a good perfume for making your man fall head over heels for you. Go to a formal event and wear this.. oh girl you'll be seeing every guy turning their heads to you. You can also wear it for casual try going to the bar. Let's see how many guys will try to get your number! You go girl! (non-based from my experience though but worth the try) I do have a lot of perfume but i gotta admit, this one puts them all out of the radar. I really recommend this perfume for everyone to buy.
Title: Worth the buy!

ReviewText: I was Christmas shopping with my Mum. We tried a few different scents, but this perfume was the one that won! It smelled delightful on me and even better on my Mum. Often times if a scent is nice on myself, my Mum can't wear it. But this one seems to be one of those special perfumes that work on more people than usual. So if you have a difficult time discovering a scent for you, perhaps this one is worth a try :)

Description: The mystery of Dior’s legendary forbidden fruit lives on in a magical, modern philter that blends femininity with boldness. Four contrasting facets—intoxicating bitter almond and carvi, opulent Sambac jasmine, mysterious Jacarandra, and sensuous vanilla and musk—make for a compelling, bewitching fragrance fusion. Intoxicating and extravagant.
ReviewText: I love Poison so much,now I'm using Givenchy,HotCoture,but I love Poison more

ReviewText:
I got the sample sized perfume from the SDM beauty sampler. It is a very natural and complex perfume with a strong unit of vanilla and sandalwood. Not the chemical and generic lower end scent that you normally get from most nowadays. 
After 30 minutes of spray you smell a very mysterious but warm vanilla and sandalwood. The spillage is long lasting. The changes in the scent over time is intriguing.

ReviewText: I wanted to hunt for a new scent for myself, but have never been a fan of anything with floral or citrus. This scent is THE ONE I have been looking for - Hypnotic Poison is sweet and musky, easy on the nose while still being unique and sensual. I purchased a 50ml bottle of this but will definitely be coming back for the larger bottle. A bit pricey, but worth it for this unique find.

ReviewText: Not sure why the 2 low views but this scent is insane! I'm going head over heels! When I first spritzed it, I got a strong smell of alcohol which wore off quickly. You can smell the actual fragrance afterwards and it's a really seductive and sexy scent. You feel insanely attracted to it and I got tons of compliments and questions. You only need a little spritz! The scent lasts for days! Very worth the money in my opinion and long lasting scent. Been on a hunt for this scent for ages!

ReviewText: I bought this for my husband after he tried a tester spray. It's magnificent. He smells wonderful. Very few Eau de toilettes make me say "Wow!!" This is a definite keeper.

ReviewText:
This is such a unique smelling fragrance and the ladies love it. I wear it for work, dates and evening events. 
The one draw back is the smell only lasts a few hours on my skin and then it's almost undetectable. 
That being said this fragrance is masculine and stands tall above the many generic men's fragrances on the market now.

Description: The eau de parfum is the great Dior floral for women with a generous and well-balanced bouquet, and its richness is a source of inspiration. By celebrating Ylang Ylang from the Comoro Islands, Damask Rose and Sambac Jasmine, J'adore Eau de Parfum unites the noblest of flowers from the garden of ingredients. The flowing and sensual curves of its amphora shaped bottle have made it a legendary fragrance. A sensuous and refined fragrance that has become a legend.
ReviewText: I can wear this during the day or evening the scent is wonderful not to heavy however lasts at least 8 hours

ReviewText: I'm almost finished the bottle and know I will be buying this perfume again.  It has a powder undertone that usually I don't like but this perfume Im in live with!  It's not often that I buy 2 of any perfume because I get bored with them but this one I'll be buying again and again!
Title: My favorite

Description: The eau de parfum is the great Dior floral for women with a generous and well-balanced bouquet, and its richness is a source of inspiration. By celebrating Ylang Ylang from the Comoro Islands, Damask Rose and Sambac Jasmine, J'adore Eau de Parfum unites the noblest of flowers from the garden of ingredients. The flowing and sensual curves of its amphora shaped bottle have made it a legendary fragrance. A sensuous and refined fragrance that has become a legend.
ReviewText: For me it's all about a small bouquet of very fragrant luscious jasmine. Smooth, sweet (floral sweet), rich, elegant elixir. Would be great for any age over 19 if dosed 1 to 2 drops, or one spray is ample. For me it lasts long, I really don't use more than a drop.

ReviewText: This is my favourite scent. It smells so decadent and luxurious.
Title: Amazingly luxurious

Description: A sensual floral fragrance composed of subtle, sun-drenched flowers. When flower meets sun.  A sunny floral aquatic with a woody trail.
ReviewText: I never thought there was such a thing as a feel good perfume but this perfume does just that for me, I love it so much I even wear it to bed, getting a wif of it really lifts my mood. The best way I could describe it would be smelling fresh, like a soothing smell of baby powder mixed with elegance and purity. I could see the commercial for this perfume being of a woman in the south of France, on a sail boat with a white scarf with the wind blowing through her hair, breathing in the fresh air, catching that feel good moment. Hope this helped imagining the smell! Enjoy!
Title: Feel good perfume

Description: A sensual floral fragrance composed of subtle, sun-drenched flowers. When flower meets sun.  A sunny floral aquatic with a woody trail.
ReviewText: I love this scent, love love love it! Only reason it didn't get 5 stars from me is because I find it doesn't last after I spray it on me.  Though sometimes I will spray it twice a day on me and the bottle has lasted me a lonnnng time, I am sure it will last until Christmas time and that is when I bought it last year so a year for a bottle of premium perfume isn't bad I figure!  I constantly get compliments like "You smell so good!"  "Wow I love that perfume you have on!" and I personally love it too, so that's always a great thing!
Title: So many compliments!

Description: A sensual floral fragrance composed of subtle, sun-drenched flowers. When flower meets sun.  A sunny floral aquatic with a woody trail.
ReviewText: I have been using this perfume for over 5 years since I was 19, and plan on using it forever its just a smell so sophisticated I will never get tired of it. it is strong enough to wear to a party but also elegant to wear at work or formal events, I use it during the day  too but only spray once to not overwhelm people with it.
Title: will use it forever

Description: A sensual floral fragrance composed of subtle, sun-drenched flowers. When flower meets sun.  A sunny floral aquatic with a woody trail.
ReviewText: I have adored this fragrance for years and am frequently complimented when wearing.  The designer, Issey Miyake says it's inspired by air. Absolutely adore this scent.
Title: Deserves honour of "signature fragrance"

Description: A sensual floral fragrance composed of subtle, sun-drenched flowers. When flower meets sun.  A sunny floral aquatic with a woody trail.
ReviewText: Favourite fragrance out there as far as I'm concerned. I've tried a lot of fragrances and I always end up coming back to this one. Always get compliments.
Title: Light Floral

ReviewText: This is a really nice, somewhat sweet scent. I really smell the apple/fruit, but with sweeter gourmand notes to keep it warmer than something like DKNY's Be Delicious. I love this fragrance and purchased it many times, but I do think it might work best for younger ladies and have switched to something fresher for everyday wear.
Title: Gorgeous, sweet scent

ReviewText: My mother wore Calvin Klein's Obsession for most of my childhood, it's the quintessential scent of the 90s for me. Nina (be it the Toilette or Parfum version) is among that class of scents. Other scents will come and go but perfumes like Nina and Obession are the bottles that stay forever on women's bedroom dressers.
Title: A Classic Scent

ReviewText: This is the best perfume ever! Every time I wear it, I get compliments. It's not an overpowering scent like some other perfumes, it's just perfect! I am so glad I stumbled upon it!!! Perfect for the younger ladies.
Title: Amazing Perfume!

ReviewText: This perfume has become one of my favs over the last year. It's a sweet and feminine, somewhat of a young scent, but it has a unique smell!! A mix of floral and fruity notes and lasts all day. I love it during the summer and the winter day or night, it's quite a strong scent but still fresh. I highly recommend it
Title: amazing scent

ReviewText: Of all the perfumes I have tried/owned this one has to be my husband's favourite. It's not just a special occasion perfume though. We have a no scent policy at work yet I can wear this one without any complaints (2x sprays).
Title: My hubby request my to wear it

ReviewText: I have been using Nina Ricci perfume since high school and have never found a product I didn't like! One of those brands that once you try it once, you'll fall in love and never go back!
Title: Nina Ricci products are the best

ReviewText: This product is by far my favourite perfume! It is not too overwhelming & smells fresh! I use it as my everyday scent!
Title: Great Smell

Product Name: Hugo Man Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: HUGO Man fragrance is for men who want to live their life on their own terms. They are true originals, believing that rules are made to be challenged and personal potential should be explored to the max.
ReviewText: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my man this year. It's hard to pick scents for others, but I thought this smelled fantastic and would suit him, and I was right! He loves it. It's taken over as favourite cologne from a Beckham and a Diesel.
Title: Smells delicious

Description: For over twenty years, Neiges remains the flagship fragrance of the Lise Watier brand. Fresh and breezy, its unique bouquet comes from the exquisite redolence of pure white flowers. The scent of this fragrance lasts 4 to 8 hours. Top notes: hyacinth, lily of the valley, rose and jasmine. Middle notes: magnolia and orange blossom. Bottom notes: sandalwood and musk.
ReviewText:
I have been using this perfume for the past 7 years.It is a soft, pleasant fragrance .When I was away for the winter, any time I saw this lady she kept saying "Oh my Gosh, you smell so good" When I left to come home for the summer I had a little bit of my perfume left in my bottle so I gave it to her, she was estatic because it is not available to purchase where she lived.
I will definitely continue to wear this perfume.
Title: Go ahead spray a little on you...you will see!

Description: For over twenty years, Neiges remains the flagship fragrance of the Lise Watier brand. Fresh and breezy, its unique bouquet comes from the exquisite redolence of pure white flowers. The scent of this fragrance lasts 4 to 8 hours. Top notes: hyacinth, lily of the valley, rose and jasmine. Middle notes: magnolia and orange blossom. Bottom notes: sandalwood and musk.
ReviewText: Neiges has a clean light scent that you can wear everyday. It doesn't affect those with scent sensitivities, and it doesn't give me a headache.
Title: Lovely Fragrance

Description: For over twenty years, Neiges remains the flagship fragrance of the Lise Watier brand. Fresh and breezy, its unique bouquet comes from the exquisite redolence of pure white flowers. The scent of this fragrance lasts 4 to 8 hours. Top notes: hyacinth, lily of the valley, rose and jasmine. Middle notes: magnolia and orange blossom. Bottom notes: sandalwood and musk.
ReviewText: My husband took a chance and bought this for me one year for my birthday.  That was about 6 years ago. I feel naked without it now.  I love the light fragrance and it is the best gift I have ever gotten.  Thank you for a scent that is so light and pleasant you can wear it anytime.
Title: Absolutely love it!!

Description: For over twenty years, Neiges remains the flagship fragrance of the Lise Watier brand. Fresh and breezy, its unique bouquet comes from the exquisite redolence of pure white flowers. The scent of this fragrance lasts 4 to 8 hours. Top notes: hyacinth, lily of the valley, rose and jasmine. Middle notes: magnolia and orange blossom. Bottom notes: sandalwood and musk.
ReviewText: I first tried this as a sample while shopping in the cosmetic area, and was soon to return for more. This is a beautiful light scent.  It's not too overpowering or musky, or too bright. It's a perfect combination of a soft feminine floral. Absolutely love it.
Title: Beautiful Light Scent!

Description: For over twenty years, Neiges remains the flagship fragrance of the Lise Watier brand. Fresh and breezy, its unique bouquet comes from the exquisite redolence of pure white flowers. ReviewText: While the smell is a bit too strong for my liking this is a great perfume for a formal setting. All you need is a light spritz and your good to go.
Title: Great for Formal Events

Description: For over twenty years, Neiges remains the flagship fragrance of the Lise Watier brand. Fresh and breezy, its unique bouquet comes from the exquisite redolence of pure white flowers. The scent of this fragrance lasts 4 to 8 hours. Top notes: hyacinth, lily of the valley, rose and jasmine. Middle notes: magnolia and orange blossom. Bottom notes: sandalwood and musk.
ReviewText: The first time I received beige was about 17 years ago from my husband as a gift. I have worn it since. The scent is so gentle and smells so pure. Long lasting scent. And expect to receive several compliments!
Title: PURE SCENT

ReviewText: I've never been a huge fan of the original White Linen, so I was quite surprised when I first experienced Pure White Linen. It's a definite modernization of the 1978 fragrance superstar. With excellent longevity and millage, the drydown leaves a subtle trail of summer fruits and blossoms. It's another fruity floral for the summer, but I have to admit, it’s one of the best fruity-florals I’ve encountered in a while. And it's one of the most reasonable priced!
Title: New Version

Description:
The fragrance of a thousand flowers.

A rich blend of Rose, Lily, Tuberose and Orange Flower. Brightened with citrus, warmed by woods.

Romantic, feminine, memorable
ReviewText: I got this last year and have never used anything else since! Its a beautiful high luxury smell that makes me feel glamorus!
Title: Favorite perfume!

Description:
The fragrance of a thousand flowers.

A rich blend of Rose, Lily, Tuberose and Orange Flower. Brightened with citrus, warmed by woods.

Romantic, feminine, memorable
ReviewText: Truly a scent of a thousand flowers!  A lovely feminine floral that smells fresh and clean.  This perfume has exceptional longevity.  Best described as having a very romantic and warm feel. A head turner that makes people stop and ask you what you are wearing.
Title: SCENT FROM HEAVEN!

Description:
The fragrance of a thousand flowers.

A rich blend of Rose, Lily, Tuberose and Orange Flower. Brightened with citrus, warmed by woods.

ReviewText: I have used Beautiful for 30 years. I can't see myself wearing anything else. After all these years, I still get compliments on how good I smell, they say it's beautiful and I say YES it is
Title: Beautiful eau de parfum spray

Title: Lovely Scent

Description: BOSS BOTTLED is as versatile and rich in contrasts as the Man of Today. The distinctly masculine fragrance is sharp with a warm woody base, making it a timeless classic. Fruity and citrus top notes of apple, lemon and plum balance with a floral and spicy heart dominated by geranium, and are offset by warming base notes of sandalwood, vetiver and cedarwood.
ReviewText: This was bought for me as a gift on my birthday and I'm glad because I might never have tried it!
Title: Manly scent!

Description:
Radiant and whimsical, Vera Wang Princess is a sheer, fruity floral – rich with vanilla and brimming with exotic flowers and succulent fruits.


The scent sparkles with the captivating,sweet, tart aroma of delicate lady apples and 
dreamy water lily kissed lightly by golden apricot and mandarin meringue.

Sweeping into a heart of ripe pink guava and the rare, coveted tahitian tiare flower,
wild tuberose and dark chocolate join the revolution.

Tempted with a tasty vanilla chiffon,the fragrance is wrapped in a mysterious air 
of amber and forbidden woods.
ReviewText: Third time purchasing this product. Love it so much! Can't find anything that smells nearly the same.
Title: Favourite perfume

Description:
Radiant and whimsical, Vera Wang Princess is a sheer, fruity floral – rich with vanilla and brimming with exotic flowers and succulent fruits.

Tempted with a tasty vanilla chiffon,the fragrance is wrapped in a mysterious air 
of amber and forbidden woods.
ReviewText: Just started on my second bottle! Princess is so classy, yet still gives off the dainty sweet innocent vibe. Would definitely say that it's easily an everyday wear, whether your day is filled with meetings and at the office, just lounging around the house with some girls over, going out to brunch on a casual saturday, or even out in the evening! 100% would recommend and definitely every girls essential.
Title: so versatile

ReviewText: This is a sweet and warm fragrance that's easy to wear and has a long staying power. According to the notes, there are strong florals in it but I mostly get chocolate, caramel, and powder. I find this fragrance a lot more innocent than its gourmand counterparts like Prada Candy or Viva La Juicy.

Product Name: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue is a celebration of sensual Mediterranean style. Capturing sun-drenched summer days and dazzling nights, this colourful, fresh, floral-fruity scent reflects the sexiness of the Mediterranean lifestyle. Surprising and colourful, the top notes capture the essence of a sunny Sicilian summer, combining the liveliness of Sicilian cedar with the freshness of the Granny Smith apple, and the floral allure and spontaneity of the bluebell.
ReviewText:
I have been wearing Dolce & Gabanna Light Blue since it's inception in 19!!

It's beautiful light tones linger on the skin just enough that people stop and ask 'what is your fragrance?' or lean in on the train for a sniff.

Light Blue takes me from the boardroom to the ballroom without missing a beat.
From snow skiing in Canada to Switzerland and France. It never fails!

I highly recommend this fragrance if you are looking for a change of scent.
Title: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Eau de Toilette

Product Name: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue is a celebration of sensual Mediterranean style. Capturing sun-drenched summer days and dazzling nights, this colourful, fresh, floral-fruity scent reflects the sexiness of the Mediterranean lifestyle. Surprising and colourful, the top notes capture the essence of a sunny Sicilian summer, combining the liveliness of Sicilian cedar with the freshness of the Granny Smith apple, and the floral allure and spontaneity of the bluebell.
ReviewText:
This is what I would call the ultimate unisex scent. Men, women, young, or old, you can buy this scent and be perfectly happy with your choice.
Light and refreshing yet has the staying power of the more heady scents on the market. While everyone and their dog owns this scent (including myself in the large bottle) this one will never get old.
Title: Undoubtedly Favoured

Description: Joyful. Empowering. Inspiring. Miracle is a sudden and marvellous revelation that life is extraordinary, that life is a miracle. This sensual, spicy floral fragrance is bursting with the zest of brilliant Freesia, peppered with Ginger and serenely balanced by warm Amber notes
ReviewText: I have a wide selection of perfumes but my favourite of all is Miracle. I have been using it for a long time and have received so many compliments all these years! I've been asked a number of times "what perfume are you wearing" by young and older women. And men are always captivated by the fragrance. The scent is fresh, invigorating, classy and great for day or evening wear.
Title: Exquisite & captivating scent - timeless & classy!

Description: Joyful. Empowering. Inspiring. Miracle is a sudden and marvellous revelation that life is extraordinary, that life is a miracle. This sensual, spicy floral fragrance is bursting with the zest of brilliant Freesia, peppered with Ginger and serenely balanced by warm Amber notes
ReviewText: I am not one to love sweet scents or anything with vanilla. When I first discovered this scent, I thought it was absolutely perfect. It is warm and sweet without the vanilla, flowery yet clean and fresh. I've worn it for years and I like how it goes on and how it wears during the day.
Title: Love! Yummy yet not too sweet

Description: Joyful. Empowering. Inspiring. Miracle is a sudden and marvellous revelation that life is extraordinary, that life is a miracle. This sensual, spicy floral fragrance is bursting with the zest of brilliant Freesia, peppered with Ginger and serenely balanced by warm Amber notes
ReviewText: This scent is a classic. About 15 years ago I was passing through a department store and smelled this scent. I have been hooked ever since. I have tried multiple scents since then and nothing compares to this for me. Its 'my' smell :) Will be buying this for as long as it's made!
Title: Love Miracle!

Description: Joyful. Empowering. Inspiring. Miracle is a sudden and marvellous revelation that life is extraordinary, that life is a miracle. This sensual, spicy floral fragrance is bursting with the zest of brilliant Freesia, peppered with Ginger and serenely balanced by warm Amber notes
ReviewText: It's the most beautiful perfume at once ,fresh, delicate ,smells like summer. . .
Title: Ired61

Description: Charming and effervescent, Miss Dior Eau de Toilette is a luminous floral chypre scent with a hint of spring time.
ReviewText:
Back in 2012 I had an Russian exchange student who came and lived with us during a 4 month period. We became great friends and being who she was she was she LOVED anything beauty. From clothes to make up, from her scent to her hair, from her posture to her teeth -- she was flawless in her appearance and I learnt from her that it was because she put care and effort into it, she was like a model -- So the one day as she was doing my hair and make-up, helping me pick out an outfit in order to be the essence of beauty she sprits me with a perfume, I will never forget her smell as she used this perfume daily, and when she put it on my I couldn't get aroma and how it made me feel out of my head.. ever since I've been hooked on, you got it!, Miss Dior

I highly reccomened the elegant, beautiful smell of Miss Dior to anyone. It is one of those smells that can make you - that can be professional for a job interview, that can be sexy when out with your friends or sensual on a date. It can be used lightly everyday or a little heavier during night life..Whatever the occasion I love, love, love the smell of Miss Dior!
Title: A Culpable Elegance

Description: Charming and effervescent, Miss Dior Eau de Toilette is a luminous floral chypre scent with a hint of spring time.
ReviewText: I got a mini sample of this perfume a while ago and have worn it almost everyday since! It's just a classic, feminine fragrance that lasts on my skin all day long. Will definitely be buying the bigger size when I run out.
Title: Long lasting!

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Eau de Parfum
Description: La vie est belle, a French expression meaning, Life is beautiful; the manifesto of a new era. Universal yet personal, Lancôme femininity is a choice embraced by women, not an imposed standard. The choice to live one life and fill it with beauty. Your own way. Lancôme has long fostered this conviction, and shares it today with all women in the form of an exceptional creation. The fragrance of joyful femininity and happiness. The fragrance that makes life more beautiful. La vie est belle introduces a new olfactive story, the first ever tasty iris. The juice is made with the most precious natural ingredients, a modern interpretation of an Oriental fragrance with a twist of gourmand. It entwines the elegance of iris with the strength of Patchouli and the sweetness of a gourmand blend; for an incredible scent with depth and complexity.
ReviewText: I adore this fragrance! Mmmmm...beautiful, captivating, sweet, delicious - very sophisticated and feminine. This fragrance opens with the juicy sweet pear and black currant, then develops into a powdery and soft smell of the iris. When it dries I smell the praline and vanilla, it is still powdery, but less juicy. The patchouli is very soft. As it develops, it becomes even more beautiful. The longevity is astounding - it lasts all day. The bottle is elegant and lovely with the accent bow. Very nice job, Lancome! Get it for your wife or girlfriend, or mom, or sister, or any woman you think highly of! La Vie Est Belle Eau de Parfum was the best gift ever for me.  HAPPINESS in the bottle.
Title: Life Is Beautiful indeed with this fragrance!

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Eau de Parfum
Description: La vie est belle, a French expression meaning, Life is beautiful; the manifesto of a new era. Universal yet personal, Lancôme femininity is a choice embraced by women, not an imposed standard. The choice to live one life and fill it with beauty. Your own way. Lancôme has long fostered this conviction, and shares it today with all women in the form of an exceptional creation. The fragrance of joyful femininity and happiness. The fragrance that makes life more beautiful. La vie est belle introduces a new olfactive story, the first ever tasty iris. The juice is made with the most precious natural ingredients, a modern interpretation of an Oriental fragrance with a twist of gourmand. It entwines the elegance of iris with the strength of Patchouli and the sweetness of a gourmand blend; for an incredible scent with depth and complexity.
ReviewText: I ordered a 200ml bottle for my mom as her birthday present, since this has been her signature scent for a while. But as soon as I opened the box, I found the bottle cap was detached and broken to two parts, and the top nuzzle also fell off. For a 200+ dollar perfume, this is so unacceptable! I just hate to call the customer service and go through all inconvenience of returning, I have to glue the broken part together. Fortunately, the juicy inside is still as good as usual, I will just keep it myself and buy something else for my mom's birthday. I will not shop at this site again! so disappointed!
Title: bad luck or no quality control?

ReviewText: So i got a little tester with another lancome purchase so i figured i would wear it to work. I did not put very much on, but i had colleagues at work tell me that it was overpowering them and it was nauseating....and I myself felt nauseated by some sort of thing with it. It doesnt smell overpowering right off the bat but perhaps it reacted badly with me particularly. To this day I can smell anyone who wears this from almost a mile away
Title: Some people love this one, I do not

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Eau de Parfum
Description: La vie est belle, a French expression meaning, Life is beautiful; the manifesto of a new era. Universal yet personal, Lancôme femininity is a choice embraced by women, not an imposed standard. The choice to live one life and fill it with beauty. Your own way. Lancôme has long fostered this conviction, and shares it today with all women in the form of an exceptional creation. The fragrance of joyful femininity and happiness. The fragrance that makes life more beautiful. La vie est belle introduces a new olfactive story, the first ever tasty iris. The juice is made with the most precious natural ingredients, a modern interpretation of an Oriental fragrance with a twist of gourmand. It entwines the elegance of iris with the strength of Patchouli and the sweetness of a gourmand blend; for an incredible scent with depth and complexity.
ReviewText:
Believe it or not, I chose this because of a song that means so much to me, Life is Beautiful. I felt like it must be a sign, and then I smelled it for the first time. I was hooked and we have been together ever since!
Also, the reactions you get from complete strangers on how beautiful you smell is endless. 
The only downside is that I can't wear it everyday all day because of work. 
Beautiful for the wearer and the company you keep.
I will be devastated if this fragrance ever is discontinued. Please don't ever!!
Well done Lancome! <3
Title: Together since day 1

Classically feminine are the words I'd use to describe this perfume. You may find the patchouli to be stronger on some women's skin than others but the iris is a welcome touch, otherwise I don't think as many people would like it.
Marketed towards older women but young ladies would like it too.

ReviewText: I was given my first bottle as a gift and loved it, so once I ran out I got another one. Within a month it went from a pinkish color, to a gross orange color and it smelled awful! I stored it exactly the same as the last one (in a box in the cupboard at room temp). I don't know if I got a bad batch or something. I went back to where I bought it, but they said they couldn't do anything about perfumes and I'd have to contact Lancome. I'm really disappointed.
Title: Turned orange and spoiled (?) within a month

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Eau de Parfum
Description: La vie est belle, a French expression meaning, Life is beautiful; the manifesto of a new era. Universal yet personal, Lancôme femininity is a choice embraced by women, not an imposed standard. The choice to live one life and fill it with beauty. Your own way. Lancôme has long fostered this conviction, and shares it today with all women in the form of an exceptional creation. The fragrance of joyful femininity and happiness. The fragrance that makes life more beautiful. La vie est belle introduces a new olfactive story, the first ever tasty iris. The juice is made with the most precious natural ingredients, a modern interpretation of an Oriental fragrance with a twist of gourmand. It entwines the elegance of iris with the strength of Patchouli and the sweetness of a gourmand blend; for an incredible scent with depth and complexity.

Product Name: Love Relentlessly Eau de Parfum Spray
Description: “If I told you that I love you, would you hold it against me?” My father wrote this note to my mother, which he ran in the newspaper and signed “Love, Relentless.” My parents were the most romantic couple I have ever known. This fragrance is inspired by their love story. — Tory Burch. Love Relentlessly captures that euphoric feeling of falling in love. A sparkling mix: fiery pink pepper and patchouli fuse with dewy rose and addictive amber. This irresistible scent is like a love letter — encased in a jewel-shaped bottle.
ReviewText: I smelled this in the store and instantly this became my favorite of the few expensive perfumes I have.  We are all uniquely different with what smells beautiful to us.  Love soft smelling perfumes, so not overly poweful.  I couldn't stop smelling the scent on my wrist.  I'll even spray again at bedtime,  makes me feel sensual.
Title: Love it instantly!

Product Name: Love Relentlessly Eau de Parfum Spray
Description: “If I told you that I love you, would you hold it against me?” My father wrote this note to my mother, which he ran in the newspaper and signed “Love, Relentless.” My parents were the most romantic couple I have ever known. This fragrance is inspired by their love story. — Tory Burch. Love Relentlessly captures that euphoric feeling of falling in love. A sparkling mix: fiery pink pepper and patchouli fuse with dewy rose and addictive amber. This irresistible scent is like a love letter — encased in a jewel-shaped bottle.
ReviewText: Mostly a floral and powdery scent, Love Relentlessly reminds me of a fruitier Tom Ford Black Orchid. It has decent longevity and of course the bottle is very nice, but I can't help but feel like I've 'been there, smelt that'. It's not terrible, but not something to run out and buy.
Title: Middle of the Road

I totally recommend this because it's beautiful smelling and it's not to strong so you can where it on an everyday basis

Description: A thrust of high-octane sensuality; a biting freshness that blows the mind but leaves you wanting more. Deliciously irresistible, the addictive signature of Black Opium finds in BLACK OPIUM FLORAL SHOCK a new froideur of cool sophistication. The addictive signature of Black Opium wrapped in quivering freshness. The warm sensuality of black coffee shaken with the fresh bold notes of citrus and white flowers. The shock of an iced coffee, between pleasure and adrenalin.
ReviewText: Love the smell of this . I wore it and my sister loves it now too .  It smells rich and is long lasting . Also The bottle is gorgeous !
Title: Lovely and sophisticated

Product Name: Eros Pour Homme Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Eros the God of Love; Versace Eros the fragrance for men. A sublimely masculine scent of mint oil, lemon and green apple, vetyver and cedar wood, is sensual and reassuringly virile, the key to love, passion, beauty and desire.
ReviewText: I bought this awhile ago and i still have so much of it left. I get so many compliments when im wearing it and its not sweet, sugary and over bearing like most women perfumes. Its definitely a night time perfume full of spice and wonder. Love it
Title: Amazing!

Product Name: Eros Pour Homme Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Eros the God of Love; Versace Eros the fragrance for men. A sublimely masculine scent of mint oil, lemon and green apple, vetyver and cedar wood, is sensual and reassuringly virile, the key to love, passion, beauty and desire.

Title: Younger Scent

Description: Brave the day without breaking a sweat. When the heat is on, Clarins’ alcohol-free antiperspirant—with refreshing extracts of Orange, Lemon and Grapefruit—keeps underarms dry, comfortable and fresh. Long-lasting formula glides on easily without a sticky after-feel. Neutralizes odours as it helps reduce perspiration. Gentle enough for sensitive skin.
ReviewText:
After years of using a Jil Sander antiperspirant, I was forced to find another product. Jil Sander USA stopped importing their product and I was ordering it from Harrods in London. Finally, it disappeared from Harrods as well. After a Bloomingdale's representative suggested I try Clarin antiperspirant, I was hooked.

I stay dry, do not smell sickly sweet or over perfumed and I can be confident that my body odor is neutralized as well.
Title: Smell better

Description: Brave the day without breaking a sweat. When the heat is on, Clarins’ alcohol-free antiperspirant—with refreshing extracts of Orange, Lemon and Grapefruit—keeps underarms dry, comfortable and fresh. Long-lasting formula glides on easily without a sticky after-feel. Neutralizes odours as it helps reduce perspiration. Gentle enough for sensitive skin.
ReviewText:
Antiperspirant Deo Stick has a nice aroma, which is sort of unisex but not embarrassingly feminine for men.

It works well, but men should not expect it to stop them from sweating totally.

Suggestion: I hope that Clarins soon stops using aluminum chlorohydrate.
Title: A Big Step Away from Perfection

Product Name: Lily Of The Valley Eau De Toilette
Description: Yardley London’s Lily of the Valley is a light , feminine white floral fragrance with fruit pear accords in the top note and beautiful floral bouquet heart that blends lily of the valley and freesia, enhanced with a pretty, musky base.
ReviewText:
I bought this for my Mum, and now I'm going to buy it for myself, too - smells heavenly, so delicious! Not all scents are accurate to the flower, but this one is - I would love it if Yardley had a Freesia Scent, too - that would be amazing! 

Oh, and when you order online, even for yourself, have it gift wrapped, it's gorgeous!
Title: Smells delicious, just like Lily of the Valley!

ReviewText: I've always loved Yardley and I am glad to see the Lily of the Valley still available it's such a clean fragrance.  This and the Rose are my favorites. I wish they'd bring back the Lilac...

Title: Lovely and light

Description: THE ESSENCE OF JOY. There is a charming sensation of freshness from the very first notes which are carried along in a deliciously heady current of crushed Mint, with a zest of Italian “Limone Primo Fiore Femminello", harvested from the first spring blossoms in Calabria. At its base, ACQUA DI GIOIA bears the signature of water rooted in the Earth, revealed by luscious LMR Cedar wood Heart sprinkled with sensuous Brown Sugar and Labdanum, which is one of the rare plants to possess animal notes. A beautiful fresh floral fragrance ideal for the warm season.
ReviewText: This perfume is amazing when ever I wear it I always get compliments. Just love it
Title: Amazing fragrance

Product Name: Aqua Allegoria Mandarine Basilic Eau de Toilette
Description:
The Aqua Allegoria are among Guerlain's most emblematic fragrance collections. Their launch in 1999 was a bold gamble. That of taking nature as sole muse and creating a unique olfactory genre: the first collection of eau fraîche in perfumery.

Mandarine Basilic is a sparkling and cheerful Eau de Toilette, a singular duo steeped in grace and lightness. Its pure and refined bottle with a golden mesh celebrates the iconic Guerlain Bee Bottle.
ReviewText: So far the best one from the Aqua Allegoria line of fragrances. I get compliments every time I wear this. Also it's the longest lasting one, perfect for summer!
Title: Gorgeous !

Product Name: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Pour Homme Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Pour Homme introduces a fragrance of charming and fresh sophistication.  Like a breath of fresh Mediterranean air, the Light Blue man is irresistible, bound by no one – which is just the way her likes it.  Sensual, spontaneous, passionate and adventurous.

Product Name: Dolce by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum Spray
Description: Feminine and fresh, Dolce & Gabbana Dolce embodies the delicate balance between timeless craftsmanship and innovation in the art of perfumed composition. Dolce is one’s personal touch, signature scent. It epitomises the simplicity of a result obtained thanks to a complex process: the same one needed to create a finely-embroidered dress.
ReviewText: I already have Light Blue and wanted something a little more sophisticated. I love this fragrance, I couldn't stop smelling it while I was walking through the store. It is not over bearing and smells sweet and floral. My only disappointment is that I find I can't smell it anymore by mid day.
Title: Light and Sweet

Title: Light and fresh spring scent

Product Name: Dolce by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum Spray
Description: Feminine and fresh, Dolce & Gabbana Dolce embodies the delicate balance between timeless craftsmanship and innovation in the art of perfumed composition. Dolce is one’s personal touch, signature scent. It epitomises the simplicity of a result obtained thanks to a complex process: the same one needed to create a finely-embroidered dress.
ReviewText: This is my go to fragrance, great for work, home and play as it's not overbearing and a light fresh scent!
Title: My Go To

Product Name: Dolce by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum Spray
Description: Feminine and fresh, Dolce & Gabbana Dolce embodies the delicate balance between timeless craftsmanship and innovation in the art of perfumed composition. Dolce is one’s personal touch, signature scent. It epitomises the simplicity of a result obtained thanks to a complex process: the same one needed to create a finely-embroidered dress.
ReviewText: Love this fragrance! It is light and fresh and you can spray a little or a lot.
Title: Lovely fragrance

Product Name: Beautiful Sheer Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
A sheer blush of flowers.

Beautiful Sheer is lighthearted and radiant. Deliciously blending bright floral notes and a sheer woody accord, this inspired scent feels light, airy and modern.
ReviewText: I have been enjoying Beautiful for years and I continue to enjoy it today with Sheer Beautiful.  I use it most in the summer for it gives me this light and breezy scent that smells and feels so, well... Romantic and yes, Beautiful.  It has a sophistication that comes through and continues to make me feel so fresh and carefree as on a summer's day. I can apply it in the morning and it continues to keep it smell well into the evening.  I like that my fiance enjoys this scent on me and others have complimented me on this, too.   I would recommend this fragrance to all my friends and anyone who enjoys a light scent and cool refreshing scent.
Title: Light as a Summer Breeze~

Product Name: Beautiful Sheer Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
A sheer blush of flowers.

Beautiful Sheer is lighthearted and radiant. Deliciously blending bright floral notes and a sheer woody accord, this inspired scent feels light, airy and modern.
ReviewText: I have had this perfume for many years as part of my estee lauder collection. It never loses it's luster. It is medium in intensity and great for special occasions.
Title: Classic perfume

Product Name: Beautiful Sheer Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
A sheer blush of flowers.

Beautiful Sheer is lighthearted and radiant. Deliciously blending bright floral notes and a sheer woody accord, this inspired scent feels light, airy and modern.
ReviewText: I used it in mini sets of Estee Lauder and really liked it
Title: used it as a sample

Description: Romance is the women's fragrance that evokes the timeless essence of falling in love. Discover the sensual essence of velvety woods, extravagant florals and seductive musk
ReviewText: If you are looking for a good light summer perfume look no further
Title: Nice light scent

Description: Romance is the women's fragrance that evokes the timeless essence of falling in love. Discover the sensual essence of velvety woods, extravagant florals and seductive musk
ReviewText: I've been wearing this scent for about thirteen years and it's the only parfume that I wear.  I go through a bottle a year as I wear it daily.  Love it!
Title: Thirteen Years and Still Loving it!

ReviewText: Delicious ! Quite similar to the Hypnotic Poison line, but fresher. Still vanilla and tonka dominate, with added candied orange. The bottle is adorable . Silage is good, lasting power ok too for an edt . Recommended to vanilla lovers .
Title: Delicious !

ReviewText: Received a sample in store and instantly fell in love. It's sweet without being nauseating. Light but noticeable. Definitely buying this
Title: Love It!

Product Name: Aqua Allegoria Herba Fresca Eau de Toilette
Description:
The Aqua Allegoria are among Guerlain's most emblematic fragrance collections. Their launch in 1999 was a bold gamble. That of taking nature as sole muse and creating a unique olfactory genre: the first collection of eau fraîche in perfumery.

Herba Fresca is a spontaneous and natural Eau de Toilette, an invitation to walk barefoot in freshly cut grass sparkling with dew. Its pure and refined bottle with a golden mesh celebrates the iconic Guerlain Bee Bottle.
ReviewText: I had my eyes on this Eau de toilette for a while now, and when I saw that it's available on this website I decided to purchase it.. Great fragrance if you love herbal refreshing notes.. It doesn't last a very long time on my skin but it's worth it, I don't mind reapplying it a few times during the day. Highly recommend it..
Title: Light and refreshing

Product Name: Daisy Eau So Fresh Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Daisy eau so fresh is a bright, floral, fruity fragrance.  It radiates with a sunny and sparkling energy.  Playful with a whimsical spirit, this  scent radiates with crisp raspberry, sensuous wild rose, and deep and warm plum. Sophisticated but no too serious.
ReviewText: I love my Daisy fragrance. Not overpowering very pleasant.
Title: Display

Product Name: Daisy Eau So Fresh Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Daisy eau so fresh is a bright, floral, fruity fragrance.  It radiates with a sunny and sparkling energy.  Playful with a whimsical spirit, this  scent radiates with crisp raspberry, sensuous wild rose, and deep and warm plum. Sophisticated but no too serious.
ReviewText: This was my first ever Marc Jacobs perfume purchase.. I wore it in my final years of secondary school and got so many compliments from friends and family. It's a lovely perfume for lovers of simple sweet floral scents - the only downside is that it can wear off after several hours as its only a 'eau de toilette' fragrance so needs a top up if you want the scent all day - which is why I also recommend the purse spray! I lovee all of the Daisy series.
Title: Dainty floral scent

Product Name: Daisy Eau So Fresh Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Daisy eau so fresh is a bright, floral, fruity fragrance.  It radiates with a sunny and sparkling energy.  Playful with a whimsical spirit, this  scent radiates with crisp raspberry, sensuous wild rose, and deep and warm plum. Sophisticated but no too serious.
ReviewText: My very first Marc Jacobs perfume was Daisy and i liked it. Daisy Eau so fresh was my second purchase and believe me, i fell in love with it!! Its so refreshing and every time I smell it, I want to smell it even more. Its perfect for ladies in their twenties and even thirties. I adore this scent so much and I am going to buy the second bottle soon.
Title: All time favourite!!

Product Name: Daisy Eau So Fresh Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Daisy eau so fresh is a bright, floral, fruity fragrance.  It radiates with a sunny and sparkling energy.  Playful with a whimsical spirit, this  scent radiates with crisp raspberry, sensuous wild rose, and deep and warm plum. Sophisticated but no too serious.
ReviewText: This was my first try at the Daisy line and I found it to be too similar to something from Bath and Body Works. It is very easy to put on with lots of fresh fruit but I found that when it dried, all I was left with were strawberries. This would be a great entry perfume for younger girls but I wouldn't recommend for an office.
Title: Smells too much of Strawberries

Product Name: Daisy Eau So Fresh Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Daisy eau so fresh is a bright, floral, fruity fragrance.  It radiates with a sunny and sparkling energy.  Playful with a whimsical spirit, this  scent radiates with crisp raspberry, sensuous wild rose, and deep and warm plum. Sophisticated but no too serious.
ReviewText: When I received  this perfume I was a little wary of how it would smell on me, but let me tell you it is an amazing product. The smell is so beautiful and soft. It's never over powering or harsh. Also it is a scent that doesn't gave me a headache and that for me is AWESOME!
Title: Absolutely love it!

ReviewText: I usually stay away from florals, but this has a fresh sweetness that doesn't overpower. It reminds me of childhood, but still feels age-appropriate for my 30s.

Description:
For a chic and avant-garde Parisienne, Champs Elysées is a fragrance of intense seduction. This joyful floral fragrance celebrates lilac and mimosa. 

A homage to the female form, its bottle expresses the beauty of a woman's body. Crowned with a broad cap, the polished glass extends and embellishes the evocative feminine curves. This beautiful and complete fullness is solidly anchored on a triangle of life: it can also recall the perspective of the world’s most beautiful avenue that stretches from I.M. Pei’s pyramid to the Arc de Triomphe.
ReviewText: It's very soft and delicate fragrance. I love it perfect for summer
Title: Guerlain fragrance

Product Name: Dolce & Gabbana The One Eau de Parfum Spray
ReviewText: I do not like heavy scents (I am looking at you Poison!) so when I first tested this I was in love!  I usually wear Sung by Alfred Sung and have yet to find a fragrance I like as much until now. While Sung will always be my scent I love switching it up with The One, a sexy scent that doesn't overpower!
Title: Smells So good!

Product Name: Dolce & Gabbana The One Eau de Parfum Spray
ReviewText: So delicious reminds me of cool summer nights at the mountains. It has a retro feeling in it that is very well made. Not very Long lasting it disappears in 3 or 4 hours.
Title: I love it

Product Name: Dolce & Gabbana The One Eau de Parfum Spray
ReviewText: I am buying this for my daughter and will sneak a few spritzes when shet isn't looking.
Title: Simply beautiful

Product Name: Bright Crystal Absolu Eau de Parfum Spray
Description: "Bright Crystal Absolu is the absolute of everything, intense, vibrant, sensual and glamorous. The packaging has the absolute elegance and luxury of the most vivid crystal. Most of all, Bright Crystal Absolu is absolutely Versace.”  – Donatella Versace.
ReviewText: One of my favorite perfumes. Has a sweet flower/candy smell. Last's quite awhile so you only need a spray or two & your good for a night on the town.
Title: Sweet smell

Product Name: Bright Crystal Absolu Eau de Parfum Spray
Description: "Bright Crystal Absolu is the absolute of everything, intense, vibrant, sensual and glamorous. The packaging has the absolute elegance and luxury of the most vivid crystal. Most of all, Bright Crystal Absolu is absolutely Versace.”  – Donatella Versace.
ReviewText: Awesome fragrance for girly attitude with high and low nodes
Title: So pleasant fragrance

Product Name: Pour Homme Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Versace pour Homme has been created from essential ingredients of Mediterranean origin with the potential to convey through aromatic notes the character of the man of today: knowledgeable and self-confident, he has the ability to live his life in a harmonious relationship with the natural world.  Dynamic and entrepreneurial, the Versace Pour Homme man communicates his forceful and passionate character through a decidedly masculine fragrance.
ReviewText: This Cologne is very nice smelling and the scent lasts a very long time.
Title: Excellent smelling and very long lasting.

ReviewText: I purchased this cologne for my boyfriend, and he loves it. After one year, he still wears it every day! It smells so good. Seriously, if you're looking for a present for your man or something to surprise him with... this is it.
Title: Your man will love this.

Description: 4x action anti-perspirant: Fast drying. Anti-odours. Anti-humidity. Anti-white stains.
ReviewText: Edicted fragrance Las for long my son liked it a lot
Title: Features

Description: Experience the essence of freshness. A fragrance reminiscent of a calming moment of contact with nature when scented rain cools, refreshes and replenishes. Floral, Fruity, Spicy. A story of perfect balance between femininity and Nature, written by perfumer Antoine Maisondieu. Rooted in Nature, with notes of Pear, Coriander Seed oil and Jasmine Absolute, the senses are set free.
ReviewText: I got this perfume as a sample with my biotherm order and loved it so much i bought the bottle. It smells really fresh and bright.
Title: smells great

Description: The perfume bottle holding this elixir is reminiscent of a sacred stone. Jewel-like, its facets express the radiance of the mysterious MUGLER fragrance. Available in refillable version.
ReviewText: I am a Chanel girl. Allure. Which I still love. But, it is so nice to finally find another perfume that goes great with my PH and does not take away the original smell of the Perfume. Love it!!!! Trust me I have tried and spent many a dollar to find another. THANK YOU SO MUCH!! Thierry Mugler you are a genius.
Title: AWESOME

Description: The perfume bottle holding this elixir is reminiscent of a sacred stone. Jewel-like, its facets express the radiance of the mysterious MUGLER fragrance. Available in refillable version.
ReviewText: I actually didn't notice how expensive this perfume actually was until I brought it home and finally clued in it was $96 for 1oz! Though I was told by the girl in the Beauty Boutique the 1oz bottle I got is refillable AND the refills are a little less. I didn't mind though as I redeemed some optimum points to get it. I knew after trying it I had to have it, Its a sweet smelling perfume with a combination of scents.. amber/fruity with a faint hint of jasmine. Definitely worth it for a special occasion perfume.
Title: Definately a guilty pleasure.

Description: The perfume bottle holding this elixir is reminiscent of a sacred stone. Jewel-like, its facets express the radiance of the mysterious MUGLER fragrance. Available in refillable version.
ReviewText: This is my favourite of Thierry Mugler scents. I think it is really fun and I love that it is refillable! It is something my friends love to so I would recommend it to others to try. I will say that I see it as a 25 and under fragrance just as a personal prefference, but it is something I love to wear out.
Title: Fun!

Description: The perfume bottle holding this elixir is reminiscent of a sacred stone. Jewel-like, its facets express the radiance of the mysterious MUGLER fragrance. Available in refillable version.
ReviewText: I've been wearing this fragrance for years.. it's completely unique, no other scents come close to it. Absolutely worth the price, don't recommend it if you don't want to attract attention though
Title: Magic in a bottle

Description: The perfume bottle holding this elixir is reminiscent of a sacred stone. Jewel-like, its facets express the radiance of the mysterious MUGLER fragrance. Available in refillable version.
ReviewText: I lové this parfume.  Thierry Mugler are very good produits.
Title: It smell very good.

Description: The perfume bottle holding this elixir is reminiscent of a sacred stone. Jewel-like, its facets express the radiance of the mysterious MUGLER fragrance. Available in refillable version.
ReviewText: LOVELOVELOVELOVE IT!!! Out of this world, genius!!
Title: One in a Million

Product Name: The One for Men Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: An elegant, sensual perfume that is decidedly modern but also a unique, timeless classic. It is the natural, masculine version of Dolce&Gabbana the one. The one for Men perfectly reflects the Dolce&Gabbana man: charismatic and seductive, elegant and sophisticated, he loves taking care of himself. A fragrance that is both classic and modern, vibrant and engaging.
ReviewText: Wasn't as pleased with the purchased product 1 year later after smelling in duty free.  Maybe a different batch? It smells like broken dreams and stale tobacco.
Title: Smelled better at the airport

Product Name: The One for Men Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: An elegant, sensual perfume that is decidedly modern but also a unique, timeless classic. It is the natural, masculine version of Dolce&Gabbana the one. The one for Men perfectly reflects the Dolce&Gabbana man: charismatic and seductive, elegant and sophisticated, he loves taking care of himself. A fragrance that is both classic and modern, vibrant and engaging.
ReviewText: Lots of compliments after buying this. Warm/carmelly, not too strong.
Title: Warm Scent

Product Name: The One for Men Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: An elegant, sensual perfume that is decidedly modern but also a unique, timeless classic. It is the natural, masculine version of Dolce&Gabbana the one. The one for Men perfectly reflects the Dolce&Gabbana man: charismatic and seductive, elegant and sophisticated, he loves taking care of himself.
