ReviewText: I loved this scent on my man and had to have it for myself !!!
Title: The One for me !!!

Description: A breath of floral freshness layered with amber and wood, conveying sweetness and femininity in a new, modern language.
ReviewText: Zen was my favourite fragrance when I was in my 30's and 40's when I worked in a department store and was selling fragrances. For years I was unable to find it, then it appeared in an ad on my internet. I immediately ordered it, and although now in my 90's I still love and use it every day. It has once again become my "signature".
Title: Wearing my Easter bonnet, and Zen

Description: A breath of floral freshness layered with amber and wood, conveying sweetness and femininity in a new, modern language.
ReviewText: What I love about Zen is that it's woody and floral being overtly so. The result is a refreshing scent that you can't quite put your finger on. This bottle also goes a long way. It lasted me the whole year using it every single day.
Title: My signature scent

ReviewText: This is such a lovely spray, very light with the most delicious scent.  I spray it on to feel cool and refreshed in the daytime, and even before I sleep at night so I can enjoy the scent while I dream.
Title: Lovely Fresh Scent

ReviewText: So I became a huge fan of the cream and I thought I would try out the body mist for hair as well. It is awesome I carry it with me I freshen up everywhere I go if I have to go from meeting to meeting just a couple of sprints I also use it to put on my pillows at night and I wake up smiling refreshed it is such a really beautiful scent I absolutely adored and highly recommend it!
Title: Perfect compliment to cream!

Description: Mysterious. Exotic. Enigmatic. Magie Noire is a mysterious, bewitching and flamboyant fragrance that embodies passion in its purest form. This oriental fragrance is an exotic blend of Bulgarian Rose, Jasmine and Patchouli notes that capture the mystery of seduction, the mystery of love at first sight.
ReviewText: Fell in love with this fragrance in my teens, and have had lots of compliments whenever I've worn it. Very happy I can still get it online as there has been no other fragrance that I have continued to love for nearly as many years as this one. Lasts all day and makes my coats and scarves smell wonderful too!
Title: Fragrance first captivated me in my teens and continues to in my fifties

Description: Mysterious. Exotic. Enigmatic. Magie Noire is a mysterious, bewitching and flamboyant fragrance that embodies passion in its purest form. This oriental fragrance is an exotic blend of Bulgarian Rose, Jasmine and Patchouli notes that capture the mystery of seduction, the mystery of love at first sight.
ReviewText: Magie Noire cologne has been my only choice for 30 years... Its light scent is perfect. It stays with you, however is not overwhelming... It is absolutely fabulous!
Title: Excellent product!

Description: Mysterious. Exotic. Enigmatic. Magie Noire is a mysterious, bewitching and flamboyant fragrance that embodies passion in its purest form. This oriental fragrance is an exotic blend of Bulgarian Rose, Jasmine and Patchouli notes that capture the mystery of seduction, the mystery of love at first sight.
ReviewText: I really tried to not buy magic noire any more.. But that was my signature smell for 34 years... It's become who I am on my routine in the morning.
Title: NOTHING COMPARES

Description: Eau wow! The first fragrance and body treatment in one spa-fresh formula. This invigorating aroma for women and men moisturizes, firms and tones with essential oils of Lemon, Patchouli, Petit Grain, Ginseng and White Tea. Non-photosensitizing formula is safe enough to wear in the sun. Pure exhilaration sprayed over Eau Dynamisante Moisturizing Body Lotion.
ReviewText:
It's about 15 years ago that I "discovered" Eau Dynamisant, and since then I never change! It's my perfect scent, because I hate parfumes, but I love how descreet is eau dynamisant, and I cannot think to change with nothing else . By the way today I opened a new bottle discovering something different in the scent: I mean, It's almost the same but I can feel a little heavier fragrance, like if there's some new musky note in the deep of it.
could be a defective bottle the one I bought? Or there is something change in the composition? I use to buy big bottles so it's long time ago that i bought the previous one.
thank you for yuor kind attention M.I.
Title: Is my favorite frangrance changed recently?

Description: Eau wow! The first fragrance and body treatment in one spa-fresh formula. This invigorating aroma for women and men moisturizes, firms and tones with essential oils of Lemon, Patchouli, Petit Grain, Ginseng and White Tea. Non-photosensitizing formula is safe enough to wear in the sun. Pure exhilaration sprayed over Eau Dynamisante Moisturizing Body Lotion.
ReviewText: If you knew how many fragrances I have tried over the years, from department stores, websites, and independent multi-level marketing companies, you might call me a "fragrance junkie", and you would know that I have spent a LOT of money and have never been satisfied. UNTIL NOW. I just discovered Eau Dynamisante and I think I am hooked! So fresh and uplifting - I keep smelling my wrists and arms after I've applied it because it just smells so good! And it's good for my skin, too! I also like the fact that it's unique - that I'm not yet another "Angel" fanatic. Good price, too, for over 3 oz. You won't be disappointed!
Title: I Love This!

Description: Eau wow! The first fragrance and body treatment in one spa-fresh formula. This invigorating aroma for women and men moisturizes, firms and tones with essential oils of Lemon, Patchouli, Petit Grain, Ginseng and White Tea. Non-photosensitizing formula is safe enough to wear in the sun. Pure exhilaration sprayed over Eau Dynamisante Moisturizing Body Lotion.
ReviewText: Sadly I need to join with other reviewers and point out that this is not the same Eau Dynamisante scent. I fell in love with Eau when I bought the Invigorating body lotion. The scent was citrusy, floral, light and super sexy. I loved it so much I tried the treatment fragrance. It is NOT the same scent. As others have stated, this is heavy and musky. It was so off putting I checked the box. It says it contains patchouli, a scent I personally dislike for its musky aroma. If you like that heavy musk, this is for you. Personally I will return this and look elsewhere unless Clarins returns to the original formula.
Title: Not the same scent

Description: Eau wow! The first fragrance and body treatment in one spa-fresh formula. This invigorating aroma for women and men moisturizes, firms and tones with essential oils of Lemon, Patchouli, Petit Grain, Ginseng and White Tea. Non-photosensitizing formula is safe enough to wear in the sun. Pure exhilaration sprayed over Eau Dynamisante Moisturizing Body Lotion.
ReviewText:
This was one of my favorite scents, worn either alone or layered with another. It was light, lovely and a great pick-me-up. I recently ran out and went to pick some up and the formula is definitely changed - more musk and a slightly metallic note that can come with an artificial musk. I asked to smell several new bottles and they were all the same new scent. I've been wearing ED since the early 2000s and really know the scent. This is not the same.

I really sad about this and am not sure that I will continue with it as I have an aversion to musk in fragrances, especially one as light as this is.
Title: One of my favorites, but...

Description: Eau wow! The first fragrance and body treatment in one spa-fresh formula. This invigorating aroma for women and men moisturizes, firms and tones with essential oils of Lemon, Patchouli, Petit Grain, Ginseng and White Tea. Non-photosensitizing formula is safe enough to wear in the sun. Pure exhilaration sprayed over Eau Dynamisante Moisturizing Body Lotion.
ReviewText:
I adored this Eau for almost 30 years. It was an uplifting, lovely, balanced fragrance and one could not have a sad day wearing it. 
The fragrance was extraordinary!
Unfortunately someone decided it needed to be reformulated and sadly was ruined. The new scent does not resemble the original. It is masculine with its tones of musk overwhelming the other "fresher" notes. To wear this fragrance in warmer months or climates is completely wrong. 
It was inspirational and enchanting.
Not anymore!
I'm looking for a substitute.
Title: Used to love this Eau!

Description: Eau wow! The first fragrance and body treatment in one spa-fresh formula. This invigorating aroma for women and men moisturizes, firms and tones with essential oils of Lemon, Patchouli, Petit Grain, Ginseng and White Tea. Non-photosensitizing formula is safe enough to wear in the sun. Pure exhilaration sprayed over Eau Dynamisante Moisturizing Body Lotion.
ReviewText: I absolutely love this product. I have been using it forever. People always comment on it subtle lovely scent. However, the last bottle I purchased seemed slightly different to me. Just like the other reviewer, I detected a slight change. It wasn't exactly the same. I still love it, but I hope Clarins has not changed it. It is too perfect to tamper with.
Title: A longtime favorite

Description: Eau wow! The first fragrance and body treatment in one spa-fresh formula. This invigorating aroma for women and men moisturizes, firms and tones with essential oils of Lemon, Patchouli, Petit Grain, Ginseng and White Tea. Non-photosensitizing formula is safe enough to wear in the sun. Pure exhilaration sprayed over Eau Dynamisante Moisturizing Body Lotion.
ReviewText:
When moving to the USA I was concerned whether I could find and continue using this wonderfully refreshing fragrance.
Having found and used your web site I am in seventh heaven. This fragrance is just right to wear in the hot and sometimes humid conditions in which I live.
Thank you for the excellent service your staff provide..
Title: Wonderful Eau dynamisante

Description: Eau wow! The first fragrance and body treatment in one spa-fresh formula. This invigorating aroma for women and men moisturizes, firms and tones with essential oils of Lemon, Patchouli, Petit Grain, Ginseng and White Tea. ReviewText: I used to wear it decades ago and even introduced my sisters to it when we were in college.  Due to a recent Shoppers Optimum points redemption event I splurged a good deal of my points on it and am so happy to be reunited with it and to experience its fresh and uplifting natural fragrance again!
Title: So happy to have it again!

Description: Eau wow! The first fragrance and body treatment in one spa-fresh formula. This invigorating aroma for women and men moisturizes, firms and tones with essential oils of Lemon, Patchouli, Petit Grain, Ginseng and White Tea. Non-photosensitizing formula is safe enough to wear in the sun. Pure exhilaration sprayed over Eau Dynamisante Moisturizing Body Lotion.
ReviewText: I have been using this product on and off for 25 years. I just recently, purchased it again and wondered why I waited so long. It tightens the skin and refreshes my face while leaving a lovely scent like no other product out there on the market. Try it and you too will feel lovely.
Title: invigorating

Description: Eau wow! The first fragrance and body treatment in one spa-fresh formula. This invigorating aroma for women and men moisturizes, firms and tones with essential oils of Lemon, Patchouli, Petit Grain, Ginseng and White Tea. Non-photosensitizing formula is safe enough to wear in the sun. Pure exhilaration sprayed over Eau Dynamisante Moisturizing Body Lotion.
ReviewText: I have been buying this product for about 15 years now it is a wonderful clean energizing scent. I can barley keep it in the house as my husband also uses it. Little hint regarding this scent if you have soar tired legs or feet spritz a little bit on for a great refreshed feel.
Title: Perfect for a refreshing clean feel anytime

This invigorating aroma for women and men moisturizes, firms and tones with essential oils of Lemon, Patchouli, Petit Grain, Ginseng and White Tea. Non-photosensitizing formula is safe enough to wear in the sun. Pure exhilaration sprayed over Eau Dynamisante Moisturizing Body Lotion.
ReviewText: I love the calm that comes over me when I apply the Eau Dynamisante. I also think it is a sexy aroma so don't be stingy by only indulging it in the morning. It comes in a spray bottle but I would prefer a non-spray so I can be more selective when I apply.
Title: Great Way to Start or End the Day

Description: Eau wow! The first fragrance and body treatment in one spa-fresh formula. This invigorating aroma for women and men moisturizes, firms and tones with essential oils of Lemon, Patchouli, Petit Grain, Ginseng and White Tea. Non-photosensitizing formula is safe enough to wear in the sun. Pure exhilaration sprayed over Eau Dynamisante Moisturizing Body Lotion.
ReviewText:
Bought this for my wife because she loves it. I love the way it smells on her. It's a light fresh scent that lasts on her all day. It's hard to describe but I can say that it makes us both happy.

Good stuff, please don't change it or stop making it.
Title: Great Stuff

ReviewText: After searching for a scent which was elegant but not overwhelming, I settled on Eau many years ago. It remains my ONLY scent. If you're looking for a big statement, this isn't it. Very light and actually smells like a warm evening.
Title: 25 years and counting!

Title: Love it!

Description:
The 1985 launch of OBSESSION fragrance revolutionized the prestige fragrance business with its feverish intensity and irresistible appeal. When Calvin Klein asked the question, “Who hasn't felt passion beyond reason?” he tapped into a special fantasy that any woman could relate to. A lasting and powerful experience that's as appealing today as it was at launch.

It is an intense and powerful oriental scent. OBSESSION is an intoxicating blend of flora’s and spices with an earthy, warm base, intensely feminine and long lasting.
ReviewText: I still have my original kidney-shaped edp splash bottle from 1986. I also own the EdP purchased at Beauty Boutique. There is a slight difference and I mean so slight, it's negligible. The new formulation (currently sold here) is lacking that distinctive stale note in the original. I don't miss it. The current formulation is fabulous and worthy of love. I've been wearing Obsession for 26 years and I still love it. Applied with a light hand it is absolutely bewitching. If you love spicy, amber, leathery vanillas... you need to buy this!
Title: Still sexy after all these years

Description:
The 1985 launch of OBSESSION fragrance revolutionized the prestige fragrance business with its feverish intensity and irresistible appeal. When Calvin Klein asked the question, “Who hasn't felt passion beyond reason?” he tapped into a special fantasy that any woman could relate to. A lasting and powerful experience that's as appealing today as it was at launch.

It is an intense and powerful oriental scent. OBSESSION is an intoxicating blend of flora’s and spices with an earthy, warm base, intensely feminine and long lasting.
ReviewText: I had this Perfume given to me last Christmas by my Husband.He knows how much I love wearing perfume ,even though there is not too many places around that will let you wear any kind of perfume because of allergies.When we are at home and not going anywhere ,I always wear perfume,and my very favorite, of few, that I love is Calvin Klein Obsession.I just love,love that scent.Every time I wear it my Husband speaks about how feminine it smells,the scent is not overpowering or strong but,Mild and kinda faintl like.It is so hard to explain this scent,It's not over powering and yet ,you can smell it almost across the room.It is such a distant and yet close perfume.It is a very long lasting perfume that appeals to men,it makes heads turn,that is what I love about it.A perfume that makes a man's head turn has to be awfully nice,and giving off that Feminine look at the same time.I just love Obsession by Calvin Klein and I certainly would recommend it to women to try,you'll love it.
Title: Men won't be able to resist you

Title: Love it

Description: Find Your Moment. Pure. Exquisite. Uncomplicated. Elizabeth Arden White Tea is inspired by the simple pleasure that accompanies the first sip of tea. Exquisitely uncomplicated, this new fragrance invites you to revel in the moment. A musky-woody floral, it preludes with sparkling Italian Mandarin and sensual Sea Breeze Accord. Its Zen-like heart of White Tea Extract and Mate Absolute Paraguay steeps in graceful femininity while Madras Wood, Ambrette Seed Absolute and a Trio of Tranquility Musks lead to a harmonious finale. For the woman who wants to immerse herself in the moment. White Tea is a crisp, blissful new addition to the Elizabeth Arden fragrance portfolio. The perfect escape for your senses, it is an invitation to indulge in warm memories and delight in the white tea vapors, blue skies and cotton-like clouds.
ReviewText: I bought pure gloss, but thought it would have more pigment and not quite as many sparkles. I looked at the colors online and it looked like they would have more color. I use it over my other lipsticks. It's a little sticky also and that bothers me. It might be good for other people, but I wouldn't buy it again.
Title: A little disappointed

ReviewText: This is something an old lady would wear. Not loving it at all. Another one to sit on the shelf and look pretty.
Title: Not for me

Description: Daisy is fresh and feminine, with a playful innocence. It is sophisticated but not too serious. Bright and alluring with a sense of ease. Radiant and enchanting, daisy is a sparkling floral bouquet – spirited and fresh, wrapped in comfort and warmth. At the heart of daisy is a floral with vintage edge: violet. Sophisticated with a touch of whimsy, violet captures the eclectic, vintage flavor of Marc Jacobs’ feminine, edgy designs. Daisy opens with the luscious natural freshness of wild strawberry, violet leaves and ruby red grapefruit. The heart of gardenia, violet petals and jasmine petals is velvety and luminous – a modern vintage. Musk, vanilla infusion and white woods round out the balance of notes with smooth softness and warm sensuality.
ReviewText: This is a great perfume for weekends and the office. It has one of the longest finishes I have ever experienced and the scent doesn't really change drastically through the day. Its a light floral but the white floral is not overwhelmed by anything too strong.
Title: One of my all time faves!

Description:
Refined, Classic & Polished. 
ARROGANT fragrance is an enchanting blend that beckons with fresh, aromatic notes of bergamot and cedar wood.  Lifted by a core of lavender and coriander, this scent               reveals a base of sandalwood, amber and sheer musk.
ReviewText: This cologne is great! I love the fragrance and I always get compliments on it.
Title: Awesome! My Favourite Cologne

Product Name: Daisy Eau So Fresh Kiss Eau de Toilette
Description: Daisy Eau So Fresh Kiss is light and radiant with a vibrant blend of peony, cherry blossom and rose petals. Notes of sensual white wood and sandalwood round out the base.
ReviewText: Marc jacobs discontinued my signature fragrance last year and I have been on a frantic search for a new one. This met my expectations. It's soft without being lost after a few hours, it's floral without being obvious and it has this subtle warmth about it. All I have to say is please make this permenant!
Title: Beautifully feminine

Description: Slim and majestic the ANGEL Rising Star perfume bottle by MUGLER reflects the shadows and light of a memorable blue-tinged dream. Available in refillable version.
ReviewText: This is in my regular rotation of perfumes, one of the ones I will choose when I want to make an impression and feel my best. It is a high quality perfume with a sophisticated and modern scent. I'm not great at picking out the notes, but I can tell you its not stuffy or fake or overly floral(which I can't stand!). I would definitely recommend Angel.
Title: Love it!

Description: Slim and majestic the ANGEL Rising Star perfume bottle by MUGLER reflects the shadows and light of a memorable blue-tinged dream. Available in refillable version.
ReviewText: This is a very unique perfume. Even if it's not your cup of tea it's worth taking a note of it & testing it during different seasons. It's been a cult-favorite and dare I say groundbreaking when it was first introduced. As years go by it has not lost it's popularity or appeal. For me it associates with Christmas and I personally find it to smell the best in winter or cold months. That's when I pick on the notes of something sweet like praline/vanilla, chocolate, patchouli, clementines oil bursting in winter air while being peeled and something like frosted fir (it's not in the pyramid though); it's gourmand, warm & at the same time has something frosty. I prefer it on fur or cashmere, wool during cold evenings. The longevity is strong. Be mindful that all perfumes work different with each person's skin chemistry and also the scent develops gradually hence do not judge it by the first sniff. I find it smells & projects completely different on my skin based on the time of the year so I keep it only for when I am in the mood for it and when the temperatures drop.
Title: Very Memorable! Either love it or hate it perfume

Description:
Narciso Rodriguez For Her eau de toilette is an elegant, sensual, mysterious and delicate fragrance.
Three notes enhance the heart of musk: floral, amber and woody notes. A bottle with a black interior set off by clean, pure lines presented in a soft-pink box.

Description: Experience Sì, the new fragrance by Giorgio Armani. This luminous fragrance has been created for the modern woman who’s strong yet feminine, sophisticated yet charismatic. She embodies the very essence of chic Italian elegance and style. She says YES to life! Sì to Strength, Sì to Dreams, Sì to Freedom, Sì to Love, Sì to Myself. Sì Eau de Parfum is a modern chypre, reinvented with deep blackcurrant nectar, airy florals and musky blond wood. The scent is at first delicate, then lingers with mystery and later makes you remember her.
ReviewText:
I purchased this perfume late March 2016, and I can honestly say that is one the best perfume I've ever bought. The perfume has a sweet scent without the smell of alcohol behind it. Not only is the smell wonderful, but it is a long lasting perfume which will undoubtedly get you many compliments. Lastly, a little spritz of the SI is all you need, allowing you to have a perfume that will last through the seasons. 
This perfume is an all around win for the person who is looking for a new-sweet smelling perfume.
Title: Exquisite Smell

The scent is at first delicate, then lingers with mystery and later makes you remember her.
ReviewText: people actually stop me to ask what perfume I'm wearing, and I have had 3 people I know but it because they love the smell of it from me. People can tell if I have been in a room just by the smell. Although sad to say...I have lost my sense of smell for life...I do remember how good this perfume smelled, and as long as they make it I will keep buying it.
Title: Amazing! So many compliments.

Description: Experience Sì, the new fragrance by Giorgio Armani. This luminous fragrance has been created for the modern woman who’s strong yet feminine, sophisticated yet charismatic. She embodies the very essence of chic Italian elegance and style. She says YES to life! Sì to Strength, Sì to Dreams, Sì to Freedom, Sì to Love, Sì to Myself. Sì Eau de Parfum is a modern chypre, reinvented with deep blackcurrant nectar, airy florals and musky blond wood. The scent is at first delicate, then lingers with mystery and later makes you remember her.
ReviewText: This is, hands-down, the most beautiful perfume I have ever worn. I originally purchased it while on vacation on a cruise and 7 months later it's time for a new bottle. I get compliments on this as it is soft and not overpowering and the scent is easy on the nose. I find that it fades by lunch time, but I still love it
Title: In LOVE with Si

Description: Inhale the scent of victory with Invictus, the new masculine perfume by Paco Rabanne. This sensually fresh scent sets a modern vision of virility. Invictus is an unexpected clash of worlds, powers, sensations, and values: a thrill of pure freshness top note face to the sensuality of a guaiac wood base note.
ReviewText: I bought it for my husband...It's a good eau de toilette.....bottle design is great....I like it but little lighter fragrance than I was expecting.
Title: great look

Invictus is an unexpected clash of worlds, powers, sensations, and values: a thrill of pure freshness top note face to the sensuality of a guaiac wood base note.
ReviewText:
We received it for the first time as a sample and my hubby loved it, then I bought it on Christmas on discounted price as a gift for my husband and also for my uncle ,, really they were very happy with my choice..
Will buy it again and again
Title: Irresistible

Product Name: Dior Homme Eau For Men Eau de Toilette
Description: Bold & refined, magnetic & charismatic, Dior Homme Eau for Men is defined by its urban edge and immediate charm. The fragrance is a fresh and gripping composition with incisive, spicy top notes of Moroccan Grapefruit, Calabrian Bergamot, and Crimean Coriander. The heart unfolds with elegant, sexy Tuscan Iris while the invigorating base of Virginia cedar wood powerfully unfurls with a masculine and sophisticated signature. Dior Homme Eau for Men: the distinguished mark of a man with uninhibited elegance.
ReviewText: This is the third time I repeat this perfume for my luv, it's awesome.
Title: A scent for lovers

Description: As a 30th anniversary tribute to Terracotta bronzing powder, Guerlain’s in-house perfumer Thierry Wasser has interpreted the legendary powder as a sun-soaked invitation fragrance. An irresistibly sensual composition, inspired by the radiant realm of Terracotta. An immediate departure to an exotic faraway paradise...
ReviewText: I wanted to get this fragrance a while age however  it was hard to find as it was limited edt. Finally I  found it at beauty boutique. It has tiare flower and jasmin notes in it as well as some sort of other sweet vanilla notes. I find  it is very easy to wear it and I think women of various age will  like this fragrance. Great for summer days but also because it is warm it can be worn during colder days. it will remind u a tropic island. Also I have to mention it  is a good value product as it comes in 100ml bottle, however keep in mind it is not long lasting perfume.
Title: Beautiful summer fragrance

Description: As a 30th anniversary tribute to Terracotta bronzing powder, Guerlain’s in-house perfumer Thierry Wasser has interpreted the legendary powder as a sun-soaked invitation fragrance. An irresistibly sensual composition, inspired by the radiant realm of Terracotta. An immediate departure to an exotic faraway paradise...
ReviewText: This smells like a beautiful tropical island resort.  perfect for a dreamy summer night. If you like Tom Ford's Solei Blanc or Maison Martin Margiela ‘REPLICA' Beach Walk, you will also like this.
Title: Summer Dream

Description: As a 30th anniversary tribute to Terracotta bronzing powder, Guerlain’s in-house perfumer Thierry Wasser has interpreted the legendary powder as a sun-soaked invitation fragrance. An irresistibly sensual composition, inspired by the radiant realm of Terracotta. An immediate departure to an exotic faraway paradise...
ReviewText: A limited edt. 2014 scent Terracotta started with a slightly bitter orange blossom note. This introduction feels like a "classic French perfume" flourish, just to remind us that this fragrance is a Guerlain. The vanilla base is subtle; what I really notice in the dry down is more of that salty musk under the white flowers. It surprised me with its excellent staying power, especially when I apply it to my hairline at the nape of my neck.
Title: Summertime Glamour in a Bottle

Description: As a 30th anniversary tribute to Terracotta bronzing powder, Guerlain’s in-house perfumer Thierry Wasser has interpreted the legendary powder as a sun-soaked invitation fragrance. An irresistibly sensual composition, inspired by the radiant realm of Terracotta. An immediate departure to an exotic faraway paradise...
ReviewText: I got this a week ago... the smell is too strong for me. It reminds me of "ylang ylang" flower from my hometown.
Title: Good price

Description: Try it to believe it. Totally gentle and effective. Delicately scented with Cashmere Mist, this advanced formula also controls wetness and perspiration, keeping you feeling dry and smelling fresh all day. So gentle it can be used immediately after shaving without irritation. Perfect for even sensitive skin.
ReviewText: This antiperspirant is a gem. It's known to be better/stronger than any other out there. Even some men use it! When you've tried everything else out there and you're at your wits end, pay the money. You'll be glad you did. I've been using it for years. The only complaint I have is that the price seems to be going up all the time.
Title: The solution

Description: Try it to believe it. Totally gentle and effective. Delicately scented with Cashmere Mist, this advanced formula also controls wetness and perspiration, keeping you feeling dry and smelling fresh all day. So gentle it can be used immediately after shaving without irritation. Perfect for even sensitive skin.
ReviewText: I have been using it for years and never tempted to try something else. The scent is very light and beautiful! Yes the price is high however it seems to last a long time. I use it daily and use about 2 a year. It is a solid stick and very effective.
Title: Best Deodorant on planet

Product Name: Prada Candy Eau de Parfum Spray
ReviewText: The smell of this perfume is fabulous! im a very difficult when it comes to perfume...but this one is perfect and the smell stay ....i bought the body lotion also!
Title: love the smell!

Product Name: Prada Candy Eau de Parfum Spray
ReviewText: I received a sample of the Prada Candy, and immediately loved it! And I am quite fussy with fragrance scents. Just had to buy the full size! Love it!
Title: Love this fragrance!

Product Name: Prada Candy Eau de Parfum Spray
ReviewText: I purchased this a few weeks ago, and have worn it every day since.  The scent is light and fresh, and perfect for summer.  I've received many compliments on it.
Title: Great summer scent!

Product Name: Prada Candy Eau de Parfum Spray
ReviewText: I purchased both the full sized perfume and lotion in December as an early Christmas gift for "myself"........over half of both are gone and they have never let me down with their soft, subtle scent.  Have enjoyed so many compliments on this fragrance.  Absolutely LOVE it!
Title: Spellbinding scent!

Product Name: Prada Candy Eau de Parfum Spray
ReviewText: I chose this perfume from a sample box given to me for a Christmas gift from my husband. It was hands down the best smelling perfume out of all the samples. It is not an overbearing scent, and not too flowery, which is good for me.
Title: Very Nice Perfume!

Product Name: Prada Candy Eau de Parfum Spray
ReviewText: I received this as a Mother's Day gift from my husband and four year old son. I have received compliments on it from random people and people I see regularly !! Love it so much. It's sweet, but sort of a mature sweet . Love !!
Title: So many compliments on this scent !!

Product Name: Prada Candy Eau de Parfum Spray
ReviewText: This is my ultimate favorite perfume of all time. It smells yummy AND beautiful at the same time! It's a little costly but lasts for along time so the value is good. I wear it everyday and the large bottle last the full year.
Title: So yummy!

Product Name: Prada Candy Eau de Parfum Spray
ReviewText: I received a multi perfume sampler box for a gift and chose this one from many to get the full size bottle. Have been wearing it ever since! Very light and fragrant, perfect for a nice evening out.
Title: My Favorite!

Product Name: Prada Candy Eau de Parfum Spray
ReviewText: A friend suggested this scent. I looked at many reviews and decided to buy it before trying it. I love it. This is by far the best perfume I've tried in a long time. It's sweet and not flowery.
Title: Love!!

ReviewText: From the first time i samples this i had to have it. Ive bought at least two bottles over the years and its a easy got to in my collection. Candy describes it perfectly

Description: The original sweet and savory fragrance, MUGLER Womanity perfume is built around the fig, a symbol of femininity. The fragrance has a fig and caviar accord The bottle is a sculpted work of art.
ReviewText: I appreciate that Mugler is doing a refillable perfume bottle partly because it's a greener, and partly for convenience. To my nose, this scent is more on the sweet side by far than the savoury side. It smells sort of pink, like the colouring.
Title: Love that it's refillable

Description: Black Opium, the highly addictive feminine fragrance from Yves Saint Laurent. Fascinating and seductively intoxicating, the opening notes of adrenaline-rich coffee and the sweet sensuality of vanilla recline into the softness of white flowers for a modern, young, and vibrant interpretation of addiction. Get your dose.
ReviewText:
I purchased this item and I've fallen in love!
I wear this perfume on a daily basis. 
I get complements all the time.
Less is more and it usually lasts me 2 months with continuous use.
Title: Smells amazing

Product Name: ARI by Ariana Grande Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
The luscious and sexy fragrance opens with sparkling fruits and an ultra-feminine floralcy, passionately spun with musks, woods, and an addictive hint of marshmallow. 
Fragrance Notes—Top: Crispy Pear, Pink Grapefruit, Juicy Raspberry. Heart:  Soft Muguet, Rose Buds, Vanilla Orchid. Drydown:  Marshmallow, Creamy Musk, Blonde Woods

TOP: The fragrance opens with the mouth watering freshness of Crispy Pear, Pink Grapefruit and sparkling Juicy Raspberry.

HEART: The ultra-feminine heart blossoms with a plush bouquet of Soft Muguet and Rose Buds in a velvety bloom of creamy Vanilla Orchid.

DRYDOWN: The sexy fragrance is a sophisticated blend of Creamy Musk and Blonde Woods and an addictive touch of Marshmallow.
ReviewText: Bought it a month ago, it was on sale and smelled really good so i bought it and little did i know it comes with this ariana grande purse! Great buy! Would buy again if it goes on sale again lol
Title: Sweet sweet sexy smell!

ReviewText: The description says that there is a 'hint' of marshmallow in this perfume; I disagree with that statement. While this is meant to be a floral feminine style of perfume (what else would it be for Ariana?) all I've ever predominantly gotten from it is sugar. Yes it is feminine, yes the bottle looks gorgeous, yes it smells like sugar encrusted petals, but if you hate over the top sweet feminine perfumes stear very clear of this scent.

a light fragrance is great and not strong at all.i will buy again when i run out
Title: really lovelly

Product Name: ARI by Ariana Grande Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
The luscious and sexy fragrance opens with sparkling fruits and an ultra-feminine floralcy, passionately spun with musks, woods, and an addictive hint of marshmallow. 
Fragrance Notes—Top: Crispy Pear, Pink Grapefruit, Juicy Raspberry. Heart:  Soft Muguet, Rose Buds, Vanilla Orchid. Drydown:  Marshmallow, Creamy Musk, Blonde Woods

TOP: The fragrance opens with the mouth watering freshness of Crispy Pear, Pink Grapefruit and sparkling Juicy Raspberry.

HEART: The ultra-feminine heart blossoms with a plush bouquet of Soft Muguet and Rose Buds in a velvety bloom of creamy Vanilla Orchid.

DRYDOWN: The sexy fragrance is a sophisticated blend of Creamy Musk and Blonde Woods and an addictive touch of Marshmallow.
ReviewText: This is my favourite perfume ever! It smells so sweet and the bottle is adorable. I've gotten it twice and I am sure I will continue to enjoy it the next time I buy it.
Title: MY FAVOURITE

Title: It smells Really good!!!

Product Name: Roses de Chloé Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Roses de Chloé is an invitation to grace. Luminous and subtle, it inspires and evokes a unique facet of the signature Chloé rose, capturing the spirit of the Chloé woman. The fragrance exudes an immediate and incredible freshness, derived from the top note bergamot. This sensation is gradually joined by a heart of Damascena rose essence, modernized with a magnolia accord. The trail on the skin is of white musk and amber, the signature base of the Chloé house.
ReviewText: Fresh floral scent.  Evokes happy thoughts.  Spray when I need a pick me up.
Title: Roses de Chloe EDT

Product Name: Roses de Chloé Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Roses de Chloé is an invitation to grace. Luminous and subtle, it inspires and evokes a unique facet of the signature Chloé rose, capturing the spirit of the Chloé woman. The fragrance exudes an immediate and incredible freshness, derived from the top note bergamot. This sensation is gradually joined by a heart of Damascena rose essence, modernized with a magnolia accord. The trail on the skin is of white musk and amber, the signature base of the Chloé house.
ReviewText: Tried this on a cruise at their Duty Free shop for a week and fell in love with it.   For BeautyBoutique.ca's first Spend Your Points event, I knew exactly what I was going to buy!  Roses de Chloe EDT.   Beautiful bottle with sweet jammy rose and a touch of peony and musk.  Good sillage and lasts for about six to seven hours.   Very ladylike and suitable for teas, showers, church events, and any other activities.  Probably most suited to spring and summer.
Title: Release your inner Lady!

Product Name: Roses de Chloé Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Roses de Chloé is an invitation to grace. Luminous and subtle, it inspires and evokes a unique facet of the signature Chloé rose, capturing the spirit of the Chloé woman. The fragrance exudes an immediate and incredible freshness, derived from the top note bergamot. This sensation is gradually joined by a heart of Damascena rose essence, modernized with a magnolia accord. The trail on the skin is of white musk and amber, the signature base of the Chloé house.
ReviewText:
If you love the smell of a fresh bouquet of roses, this one is definitely for you!
I first recieved this as a sample, and quickly ordered the largest bottle I could get my hands on. Not over-powering, just a clean fresh smell that makes you feel you're in a rose garden all day.
Title: Scent of Angels

Product Name: Roses de Chloé Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Roses de Chloé is an invitation to grace. Luminous and subtle, it inspires and evokes a unique facet of the signature Chloé rose, capturing the spirit of the Chloé woman. The fragrance exudes an immediate and incredible freshness, derived from the top note bergamot. This sensation is gradually joined by a heart of Damascena rose essence, modernized with a magnolia accord. The trail on the skin is of white musk and amber, the signature base of the Chloé house.
ReviewText: This is now my signature scent, after many years searching for the perfect fragrance. Smells like roses, but still light and fresh – never overpowering. I've received many compliments while wearing and would highly recommend as a daily fragrance.
Title: Smells amazing – light and fresh

Product Name: Roses de Chloé Eau de Toilette Spray

This sensation is gradually joined by a heart of Damascena rose essence, modernized with a magnolia accord. The trail on the skin is of white musk and amber, the signature base of the Chloé house.
ReviewText: A great fragrance for those new to perfumes, and wanting to amass a collection: this is a great starter piece. Be warned though, it can be very easily overpowering and cloying if sprayed once too many times!
Title: Good for fans of powdery rose perfumes

Title: Wake up and smell the Roses!

Description:
Absolutely captivating, with opulent flowers, rich spices, precious woods.

It has been called one of the sexiest fragrances ever created, and more than 50 years after it was launched it continues to entice with its sensual, yet timeless appeal.
ReviewText: Applied with a light hand, this icon of American perfumery is absolutely bewitching. My husband can't keep his hands off me when I'm wearing it. He says it smells great and is conflicted because it is both work-appropriate and devastatingly sexy all the same time. I'm a nurse and I work in a nursing home. I wear just one tiny spritz of the EdP between my breasts and get nothing but compliments from men and women of all ages all day. All year round.  All I hear is "You smell soooo good." "You smell like the Lush store." "You smell so clean and aromatherapy-ish." However the compliment I get the most is "You smell so glamorous and comforting at the same time. What are you wearing??".  I also wear the bath oil. Some days I wear a dab of the bath oil rubbed into both forearms and the spritz of EdP between my breasts and it's never too much and always, always. always elicits compliments. Especially in the dry summer heat! I always have a dusting powder as well. Funny thing too, when someone asks me what I'm wearing and I tell them, the reply is always "oh yeah, that's my favourite." *shrug*
Title: Glamorous and comforting

Description:
Absolutely captivating, with opulent flowers, rich spices, precious woods.

It has been called one of the sexiest fragrances ever created, and more than 50 years after it was launched it continues to entice with its sensual, yet timeless appeal.
ReviewText: Youth Dew has a warm sultry fragrance. Highly recommended. A little goes a long way.
Title: Youth Dew

Description: Find Your Moment. Pure. Exquisite. Uncomplicated. Elizabeth Arden White Tea is inspired by the simple pleasure that accompanies the first sip of tea. Exquisitely uncomplicated, this new fragrance invites you to revel in the moment. A musky-woody floral, it preludes with sparkling Italian Mandarin and sensual Sea Breeze Accord. Its Zen-like heart of White Tea Extract and Mate Absolute Paraguay steeps in graceful femininity while Madras Wood, Ambrette Seed Absolute and a Trio of Tranquility Musks lead to a harmonious finale. For the woman who wants to immerse herself in the moment. White Tea is a crisp, blissful new addition to the Elizabeth Arden fragrance portfolio. The perfect escape for your senses, it is an invitation to indulge in warm memories and delight in the white tea vapors, blue skies and cotton-like clouds.
ReviewText: I bought this fragrance for my sister.  She was totally out of fragrance and handed me her credit card and told me to go pick up anything for her.  I just happened to run across this new fragrance, sprayed it on myself to make sure it was light and now flowery or too sweet.  I bought it for her at a big named store with a discount coupon and got a good deal. On the way out to my car, I caught a whiff of myself and realized it was White Tea!  She really liked it so when I had a chance to get to a computer, I found this website and ordered it. Actually, I bought the same exact size and got it for even less money than what I purchased it for my sister! Talk about a great feeling!  Nice job, Ms. Arden.  I wear Red Door but now I've found another outstanding fragrance you have created.
Title: Way to go Elizabeth Arden!

Description: Find Your Moment. Pure. Exquisite. Uncomplicated. Elizabeth Arden White Tea is inspired by the simple pleasure that accompanies the first sip of tea. ReviewText: I bought this for myself and absolutely love it. It is a light crisp scent. I have had numerous compliments on it.  Even my husband noticed and he has never remarked on my perfume! I liked it so much I ordered a bottle for my Mom for Mothers Day!
Title: The perfect scent!

ReviewText: I rarely buy fragrance online without trying it first, but I decided to give this a try. I love it. It's very light and perfect for the summer. I've used it every day since I bought it.
