ReviewText: Nice floral scent. Great for spring and summer. I received a sample of it and had to order this immediately.
Title: Love this scent!

Description:
Light and silky. Leaves your skin smooth and comfortable. Soft, pampering puff.
Elegantly scents skin with Youth-Dew. Absolutely captivating, with opulent flowers, rich spices, precious woods.
ReviewText: I bought this for my 99 yr old mother in law and she was so happy to get this quality product. I love it too. I'm happy they still make this powder.
Title: 99 year old still loves Youth Dew dusting powder

ReviewText: This perfume is very long lasting. I can still smell it on cloths after few days. It will project the first 2 to 3 hours then become close to skin but still strong never subtle. More suits winter and fall.
Title: Best of the best!!

ReviewText: It comes on strong, with a punch of honeyed, musky peach, almost like peach liqueur, and it has noticeable sillage so bus riders be aware! The Jasmine note is more pronounced than usual which I like, however, that white floral note ends up submerged in a fresh wave of peach juice and vanilla-spice amber and synthetic patchouli, and the dry down turns out to be a little bland for me. I myself wouldn't buy it but can totally understand why someone else would for their decided fall/winter scent. All in all though I can't say it would be the first scent I'd reccomend, especially with the price point being $145 for only 90mL - on the flip side, you'd never need to buy more than that in order to strut your sexy stuff.
Title: Strong Evening Wear

ReviewText: This one felt a bit old for me since I'm still in college, theres no need for me to have a deeper scent like this one, however i would eventually have it for more professional soirees or a more formal context. Smells great, just feels a bit too strong for my needs
Title: Same reliable awesome scent, but stronger

ReviewText: This perfume delivers on its promise of sensuality.  Very little is needed as it is powerful at first, it fades shortly after but the scent remains all day. Every time I wear this people comment on how amazing I smell.  It is suitable for day and evening wear.
Title: New Favorite!

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: there are hardly words for how much i truly adore amazing grace! it is elegant, yet clean, soft, yet makes a statement. seriously when i wear it, i find myself constantly bringing my wrists up to my nose to keep inhaling the fragrance over and over again! my only complaint is that unless you layer w/the body emulsifier and shower gel, the staying power is very minimal. i seem to go thru the bottle very quickly because i constantly refresh...hopefully one day philosophy you will bring back the Amazing grace of old that had the staying power and the beautiful fragrance all in one. however, i really cannot complain...i adore amazing grace :)
Title: Amazing grace is heaven in a bottle...

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I absolutely love amazing grace. I started using this fragrance over the summer, and like everyone says, I have never received so many comments about "smelling so good." The scent isn't too strong, but is noticable when you are sitting very near another person, or give them a hug. It is a very feminine scent, and unlike one of the other reviewers that thought it was too motherly, I have had several of "20 somethings" and teenagers that i work with tell me they really like my perfume and ask what I'm wearing. I have worm other trendy scent in the past, but have never received positive comments about my perfume like I have since trying amazing grace.
Title: It is everything you read about and more!

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I absolutely Adore this fragrance! i bought it in the smallest size, because i had never used it before and don't have any stores near me that carry it in order to smell it before buying. once my small bottle runs out i will absolutely be ordering the biggest size possible! this fragrance is so feminine, in a very understated and clean way. it is a very sophisticated smelling fragrance, it makes me feel so pretty every time i wear it. i haven't had any problems with this fragrance not lasting, i put it on in the morning before i leave the house and can still smell it on me at night when i'm climbing into bed. my new favorite fragrance!
Title: Lovely!

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I have tried almost all of the grace line scents and every time I keep coming back to amazing grace! I have been using philosophy for almost 10 years now! every year for christmas i ask for one philosophy item in any of the grace scents. i just love the slight floral fragrance of amazing grace and how it just stays on all day but is not over powering. Just need about 3 sprays and im good for the day! i get compliments everytime i wear it and my boss even compliments it and she is very sensitive to certain scents (citrus). i have to say this scent will always be my favorite and go to scent even though i have one of almost every grace line in my bathroom!
Title: always be my favorite

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I treated myself to a big bottle of AG for my birthday back in January. I hadn't had it in awhile but was excited to stock up on my fave everyday fragrance. But as I've been wearing it the last few months, I just felt something was 'off.' Then I read the reviews here and now know why....the formula has been changed. The scent barely lasts half a day! I miss the old AG that would still smell delicious the NEXT day (as a mommy of twins sometimes a shower isn't a daily occurrence;). I loved the light but staying scent and always got compliments on it. Sadly, that is no longer the case. Wish I had read these reviews first. Guess I have to find a new everyday scent.
Title: Sadly, I wish I read these reviews BEFORE I bought

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: amazing grace was one of the first purchases i bought from philosophy years ago & what got me started into the brand. when i started using this i realized just how strong other fragrances were from other companies, which i very rarely use anymore. because of amazing grace, i went on to purchase most of the other graces & it's all i use now for fragrance. i just can't seem to tolerate really strong, perfumy fragrances anymore, i actually get nauseated from them. amazing grace is so tender & feminine, fresh & clean smelling, i will always use this. i love to layer this with all the other amazing grace bath & body products.
Title: soft and beautiful

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText:
i haven't meet a grace i didn't like. sure i like some more than others but this is my go to. i was without fragrance for quite a few years, just going to that store in the mall to get the lotions and body sprays they have but just not loving it. i had seen this on qvc a few times thinking who orders perfume off of the tv? you don't even know what it smells like.
well seeing that they have a 30 day money back guarantee i thought...what the heck? best decision i ever made and haven't looked back. i wear almost all of the scents (not the field of flowers stuff), mixing and matching, depending on my mood. love, love, love!
Title: my go to scent

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText:
It really hurts me to give Amazing Grace one star, but it has to be done, like I said, it's as if I've lost my pet or my best friend, I counted on Grace. I have been wearing it for about 10 years, I ventured into Baby Grace, Pure Grace, Falling in Love, but the Grace's were my favorite and only perfumes, now they're gone, I beg you to get the old formula. WE beg you! I was, like so many, your biggest fans and supporters, but now, it's all gone. Please!
I bought myself Pure Grace for Christmas and had to return it because it was THAT bad - I'm sorry to be so harsh, but you need to change it before the empire crumbles
Title: i feel like my pet died :(

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: This is a beautiful fragrance that is subtle and not overdone. it would be a great fragrance for anyone who doesn't usually like a heavy perfume. i work with a lot of people who tend to be sensitive to fragrance due to asthma and allergies, but i've never had anyone complain about amazing grace. in fact, i've had many compliments, even from those who are most sensitive. when i wear this one, i feel very girly and just overall happy. it makes me think of pinks and flowers, but it is not overly floral, which is great for me because i don't tend to like a lot of floral scents. amazing grace would be great for gifts because i think it tends to please a wide range of people.
Title: subtle and elegant

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I have to agree with the other reviewers. This was an all time favorite of mine. I used to get all kinds of compliments because it is a truly beautifully feminine scent that transcends all occasions. with the last bottle I recently bought, I noticed that i had to use a lot more of the product to achieve the level of concentration i was accustomed to. i am not one who needs to fill up the room with my scent, by any means. a few dabs here and there and i am usually good to go. on top of that, the scent does not even last me until lunch time. i am definitely disappointed as i fear the formulation must have changed.
Title: beautiful fragrance, for a little while

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: this is philosophy's answer to women desiring the scent of the shower gel to be captured in a spray fragrance. amazing grace is a fragrance that is so clean and pleasant, but very hard to describe to anyone. it's not perfumey, but light and feminine. this spray fragrance has average lasting power. it can be applied in morning and you can still smell a little of it by early afternoon. I often give this to my mother, although I get the larger sizes. in my opinion, this smells as good as (if not better than) the eau de parfum and spray parfum (although those are both great, too!). Ladies, you won't be disappointed!
Title: amazing grace as it should be

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: The Amazing Grace fragrance by Philosophy is my favorite one, and it mixes really well with my body chemistry. The only reason I did not give it a 5 star rating is because it doesn't last and must be reapplied during the day. Therefore, I always carry a bottle of it in my purse. But my gosh, it is still simply a heavenly floral scent in my book and apparently others, as well--despite not lasting for hours and hours. Before I run into shop, I always give myself another little spray of my favorite fragrance. It hardly ever fails that strangers (both men and women) come up to me and ask what fragrance I'm wearing.
Title: I adore this fragrance

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText:
My friends, family, and co-workers who are ( and have been for a long time ) Philosophy fans are terribly disappointed and even disgusted. As prices are about the same, the quality of our beloved products has gone downhill.
Amazing Grace (and Summer Grace) especially seem "watered down". our Eau De Toilette and even the eau de parfum fragrance is almost non existent with no noticeable scent at all within an hour!! How can the company allow this to happen?!
In reading reviews from several websites across the world, this is an ongoing issue that needs to be addressed.
Sadly, Coty and the Philosophy Brand will lose millions of dollars in business as customers find new favorites.
Title: not what it used to be

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I have worn Amazing Grace since the 1990's. It's always been my "go to", especially in the summer. Sadly, I think I have to throw in the towel. My last few purchases from QVC have been sheer disappointments. The fragrance doesn't last more than a few minutes. I used to layer by using the scrub or body wash, the lotion, and finally, the fragrance. When I'd take my clothes off, 12 hours later, I could still smell the fragrance. Now? Absolutely nothing. I haven't received a compliment on AG in years (used to get them daily). I'm done. My money is too hard earned to waste on a company that doesn't value quality.
Title: Alas, I think I need to throw in the towel

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I have been using amazing grace for sometime, and loved it. Everyone complimented me on it. I ran out and didn't reorder for awhile. Recently I placed an order for the spray cologne and the hand soap. What a disappointment!!! The soap smells like falling in love, and the fragrance smelled like rubbing alcohol. I was so sad. So I resorted to ordering from ebay, hoping maybe someone had the "old" version, but it was the Same thing, I guess philosophy has changed the formula. I really can't understand all the great reviews. Also reviews on QVC say the same thing. I am really sad, that was my favorite fragrance.
Title: Never again

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I have always loved amazing i have used the lotions, body spritz, and now the perfume. I expected more from the perfume. The body speitz seems to linger longer and stay on much longer than this. I have to constantly spray perfum in myself to keep the scent on me. The scent is still the same but the lasting is terrible it goes awsy within an hour and a half. Wish the perfume was of much better quality since it costs similar to other department store perfumes. In short, i love the scent but i am not satisfied at all with the short durance of only two hours tops and that's pushing it. Another thkng i am not the type that likes strong nose stinging scents so i am not asking for much.
Title: Great but wish it lasted longer

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: would i recommend it to a friend? not so much. my mom? definitely. this fragrance reminds me of my mother, which is not a bad thing, i just don't like it for myself. it smells nice, it just really evokes a motherly, nurturing, almost matronly feeling. i'm 28, and don't want to feel matronly just yet. that being said, this is the only amazing grace product i don't love. something about the spray fragrance just translates differently on my skin than the rest of the product line. so don't let a dislike for this product stop you from trying the rest - the emulsion, scrub, and 3 in 1 are particularly wonderful
Title: not so amazing as the rest of the line

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText:
i HAVE BEEN PURCHASING aMAZING gRACE FOR MY DAUGHTER AND i FOR 4 OR MAYBE 5 YEAR. i GIVE IT TO HER TWICE A YEAR AT cHRISTMAS AND BIRTHDAY- SHE AND i BOTH LOVE THE SMELL AND HAVE RECEIVED MANY, MANY COMPLIMENTS ON HOW GREAT WE SMELL. hOWEVER, I noticed last year that the smell no longer stay as it has in the past- has their been a change int his product? has it been diluted in some manner? I do not consider this to be an inexpensive spray fragrance but at this time I do not think I am getting the product I have paid for- In the past I would have given this product a 5 but as of today, no way.In the past I would definitely recommended this to a friend but as of today, no way

sincerely,
Title: DISAPPOINTED

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I have ordered Amazing Grace for many years. My signature scent. Sadly I ran out and ordered recently and it was not the same. It smelled of alcohol and could not recognize the scent. Sadly had to return it thinking it was a faulty bottle but they said it wasn't. Since they became Coty, something changed. I know that now. I saw reviews but didn't believe it. I rarely ever write bad reviews but for a perfume that was my scent, I am deeply saddened to know that I may never be able to buy the original Amazing Grace. I do like the oil still, still smells the same to me but this spray was a huge let down. Unrecognizable scent. It just smelled like alcohol. I'm going to try to find one from ebay.
Title: Amazing Grace is not longer the same

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: i have worn amazing grace scented lotion and spray for about 5 years. this is indeed my scent. everyday one of my co-workers steps in my doorway, takes a deep breath and says "you smell wonderful!" ironically i have worn this scent so long i can't smell it, but i get many compliments that i smell clean, fresh, feminine and just great! this scent can be layered without becoming overwhelming so i also use the shower gel before the lotion and spray. I love it and will probably never change because it is also a friendly scent to me even though i cannot tolerate most perfumes or scented lotion. other brands make me sneeze and my eyes itch and burn. amazing grace is very "sensitive user friendly".
Title: people say "you smell wonderful!"

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I bought a bottle of Amazing Grace approximately 6 months ago for the first time in years and also found that it didn't last like it used to. I put it aside for about 2 months and tried it again. It was perfect. I can still smell its beautiful scent on clothing I've washed multiple times, and my entire closet now retains the former stronger scent. It lasts on my skin just the way it did years ago. I think letting it sit for awhile did something (?) because it smells just like it used to once again. Just ordered the 4 oz. bottle and plan to repeat my new routine to see if it works once more.
Title: Figured out issue with scent

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I've been a philosophy fan for several years ever since I got hooked on Pure Grace. lAST SPRING A CO-WORKER HAD ON A LOVELY SCENT - i ALWAYS KNEW SHE WAS AROUND BECAUSE THE SCENT LINGERED IN THE HALLWAY. i ASKED HER WHAT SHE WAS WEARING, AND SHE SAID aMAZING gRACE! I IMMEDIATELY WENT TO MY DESK AND ORDERED THE LARGE SPRAY BOTTLE AND LARGEST BODY LOTION AVAILABLE! wELL, THE LOTION IS STILL GOING STRONG, BUT THE SPRAY BOTTLE IS DONE. sO TODAY MY FIRST ORDER OF BUSINESS AT WORK IS TO REPLENISH - AND i MEAN THE PERFUME, THE SPRAY AND THE PURSE SIZE SPRAY TOO. cAN'T WAIT UNTIL THEY ARRIVE!
Title: Amazing Grace is my new favorite Philosophy scent!

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: This has been the ONLY frangrance i have worn for years. the last time i purchased it, the fragrance smelled different, and not in a good way, but fortunately did not last long. I pulled out my AG spritz that I had purchased over a year ago, and it still smells like the beautiful fragrance I remember. I guess when it is gone there will be no more AG for me. I will not purchase it again. I'm looking for a new fragrance now. Between this and the airbrush makeup container change, I'm gone Philosophy. I've been a customer for many years, but this does it. Searching for another line!
Title: what a difference!

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: For years this was my signature scent - and I received compliments DAILY, even from men who normally never noticed. I gave it as gifts, recommended it to friends and happily enlightened all those people who asked what I was wearing. Then, something changed and the products is not nearly as good - the scent doesn't last and the only time anyone notices it is if they are hugging me. So sad to have ruined a perfect products - for what? A few pennies saved? No longer worth the price. I still wear it because I dislike most other scents - but no longer recommend or give as gifts.
Title: sadness

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: amazing grace is universally beautiful. women in my family who are scent sensitive adore this scent even. i do think that it lasts, but it isn't an overwhelming blast of scent, its a very soft scent which is its understated beauty. like that simple little black dress that can be dressed up or down, or the simple string of pearls that goes with everything from a well worn sweater to an evening gown..amazing grace enhances YOU rather than being the showcase. you will get more compliments like "you smell so good!" rather than "what perfume is that?" it is timeless and classic.
Title: amazing grace is a classic beauty!

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I received a sample of this and was excited to try it based on the loyal fan base and my love of philosophy skincare products. I must say I was unplesantly surprised. I had read another review who described it as "smelling matronly", and she was spot on. It was just not for me. I prefer lighter citrus, fruit or vanilla scents. This is a light, fresh floral with almost baby powder tone. Honestly, it smells like a bingo game at the nursing home I used to work at. I went on to sniff the other grace perfumes and found the whole line just have that powdery, floral, matronly tone to it. Two stars for the fact that it is a nice fragrance if you like this type of scent, but definitely not a universal scent for everyone.
Title: Not a fan of the Grace frangances

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: i first received this as a sample, but ended up buying a bottle because it smells so pretty and i can't stand overpowering strong perfumes (which this is not). this products is so unique. it smells so good, fresh and clean, and yet has such staying power! it's amazing! my youngest daughter kept asking me what i was wearing after she smelled it and she ended up buying some for herself and then buying the body wash cleanser as well. we've both have people asking us what we're wearing all the time. wear it and you'll get lots of compliments. wonderful products as well.
Title: not overpowering yet long lasting and pretty

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText:
I don't describe notes well & usually have a hard time with some florals, but nothing about amazing grace could be considered offensive.

I wear most of the graces. Pure grace is my favorite, but that doesn't take away from amazing grace. I use this scent when I want to feel more feminine, be a little more noticed & smell soft and subtle.

I receive the most compliments in this scent.

Philosophy isn't made to smack you over the head and drag you out the door with a sniffer punch. It is meant to be a special treat for the person you allow into your personal space.
Title: most wearable floral

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I have used this product for years because after buying many other fragrances which I thought were too overpowering finally found this which I loved because of it's light,clean scent. I get so many compliments on it ever though I can never smell it on myself. A Sales rep came to my office one day and I asked her what scent she was wearing because it just smelled so good. When she told me it was "amazing grace", I said "Oh, now I know what I smell like, and I love it". She said she also could never smell it on herself but always receives compliments on it. Whenever I see my 30-year old daughter and she goes to hug me, she always says "mmmm, love my mommy's scent". I will probably continue to use it for the rest of my life.

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I WAS SO EXCITED ABOUT TRYING AMAZING GRACE WHEN i first saw IT ON QVC.tHEY WENT ON AND ON about IT'S GREAT SMELL. AND AFTER i READ ALL THE REVIEWS ON HOW THIS PRODUCT WAS THE BEST SMELL I HAD TO TRY IT.BUT WHEN I FINALLY RECIVED IT IN THE MAIL,I WAS NOT IMPRESSED AT ALL. PARDON ME BUT, IT SMELLS LIKE OLD LADY.IT HAS AN ALCohol SMELL AT FIRST THEN A MUSKY STRONG SORT OF GARDENIA SMELL.THEN THE SMELL ONLY LASTed ABOUT 20 MINUTES AND IT was GONE.YOU DON'T SMELL IT ANYMORE.THIS PRODUCT IS EXPENSIVE AND WAY OVERRATED.ALTHTOUGH i DID ORDER THE FIELd OF FLOWERS SHOwER CREAM AND IT SMELLS DELICIOUS! i LOVED THAT! it smells so good! so I'll definetly buy more of the field of flowers! I guess it all winds down to matter of opinion....
Title: Not Impressed

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: i love fragrances. i own and adore all of philosophy's fragrances, but amazing grace is my favorite. there's something about it that touches me every single time i wear it. it's flowery, fresh, musky, and energizing. this fragrance seems to have an uplifting effect not just on me, but on the many, many people who have gone out of their way over the years to compliment my lovely scent. After showering, shampooing, lotioning, and spraying amazing grace, i feel like i'm radiating energy like sunshine on the first day of spring. it's truly a beautiful fragrance.
Title: absolutely beautiful

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I can not tell you how disappointed I’ve been with this perfume. Yes, it smells wonderful-for about 5 minutes. It is a fresh, light, clean feminine scent but this perfume has no lasting power! I used it alone, layered it with other Amazing grace scented products, but couldn’t smell the scent after a few minutes. I know I will never buy the perfume again-the other products in this line have other redeeming qualities that would keep me coming back, but I feel that my money can be invested in other perfumes that are going to smell fresh and bright, all day.
Title: where is the scent?

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: i love this spray fragrance, i has such a beautiful, clean smell, perfect for everyday. I hate strong scents that can be smelled from a far distance. I have been a huge fan of baby grace and have worn only bg for the last 6 or more years but just recently i bought the ag shower gel and loved the scent right away, so i went out and bought the ag spray fragrance and am so pleased. it smells so good, i alternate with bg now. it has a light clean scent that is nice layered with the shower gel and lotion but not overpowering, which i love. highly recommend!!
Title: great everyday fragrance

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I got a sample of the Amazing Grace lotion with an order I had received. I really like the lotion, so I didn't hesitate to buy the biggest bottle of the perfume. The scent lasts for about a half an hour on the body. This is my first fragrance purchase as I only have used Philosophy skin care products & it will be the last. There really is no point in using it as the fragrance is totally gone within the hour after application. I have never experience such a weak perfume in my life. Waste of money!! The lotion lasts much longer. I am really disappointed.
Title: Why bother?

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I created an account just to write this review so I hope you see this, Philosophy! The last time I purchased this was December of 2012 and I loved it. I recently went to repurchase and was highly disappointed. I smelled the tester and thought maybe it was so old that it went bad, so I smelled the other testers (3 other sprays and shower gel) they all smelled the same. Needless to say I did not purchase it. I like the Philosophy brand, I regularly purchase from QVC and am currently using their purity line. However, I am concerned that if they changed their best perfume they will also change other products and that just is not acceptable to me (unless they are improving it, which they did not with AG). I'm begging you, change it back!
Title: Disappointed

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: This was my first Philosophy scent that I ever tried and it was a gift for signing up for emails, over a year ago. Since then I have stocked up on this scent (gel,spray,lotion,solid). it is my signature scent the one that is a sure winner. It is light and airy not too floral, not too mature in strength, just a simple girly feel to it. I have found that the spray is stronger at first when you spray but does not have that great of staying power- thus the need to layer. the body butter scent stays longer in my opinion than the spray or spritz- love it.
Title: Amazing and pretty

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: It took me a long time to try amazing grace fragrance, still clinging to my expensive fancy schmantsy perfumes. I thought how can this be so great at this price. i tried it, and now (along with Philosophy's falling in love) is the only fragrance i'll use. i have never had so many people actually stop me wherever i am and tell me that i smell so good, or they ask me what i'm wearing. typically, it's "you smell wonderful." i would recommend this to anyone who wants to smell feminine, and enjoys attention. you'll get it when wearing amazing grace.
Title: my signature fragrance

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: i discovered this scent during my third pregnancy and I fell in love with it (and the entire philosphy line) as a result! It was the only fragrance I could wear that didn't offend my pregnant nose. Clean, fresh and feminine with the added benefit for me of a delightful scent memory....the smell takes me back to the joy that I felt while expecting! my only wish is that it lasted longer on the skin. I layer numerous amazing grace products and can't smell it very long. REgardless, i will be a philosophy customer for life thanks to amazing grace!
Title: Amazingly agreeable scent!

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I'm buying my second bottle of Amazing Grace fragrance. I can imagine this being my signature scent. I've heard customers on qvc say that they always get compliments from people while wearing this fragrance, well......it's true!!!! I do too. My coworkers and family love this. It's very light and fresh. My 7 year old son and 11 year old daughter could wear this and it was suit them just fine. I really love that i smell great to people, but not like any department store perfumes.......Amazing grace is very different. I absolutely love it :)
Title: A very soft, feminine scent

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: This was the first fragrance i ever purchased over t.v.- got it home and now this is a fragrance i won't be without. i tend to go for sweeter frangrances, much like falling in love- which i also love! but this one was so different. it has the lightest floral hue mixed with natural clean-don't be scared by the floral because I am not a floral girl-but i can't put my finger on that something that makes this one a step beyond clean. it makes you feel feminine, classy, and fresh all in one. i'm 31 and my mom is 67 & we both love it!
Title: Fragrance for life

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText:
I originally ordered this just before I underwent surgery. I knew it was going to be a very long recovery and that I needed something to pick me up every day -- this definitely does that. Buying this fragrance was the best thing I did. Once i take my shower with amazing grace wash, put on the lotion and fragrance, I feel so much better and can start my day with a much better outlook. My physical therapist loved the fragrance also!

Since then i've bought this fragrance for people who need a little pick-me-up and it does the job!
Title: i love it!

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I love this fragrance. i started with pure grace like 8 years ago, but as i've gotten older i like the girly hint to this fragrance. my husband loves it and always comments on how good i smell. what i love about philosophys fragrances is that they arent "prefumy". they automatically smell like part of you. you will never leave that wake of smell in your trail like some people. you smell fresh, clean, feminine and happy. this fragrance always puts a smile on my face. (i also like to spray a little in my hair between washings :-)
Title: light, fresh and feminine

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: Ever since I started wearing this fragrance everyday someone tells me "you smell so good!" I have had my mailman even ask what I am wearing. I have had people say.."i love to hug you because then that smell is on me the rest of the day." I must say when I first started using this I thought it wasn't very long lasting..but apparently, i was wrong. it is clean, crisp, not over powering..yet...powerful enough to make a statement. I love this product and wish they would make a deoderant...so we could have the complete package! :)
Title: YOU SMELL SO GOOD!

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText:
Very surprised. Have stayed away from perfumes for years, they were just too loud and overpowering. I had absolutely no interest in trying any of them.
Well, after hearing all the raves on tv, and hearing christina carlino explain how it was made to be soft, and closer to aromatherapy oils, which i love, i wandered into the mall and delivered a tiny spritz on my wrist...i was totally hooked! I couldn't stop breathing in the fragrance on my wrist and was obsessed with going back, i had to have it right away!
I adore this!!!!
Title: just beautiful!

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: Amazing Grace has always been my go to signature scent. The bottle that I purchased last week makes me want to cry.I knew the second I sprayed it on that it was not the same. It is weak and has no staying power , and the scent is just different. I wanted to make sure it wasn't just me so I went on line and discovered that a lot of loyal wearers are experiencing the same thing. Your ruined a classic. Please consider changing it back. I am returning this bottle and will be searching for something new, which breaks my heart.
Title: Amazing Grace- No longer Amazing :-(

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I recently had to purchase a new bottle - I had a ton from before the purchase - I read the reviews but I thought maybe it would just depend on everyone's own body chemistry, etc. Boy, was I wrong. I used to get compliments all the time. My friend who loved it on me asked why I stopped wearing it and I had just put it on a few hours before. Title: So so sad

ReviewText: i normally wear summer grace, and i bought the small bottle of amazing grace to travel with. through moving, putting together furniture, and sweating through amusement parks, one spray of this lasts! instead of smelling stinky, i smell like amazing grace - not too strong, not too perfumey, but a light, sweet beautiful scent. i definitely describe this scent as graceful - it is light, but you can definitely smell the classic scent :)

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: i absolutely love this fragrance. as soon as i smell it, it is instantly calming to me. I know that may sound silly, but for me, it truly does bring about a feeling of instant peace. i battled breast cancer last year (at the age of 39) and amazing grace was with me through the entire ordeal. it quickly became my signature fragrance. i just want to thank christina and everyone at philosophy for creating such a wonderful fragrance.
Title: my saving grace

ReviewText: I was a little hesitant to buy the Amazing Grave fragrance as most of the reviews were that the product used to be much better in the past and not so much now. I find it very subtle but he swears he can smell me from across the room and loves the clean fresh fragrance. ♡
Title: Pleasently surprised ☺

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText:
The last 42 reviews have been 1 star ratings.
While it may be true to the 84% rating, it's only because the other 209 reviews were from July 2008 to March 2012, when the scent was the original. Amazing Grace is really no longer Amazing Grace. In 3 years they have gone from a 5 star product to a 1 star product. We loyal customers are noticing and hope for a return to the original. But the key question is: Is Philosophy noticing?
Title: Does Philosophy Listen?

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText:
the amazing grace spray fragrance was the first product i ever used from philosophy, and it set my expectations for many more products to come. there is just something so wonderful about the amazing grace fragrance .. it makes you feel clean and fresh, soft and feminine, and happy all at the same time! every time i wear it, it never fails to elicit a complement from friends and strangers. it is soft enough not to overpower the senses of others around you, yet just enough that people standing or sitting close to you can notice it.

to me, amazing grace represents that soft clean freshness that we all want to have, yet balanced with a delicate floral note. it layers so well with the shower gels and lotions, yet it is never overbearing or distracting to others. when i layer this scent, i get a lot more hugs from my friends because they love the fragrance so much!
Title: amazing grace fragrance

Title: Beautiful!

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I had used this for over 10 years and absolutely loved it. It was my signature fragrance and I received many compliments. In the last couple of years the scent seemed to have changed and doesn't have any staying power. And yes, I would layer it with the shower gel and perfumed body emulsion...and it still didn't last for more than an hour. I used to be able to still smell the fragrance on me at the end of the day, and even the laundry smelled good! Yes, the fragrance was that good. It was extremely soft, clean, feminine and beautiful, never cloying or overpowering. I have also tried the eau de parfum instead of the spray fragrance. It still didn't have the staying power it used to years ago. I am sad...Nothing smells like the original amazing grace. I still use the body emulsion but not the perfume/fragrance spray. I am hesitant to try other fragrances due to my sensitivity and issues with migraines. I really just wish this fragrance hadn't changed so much for the worse.

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I've been devoted to this fragrance for at least 15 years and purchased countless bottles. However, every time the company has been bought and sold, the quality of the product and scent has suffered. Amazing Grace was there for me at my wedding, the birth of my child, times of heartbreak, times of joy, and everything in between. But now it's barely recognizable. I keep hoping the company will actually listen to its customers and go back to what we all fell in love with, but all they do is claim nothing has changed. I'm not an idiot, I know when something doesn't smell or wear like it has for years and years. The final straw for me was hugging my little girl and her telling me I don't smell like mommy anymore. There's no point in spraying a little on one of her stuffed animals to comfort her because it's not the same, she doesn't recognize it. I don't think I'll ever find something to replace my beloved Amazing Grace and I'll miss having a signature scent that is such a special part of my life. What a shame.

Title: smells like alcohol now

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I happened to read all of the negative reviews about AG here and, while I'm not surprised, I'm very disappointed that the company isn't listening. I wrote a negative review on the QVC site (as that is where I purchased my fragrance sets) and it was never posted. I felt bad that I had to write such negative comments but now I see that I'm not wrong...and I'm not alone. AG was introduced to change the way we feel about fragrance...and it did all that and more. It, truly, was amazing...but not any more. So I came to the Philosophy site to order, hoping that I would have better luck if it shipped right from the company, but not so. I ordered a trio set of Graces over the holidays and it took months for me to adjust to the "new" fragrances. With the exception of Fresh Cream, because it's new, the Falling In Love and AG are not what they used to be. FIL used to be absolutely DELICIOUS and AG was just that...amazingly clean and pretty. I'm not getting compliments anymore, but it's still the only line I can wear. While I'm learning to accept the new scents, I MISS the originals!

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: Recently I did something completely out of character. I ordered the Amazing Grace Christmas set on-line from Ulta, without even knowing what it smelled like. I don't know what came over me, as I am usually the type to extensively research and sample just about anything before I actually purchase it. For the next week leading up to receiving the package in the mail, I was second guessing my decision. To my delight, however, I was more than pleasantly surprised. First, I find the simple, yet elegant packaging so beautiful. Secondly, I absolutely L-O-V-E the way that this stuff smells, it is truly heavenly! It is airy, feminine, and subtle. Third of all, the set that I ordered came with perfume, a shampoo, bath & shower gel combo, and whipped body cream. I love all three products; the whipped body cream is so soft and rich, yet it is not at all greasy. I'd say that the only draw back that I've found is that it does have a tendency to wear off as the day goes on. I think that I will see if the AG scent is available in a roller ball so that I can keep it in my purse and use it as a touch up later on in the day.

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: Amazing Grace is one of the most pleasant, beautiful fragrances I have ever smelled. It is one of those things where you smell it and you feel such a harmony with it, that it automatically feels like "you." There is nothing to fight or get used to in this fragrance. It's a really pretty soft floral that reads as pure clean. It's so easy-going and fresh, that it smells like someone could actually be possible of smelling like this...instead of someone smelling like they're wearing fragrance. This ageless scent would be appropriate for any woman, for anywhere, at anytime. The reason for the 4 stars is the spray fragrance has little staying power for me personally. I hate to give what is to me one of the best fragrances on the planet less than 5 stars, but I just feel it misses the mark a bit if I can't smell it on me shortly after spraying, and people in my life can't smell it on me either (I've asked!). However, the fragrance of Amazing Grace is so wonderful and heaven-sent that I continue to use it, always hoping it will last a little longer. It is a truly, one-of-a-kind fragrance worthy of the name it was given!

Title: What happened?

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText:
amazing grace will never go out of style. it's so clean, fresh, feminine, and elegant, i can't ever imagine being without it!

it's a delicate mix of light florals - not at all strong or overpowering. it makes me feel so feminine and beautiful whenever i wear it. i never fail to get compliments whenever i wear philosophy - especially amazing grace!

a lot of people say the fragrances don't last. i always layer with lotions and the spritzes, so maybe that's why i never have a problem...but I do think a lot of people fail to realize the concept of "habituation." this is when your body stops responding to stimuli that you are constantly exposed to, because there's no reason to waste attentive resources on something your body deems is safe and not a threat.

this is especially true for scents. so a lot of people might not be able to smell it on themselves, but may be surprised when a few hours later someone sniffs and says "oh my gosh! you smell amazing!" yes, your perfume is still working! another way to test this out is to wet your arm or see if you can smell it as soon as you get in the shower that night. the water will slightly change the chemistry of your skin, forcing the fragrance to react a little differently to it and will cause your senses to be more aware of it.

philosophy scents are just so subtle and light that they simply become a part of you. that's what i adore about them, and i will never stop using philosophy scents. amazing grace is one i go to constantly, and it never fails to instantly lift me up, boost my self-esteem, and put a confident smile on my face.
Title: a classic

Description: embrace your beauty, and express your femininity with amazing grace spray fragrance. our best-selling, amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: philosophy has done an excellent job on this one, and their description of the perfume is pretty on-the-money. this fragrance really captures the essence of femininity. I hate to say that since there are so many other perfumes out there that claim to be "ultimately feminine", but this one stands out from the crowd despite its simplistic packaging and surprisingly plain description. no bogus notes of "crisp velvet bergamot, tantalizing ylang ylang, or a grandmother smoking in the 1950's with a musky cloud of perfume, or spring allergy worthy extracts of patchouli and gardenia, or amazon rainforest accord" and the list of ridiculous things goes on and on, none of which give any indication of what the darn stuff smells like! no. not at all. this perfume is a beautiful and simple blend of subtle, just-showered clean, pure, soft musk, and just a hint of suggested rain drops of flower petals wrapped in a baby pink bow woven out of the threads of femininity. sounds crazy, but to me that's what it smells like. Yet the scent is anything but straightforward; there's something about it that's so pleasant and simple but at the same time I can't put my finger on it for the life of me. It doesn't lean too far in any particular direction; I wouldn't only characterize it as sweet, floral, fruity, clean, spicy, musky, oriental, or any of the fragrance classifications out there. This eau de toilette stands alone in a category of its own. It's perfectly suited for all ages; there's something a little mature but not old lady in there, but also a fresh burst of youth without the cup cakey-candy scent of a twelve year old. it's not at all over powering, and i've found that most people really do like it; it won't remind you or those around you of the smell of your laundry basket, give you a floral migraine, choke you with sugary sweetness, blow out your sinuses with spice, or nauseate you with a blast of fruit bombs. amazing grace gives you a mood-boost of energy; when you smell this i guarantee you'll be happy. this perfume needs more love!!!
Title: The perfect scent for any woman

Description: A radiant jewel dressed in a delicate gradation of powdery pink to violet scintillates with multiple reflections. At its neck, a nighttime rose with satiny purple petals has just bloomed under the iconic Trésor diamond-cut cap.
ReviewText: I've been searching for a new perfume for months now. I wanted something light and feminine; nothing overpowering. As soon as I tried Midnight Rose I knew it was exactly what I was looking for. It has just the slightest hints of floral and fruits which fades into a nice vanilla as the day goes on. My only complaint is that the scent doesn't last as long as I would hope. After a few hours the scent fades away and another spritz is needed to refresh. Still my new favourite though (all-time fav actually). I would definitely recommend.

Product Name: Daisy Dream Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: For the girl who dares to dream.  Daisy Dream is both floral and fruity. The fragrance captivates with delectable top notes of blackberry, fresh grapefruit and succulent pear. The heart imparts a rich, feminine jasmine, notes of lychee and blue wisteria. A dreamy dry down of white woods, musks and coconut water.
ReviewText: I bought this perfume for myself in December 2015, and it is still one of my favourite fragrances I own.  The bottle is gorgeous, and I love the way the white flowers look with the blue liquid.  The scent is classic floral, and it has good staying power without being overwhelming.  If you're considering buying it, go for it!  It's one of those scents where you really can't go wrong.
Title: A Classic, Feminine Scent

Product Name: Daisy Dream Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: For the girl who dares to dream.  Daisy Dream is both floral and fruity. The fragrance captivates with delectable top notes of blackberry, fresh grapefruit and succulent pear. The heart imparts a rich, feminine jasmine, notes of lychee and blue wisteria. A dreamy dry down of white woods, musks and coconut water.
ReviewText: Ever since first sniff, I have been a fan of this perfume. I do not like strong, cloying perfumes so this was the perfect addition to my fragrance collection. Its light and fresh and wears well ... I find that I prefer this over the original daisy perfume. I could do without the large price tag, but it's worth it!
Title: One of My Favourites!

She loved it (really) and, coincidentally enough, was a perfume that her sister-in-law uses everyday. It is a very lovely scent, sweet but substantial enough not to be too fluffy.

Product Name: Daisy Dream Eau de Toilette Spray

ReviewText: This is a solid extension to the Daisy line but I still find that it smells like a Bath and Body Works scent. It has strong fruity notes so it is still very refreshing but I find the blackberries unbalanced. Its more of an entry fragrance for the younger clientele Marc Jacobs tends to court with his scents.

Description:
SEVEN is the new premium addition to the 007 Fragrances range. A fragrance with carefully selected ingredients and a bold, sleek appearance.

The top notes of this scent have a striking citrus quality, led by sweet Tangerine and followed by sharp Bergamot and crisp Apple.  The heart of the fragrance rapidly unfolds with a domination of spices; Cinnamon, Saffron and White Pepper to ignite the senses.  Smooth Amber, Vanilla and Musk combine with Caramel at the base of this fragrance. These ingredients are enriched by Leather, dark Mahogany, Cedar wood and Sandalwood.
ReviewText: Surprisingly weak considersing the description uses words like 'bold' and 'striking'. Mostly a fall/winter scent you'd need to freshen yourself at least 3-6 times in a day with Seven, not great considering some aftershaves have a longer lasting scent. However the top-note smells of apple are wonderful, with a dry down of leather and musk.  While it smells quite nice, I can't reccommend buying Seven purely on the basis of you'd use it up in a heartbeat just to smell it yourself, not worth the price when you can buy much better, long lasting colognes with a similar smell.
Title: A Short-lived Agent

Description:
Thierry Wasser composed his bouquet like a florist, with a light, exuberant touch, to encapsulate the idea of the idyll, a joyous light-hearted romance. He had to measure every drop to achieve the perfect harmony, to arouse unprecedented and unforgettable sensations through the power of scent. In this combination of the chypre sensuality and the intimate facet of white musks with the bouquet of flowers, the symbol of a declaration of love, he manages to express the sensuous and romantic idea of the idyll.

This fragrance merited a masterpiece. Ora-ïto, the iconoclast and visionary designer, designed for Idylle a tear of joy and feminine happiness, a love drop, a golden drop.
ReviewText: I smelled this perfume on a friend and instantly fell in love, a bold scent when first applied but then that subtly lingers throughout the day. Love it!
Title: Unique and inviting scent

ReviewText: This perfume is a huge no for me personally. When I smelt this, I immediately didn't like it as I knew I've smelt this scent somewhere before and not in a perfume but in a hair product. So I hours later I smelt it again and couldn't figure out what it was that it reminded me of, then suddenly it hit me. As I am a big "Lushie" myself I realised the scent was a spot on copy of Lush's "Daddy-o" purple shampoo! Which I hated the smell of lol. Though the notes of the scents are not similar it still smells like it. So if you like that shampoo from lush then you'll love this perfume!.
Title: For LUSH lovers!

ReviewText: Like the previous two reviewers, I have been wearing Tresor for a long time...probably 30 years! I have never found anything I like more. I too get lots of compliments. When I worked, even coworkers who had serious allergies to scents told me they had no problem with mine. They loved it too.

ReviewText: I have been wearing Tresor Eau de Parfumerie for over 20 years! It is my signature scent and I receive so many compliments on how delicious it smells on me. Wearing Tresor makes me feel very feminine and sensual. It's the finishing touch and my favourite accessory!

ReviewText: There is something about this fragrance that pulls you in. I use it on special occasions
Title: seductive

Description: Burberry Body is a feminine and sensual floral-woody fragrance with an eclectic combination of luxurious, refined notes. Like a precious iconic trench coat wrapped around a woman's body.
ReviewText: I have been using this perfume daily for over 3 years now! It is truly a one of a kind fragrance! I have been through two medium sized bottles of the original perfume as well as a large of the intense version and I can easily say this is my most loved and go to fragrance for not only day to day but a night out as well. The scent is so wonderful and unique it is almost indescribable! It is very much a woody, sensual, warm and comforting scent but there is also a nice freshness to it! The notes in this fragrance balance beautifully with each other! This fragrance complements my body chemistry perfectly, I put on a spray or two each day after my shower and If I am going out later in the day I will put on an extra spritz. It is definitely a smell that lingers very nicely and does not change throughout the day or fade in a way that is unappealing. I have worn this fragrance year round and feel as though it is one that never clashes with the changes of the seasons. I do find the intense version to be good for year round as well but that version is especially great during the cooler fall and winter months as it is just as described, a more intense version of itself which makes it an even deeper comforting scent! This fragrance is also very sentimental to me as I began wearing this when I met and began dating my boyfriend, he always complimented how beautifully I smelled when I wore this perfume. I would recommend anyone who loves a unique or sensual fragrance to give this one a try! Burberry fragrances have always been staples in my vast collection but this is one that will forever be my day to day!
Title: Unique Fragrance

Description: Chrome celebrates joie de vivre and true feelings, paying tribute to the unwavering complicity that unites father and son. A fragrance that encapsulates the sense of getting away from it all, with its invigorating, soothing and sleek freshness; a smooth, complicit freshness (citrus, white musk notes) combined with the green and aquatic notes of adventure, and the comfort of a woody tea accord (sandalwood, amber, mate).
ReviewText: I bought this as a gift for my dad and he loves it. He gets a lot of compliments when he is wearing it.
Title: Love the smell of this

Product Name: Bright Crystal Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: The name Versace is synonymous with the ultimate in fashion and cosmetic beauty. The Versace collection is natural and refined, chic and sporty, modern and feminine, sexy and glamorous. Versace Bright Crystal is created for the Versace woman who is strong and confident yet feminine, sensual and always glamorous. A fragrance that is inviting, fresh and floral and captured in a bottle of timeless elegance.
ReviewText: This is my scent for going to mall, watch move in theatre, going for ice cream in hot summer evening. The smell of this Versace is bold! This is my 3rd bottle.
Title: Love the bottle

ReviewText: Versace - Bright Crystal is so beautiful, if you love floral, soft, sexy and just perfect on strength -  not too strong and yet lingers for hours after putting it on, you have found an awesome scent.  Amazing notes have been blended to create a scent like no other.  People will turn their heads and/or ask what I am wearing. I have had more compliments on this perfume than any other and have been wearing perfume for 35 years.  Having said that, this perfume is truly for any age. If you want something breathtaking in scent, you want to be noticed and complimented, this is definately one for your list.

Description: Prada Parfums introduce Prada Candy Kiss – inspired by Prada Fashion’s iconic lips pattern- Prada discloses a new facet of the Prada Candy girl. Like the scent of 1,000 Prada Candy kisses, the new Prada Candy is a powdery, pure, and aerial Eau de Parfum. Top notes of Bergamote and Muguet, Musk and a base of Vanille give to this gourmand fragrance a truly unique signature.
ReviewText: This is a sweetly sensual fragrance that is perfect for a romantic evening. It's lovely and uncomplicated. Picture you or your love wearing a soft pink satin negligee and Prada Candy Kiss. Perfect!

Description: Profumo by Giorgio Armani is the depth and intensity of the Mediterranean Sea. It is sophisticated and intensely masculine, an ode to freshness as sea meets rock. It combines mineral marine notes with the intensity of frankincense and the seductiveness of patchouli. Elegant and impassioned, Profumo awakens the senses as it reflects desire. Creating simplicity from complexity. Finding harmony in the contrast of hot and cold, freshness and opacity, the blackest stone and the crystalline blue of the sea.
ReviewText: My GF just bought this for me as a gift on a whim, as I had bought her some lipstick recently as well.  WOW! Armani's Acqua-Di-gio Profumo blew us both away.  Amazing sent.  Fresh/Tight/Spectacular.  This is now my go-to daily cologne.  I can not recommend enough!
Title: Beyond Fresh

Product Name: Red Door Eau de Toilette Spray Naturel
Description:
The same classic fragrance, with a signature look. A melange of rich, rare florals.

Glamorous. Elegant. Sophisticated.
ReviewText: I later found out that the Red Door Eau de Toilette which I purchased directly from Elizabeth Arden was recently reformulated ( without any notification to the customers) and is definitely not as good as the original that I faithfully used for over 10 years. Why on earth would a company raise their price and at the same time re-formulate what was already a highly successful fragrance resulting in a higher price for a mediocre product? If the old formula does not become available, I will move on and search for a new fragrance.
Title: what a disappointment

Product Name: Red Door Eau de Toilette Spray Naturel
Description:
The same classic fragrance, with a signature look. A melange of rich, rare florals.

Glamorous. Elegant. Sophisticated.
ReviewText: I have been searching for a tasteful, feminine, classic fragrance that does not overpower those around me. (I live in the Deep South, and too much sillage is not a good thing!) Red Door Aura is perfect and balanced: bergamot keeps the floral notes from being overly sweet. It is lovely for the office, church, and social occasions, My "twenty-something" daughters will be needing their own bottles in the very near future, or mine will not last long!
Title: Simply Divine!

Product Name: Red Door Eau de Toilette Spray Naturel
Description:
The same classic fragrance, with a signature look. A melange of rich, rare florals.

Glamorous. Elegant. Sophisticated.
ReviewText: I chose Red Door Aura EDT because it sounded lighter, a bit sweeter than traditional Red Door. Sounded like a good choice for summer. Actually, it is stronger with a dusty scent (Base Notes sandalwood and musk?), not clean and fresh (Top Notes of Freesia, Raspberry and Lily not evident).  Will not purchase again.  Disappointed.   Not at any local stores for me to try it before ordering direct.

Product Name: Black Opium Eau De Parfum Spray
Description:
Discover Black Opium, the new feminine fragrance by Yves Saint Laurent. With a glam rock aesthetic, this addictive gourmand floral entices with notes of black coffee for a shot of adrenaline, white florals to instantly seduce, and vanilla for sweetness and sensuality.
Key notes: black coffee, white florals and vanilla
ReviewText:
If you are a living breathing human who likes scents then you own this perfume. You just do. It's so all encompassing that no matter whom I've spoken to loves this scent.
Worth the price but I would reccomend wearing in Fall and Winter season and having a different perfume for Spring and Summer.

Description:
Capturing the spirit of women, the Chloé vision is not about one singular woman, but rather about the rich and varied personalities of all Chloé women. This fresh, smooth floral fragrance evokes sublime powdery rose. The effect is chic, comfortable, and entirely addictive.

Top notes of pink peony, freesia, and lychee embody subtle freshness. At the heart, midnotes of magnolia flower, lily of the valley, and rose rise to sublimated femininity. A base of velvety elegance comes to fruition through cedar wood, amber, and honey.

Inspired by the details in Chloé's fashion, the flacon's heavy but softly curved and grooved glass reflects femininity and strength. The plated-silver top is embossed with the Chloé mark and adorned with a hand-tied ribbon.
ReviewText: I have never received so many compliments (from both men and women) on a perfume. People stop me all the time and ask me what I am wearing. I'm absolutely in love *hearteyes* It is a perfect scent for any occasion. If you love flowery perfumes than this is the one for you. It is pricier BUT this is an Eau de Parfum not an Eau de toilette. You don't need a lot and it lasts all day, the bottle will last a very long time. I do reapply if I am going out in the evening but other than that I only put it on in the mornings. LOVE LOVE LOVE!
Title: Holy smokes! Best perfume ever!

Description:
Capturing the spirit of women, the Chloé vision is not about one singular woman, but rather about the rich and varied personalities of all Chloé women. This fresh, smooth floral fragrance evokes sublime powdery rose. The effect is chic, comfortable, and entirely addictive.

Top notes of pink peony, freesia, and lychee embody subtle freshness. At the heart, midnotes of magnolia flower, lily of the valley, and rose rise to sublimated femininity. A base of velvety elegance comes to fruition through cedar wood, amber, and honey.

Inspired by the details in Chloé's fashion, the flacon's heavy but softly curved and grooved glass reflects femininity and strength. The plated-silver top is embossed with the Chloé mark and adorned with a hand-tied ribbon.
ReviewText: I love this, it's light and not overwhelmingly floral. It's perfect when I'm getting ready for a warm day or want to make a morning that much better.
Title: For a perfect day

Description:
Capturing the spirit of women, the Chloé vision is not about one singular woman, but rather about the rich and varied personalities of all Chloé women. This fresh, smooth floral fragrance evokes sublime powdery rose. The effect is chic, comfortable, and entirely addictive.

Top notes of pink peony, freesia, and lychee embody subtle freshness. At the heart, midnotes of magnolia flower, lily of the valley, and rose rise to sublimated femininity. A base of velvety elegance comes to fruition through cedar wood, amber, and honey.

Inspired by the details in Chloé's fashion, the flacon's heavy but softly curved and grooved glass reflects femininity and strength. The plated-silver top is embossed with the Chloé mark and adorned with a hand-tied ribbon.
ReviewText: I love this scent, I can wear it to work or on a date
Title: great scent

ReviewText: I started using this years ago and never left. It is the Go To perfume for me. Marc Jacobs Daisy came and went. So did YSL. But this! This is gold. It's a fantastic smell that lasts and noticed by SO many people - especially men. Some of my coworkers are able to name the smell right away. I'm on my 4th or 5th bottle already.
