Title: I got cmpliments from everyone about the fragrance

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Eau de Toilette
Description: A new expressive essence of happiness, La vie est belle Eau de Toilette.   MAGNOLIA HEART: The first flower to bloom at the peak of spring, Magnolia is notoriously symbolic for purity, youth and nobility. A floral gem that glistens perfection with every petal, Magnolias bloom boldly at their desire - a flower emblem bursting out that life is beautiful.   COCONUT MILK: A coconut accord woven under every note gently breathes freshness and light ,creating a fresh aroma that caresses the senses.   IRIS PALLIDA: Exquisite and true, Iris`s 6 petals emanate a savory gourmand, each petal representative of the La vie est belle decree: Joy, freedom, delicacy, purity, beauty and happiness.
ReviewText: Chanel Coco Mademoiselle had been my signature scent for years, that is, until I discovered Lancome's La Vie Est Belle! This scent is somehow magical. Every time I wear it, I get compliments (mostly from men). I don't know if it creates some kind of synergy with my particular body chemistry or what, but I'm going to continue buying and wearing it. The notes in this fragrance are lovely, starting with sweet vanilla and then morphing into a beautiful powdery, fruity, mysterious patchouli at dry down. Wow! So by the time you're enjoying a romantic dinner in some little Italian restaurant with your significant other, you smell totally sexy and intoxicating. Needless to say, it's my new Holy Grail! Thank you, Lancome!
Title: Man magnet!

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Eau de Toilette
Description: A new expressive essence of happiness, La vie est belle Eau de Toilette.   MAGNOLIA HEART: The first flower to bloom at the peak of spring, Magnolia is notoriously symbolic for purity, youth and nobility. A floral gem that glistens perfection with every petal, Magnolias bloom boldly at their desire - a flower emblem bursting out that life is beautiful.   COCONUT MILK: A coconut accord woven under every note gently breathes freshness and light ,creating a fresh aroma that caresses the senses.   IRIS PALLIDA: Exquisite and true, Iris`s 6 petals emanate a savory gourmand, each petal representative of the La vie est belle decree: Joy, freedom, delicacy, purity, beauty and happiness.
ReviewText: I ordered a 200ml bottle for my mom as her birthday present, since this has been her signature scent for a while. But as soon as I opened the box, I found the bottle cap was detached and broken to two parts, and the top nuzzle also fell off. For a 200+ dollar perfume, this is so unacceptable! I just hate to call the customer service and go through all inconvenience of returning, I have to glue the broken part together. Fortunately, the juicy inside is still as good as usual, I will just keep it myself and buy something else for my mom's birthday. I will not shop at this site again! so disappointed!
Title: bad luck or no quality control?

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Eau de Toilette
Description: A new expressive essence of happiness, La vie est belle Eau de Toilette.   MAGNOLIA HEART: The first flower to bloom at the peak of spring, Magnolia is notoriously symbolic for purity, youth and nobility. IRIS PALLIDA: Exquisite and true, Iris`s 6 petals emanate a savory gourmand, each petal representative of the La vie est belle decree: Joy, freedom, delicacy, purity, beauty and happiness.
ReviewText: I was given my first bottle as a gift and loved it, so once I ran out I got another one. Within a month it went from a pinkish color, to a gross orange color and it smelled awful! I stored it exactly the same as the last one (in a box in the cupboard at room temp). I don't know if I got a bad batch or something. I went back to where I bought it, but they said they couldn't do anything about perfumes and I'd have to contact Lancome. I'm really disappointed.
Title: Turned orange and spoiled (?) within a month

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Eau de Toilette
Description: A new expressive essence of happiness, La vie est belle Eau de Toilette. ReviewText: The first time I smelled this fragrance in a magazine strip of all places I knew I had finally found my new fragrance. This is feminine, but with just the right amount of sexy to make it a grown womans fragrance. When I walk into my room later in the evening and catch a whiff of this still in the air I can't help but inhale, I love this. If I had one caution it would be not to overdo this as a little goes a long way.
Title: Finally

Looking good and smelling great does so much for the morale, this essential scent leaves its' mark in such a feminine and noteworthy way...
Title: La Dolce Vita

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Eau de Toilette

ReviewText: Love this fragrance. I always get compliments when I wear it. It is floral and spicy at the same time. Excellent all year long as it is more floral in the summer and musky in the winter. I have tried all the variations of the original scent and although I prefer the original, the entire La Vie Est Belle line is fabulous. Long lasting but not overpowering.
Title: Always get compliments when I wear La Vie Est Belle

ReviewText: I LOVE how there is a fragrance for me that is my own when I spray it on! I will be 40 this year and I was looking for a more mature, sexy spicy, warm scent that defined me as I am. I turning a new chapter in my life. Also, I love Julia Roberts and the meaning she gave this perfume by the name of the fragrance.

ReviewText: This fragrance really is beautiful!  It is subtle, floral and feminine - but with a slight masculinity in the base notes.  The best word to describe this is to say that it is sophisticated.  This is the fragrance you keep permanently in your scent wardrobe, because it is versatile and classic.
Title: Beautiful

Description: A cult favourite scent that is sparkling and fresh. Energizing and audacious, it uplifts the mood and is ideal for the fragrance connoisseur who appreciates the fresh distinction of this unique and highly acclaimed scent. Allergy test. 100% fragrance free.

Title: Super Fresh & Light

ReviewText: I bought this as a gift, and he is constantly getting compliments! This is the best cologn I have purchased as a gift. Very happy with this one!
Title: Best gift purchase

Description:
euphoria is an addictive oriental fragrance that contrasts exotic fruits, seductive florals and a rich, creamy signature.

Top Notes:  Pomegranate, persimmon, lush green accord.
The top opens with an initial burst of pomegranate, succulent persimmon and lush green notes that captivate the senses.

MID Notes:  Dewy lotus blossom, champaca flower, black orchid.
The heart of euphoria imparts a mysterious and intoxicating feeling through notes of rich black orchid, dewy lotus blossom and sensual champaca flower.

DRY Notes:   Liquid amber, black violet, cream accord, mahogany wood.
The bottom of the fragrance provides a lasting signature of sexy liquid amber and mahogany wood paired with an intriguing potion of black violet, sensual musks and an addictive cream accord.
ReviewText: My dad bought This parfume for my on her birthday. He had engraved Happy Birthday her name on the metal part of this bottle! The smell is amazing for thoses summer date night! I love this smell so much on my mom so I made my husband get me one too... No he did not engraved my bottle.
Title: U can engrave the bottle

ReviewText: This is my perfume for the past 7 years or more. I have had men and women ask me what I'm wearing because it is so, hmmm, how do I explain it... intoxicating? I love it & have tried other perfume but always go back to this.

Description: Energizes the body, excites the senses and revives the spirit.
ReviewText: I am obsessed with perfume, I love fresh citrusy clean scents. I buy expensive scents like Verbena of Jo Malone, Chloe, Versace, etc. but nothing will ever beat my Green Tea Perfume. It does unfortunately not last very long but it's the most therapeutic scent, I use it in the evening before I go to bed in combination with the Green Tea shower gel, shampoo and body lotion and the combination is just better than any expensive Spa treatment. It makes me happy and content and forget all the stress of the day. I cannot imagine my life without it.
Title: Best scent in the world

Description: Energizes the body, excites the senses and revives the spirit.
ReviewText:
I recently purchased the Green Tea perfume and I couldn't be happier. It smells just like tea, but it's a sweet, clean and very classy scent. The scent, also, although subtle and delicate, really lingers.

It's perfect for warmer weather, but it's also really good for all year round. I wouldn't hesitate to wear it in the Fall or Winter at all, because it's just a beautiful, tea-based perfume.

And the bottle is HUGE. It comes at a great cost and you will not run out of this stuff for a long time!! It's a good deal.
Title: A Favorite

Description: Energizes the body, excites the senses and revives the spirit.
ReviewText: This is a simple scent, it doesn't have the complex layers of better quality perfumes. It's just OK.
Title: Average

Description: Energizes the body, excites the senses and revives the spirit.
ReviewText: I was gifted this fragrance from my mother, and I must say, I am so thankful she did! This fragrance smells quite fresh and a little fruity.  It takes only a few spritz to have you smelling great all day.  This is the only perfume I wear and come back to constantly. I have been trying to search for my "go-to" scent and I think I have found it! It is very refreshing and timeless.  If you see it in a store, it is a must-try!
Title: Fresh, Light, Citrus, Clean

Description: Energizes the body, excites the senses and revives the spirit.

I use the products all the time and always get compliments on how nice I smell!! Thanks for a GREAT Product, Elizabeth Arden!!!!

The value for the size (3.3) is also great, however I find the scent doesn't last too long, probably since it's a scent spray vs. eau de toilette.

Description: Energizes the body, excites the senses and revives the spirit.

The scent seems to stay close to the skin (not overbearing) but is still bound to get you complements from those keen enough to notice. Defiantly worth a try if under your consideration.

A RADIANT FLORAL FRAGRANCE THAT CAPTURES THE SPIRIT OF A WOMAN IN FULL BLOOM.

A fresh burst of Moroccan laurel, green tangerine and pink peppercorns mingle with feminine florals and sensual cedar, sandalwood, amber and musk for a modern fragrance that is both sensual and sophisticated.

Description:
Organza is the goddess that lies hidden in every woman. She is exceptional and timeless, combining elegance with richness and purity with sensuality. 
Introduced in 1997, Organza Eau de Parfum is a feminine and vivacious fragrance.
ReviewText: I sampled this recently and absolutely feel in love with it. It is now my signature frangrence and look forward to putting it on each day.
Title: I love this as my signature fragrance.

Description: This dazzling reflection of ALIEN by MUGLER is captured in a pure crystal stone bottle. Immortalized in clear liquid serenity, the luminosity of the ALIEN Eau de Toilette permeates the soul.
ReviewText: I love this fragrance. It has a fresh laundry notes. It is clean, refreshing and longlasting. I use it everyday because although it lasts long, it is subtle and not offensive in the office.  It is a bit pricey but you only need a little.
Title: Clean scent

Description: This dazzling reflection of ALIEN by MUGLER is captured in a pure crystal stone bottle. Immortalized in clear liquid serenity, the luminosity of the ALIEN Eau de Toilette permeates the soul.
ReviewText: This is my ultimate favourite perfume! The smell is beautiful and easy recognizable. I always get compliments when I wear this. It is very long lasting. I find that, especially when I spray it on scarves, the smell lasts for a few days. It is a bit pricey but you do not need to spray that much and the smell is definitely worth it :-)
Title: Beautiful Smell!

Description: This dazzling reflection of ALIEN by MUGLER is captured in a pure crystal stone bottle. Immortalized in clear liquid serenity, the luminosity of the ALIEN Eau de Toilette permeates the soul.
ReviewText: I bought this about 2 months ago and absolutely love it! The bottle is so pretty and it can be refilled for a much lower price! Love it!
Title: Love the refillable bottle

Product Name: Azzaro Pour Homme Eau de Toilette
Description: Fashioned by Italian elegance and refinement, reflecting its creator Loris Azzaro, this sleek fragrance with its lively, powerful sillage combines natural sensuality and instinctive elegance; its iconic “fougère aromatic woody” signature endows men with a timeless, charismatic virility. This creation combines luminosity (citrus notes and star anise), seduction (the “fougère” accord) and timeless virility (patchouli, vetiver, sandalwood).
ReviewText: I started wearing Azzaro for men in the eightie's. The woody smell became a gentle breeze of confidence everytime I wore it back then. The same stand's for today. The smell change's with the chemistry of my body to create a unique sent that no-one else has. Love it alway's. Denise
Title: azzaro pour homme

Product Name: Azzaro Pour Homme Eau de Toilette
Description: Fashioned by Italian elegance and refinement, reflecting its creator Loris Azzaro, this sleek fragrance with its lively, powerful sillage combines natural sensuality and instinctive elegance; its iconic “fougère aromatic woody” signature endows men with a timeless, charismatic virility. Description:
This woody gourmand aromatic, cut and polished like a diamond, operates like a captivating prism. Diamonds for men is the definition of masculinity and desire. Hard to resist.

Emporio Armani Diamonds for Men in the initial aromas, the icy opening contrasts with lingering sensual, burning accents. The emblematic notes of men’s fragrance are subverted with original surprising and addictive ingredients. This sparkling duality gives birth to a play of dazzling reflections.

Product Name: Eau de Lacoste L.12.12 Bleu Eau de Toilette Spray
Description:
The powerful and fresh aquatic coolness of Lacoste's Blue Edition wraps the skin in a clean, crisp, fresh scent that makes you feel elegantly audacious, light, and refreshed. 

The bottle echoes the timeless simplicity and understated sophistication of the Lacoste polo shirt itself—and the fragrance inside.
ReviewText: Bought this product, used the entire thing and even went back to buy more.
Title: Smells great!

ReviewText: I've been wearing J'adore for about 16 years, and when I saw an ad for this fragrance, I had to try it out. I tried it, it smelled good all day, so I went back and bought it. It's the first full perfume since J'adore that I liked enough to buy a full bottle of. It's nothing like J'adore, but I love it almost as much. It has a more pronounced floral scent, and it lasts all day without being overpowering. I love the bottle. If it were bigger I'd make it into a table lamp. As with any perfume, it's best to try it out in-store and see how your skin reacts to it throughout the day.
Title: Lovely scent and a snazzy bottle

ReviewText: This perfum has a floral scent in a citrus way, light and beautiful for the summer!
Title: Very summery scent!

Description:
She lives in the fast lane, makes the most of every single day. She enjoys everything about Paris, and doesn't have a care in the world. Life is her playground. 
What's her fragrance? Live Irrésistible, whose exhilarating trail offers her the chance to live life to the full.
ReviewText: I've been using this perfume regularly for almost a year now and everyone always asks me what I'm wearing. At first the scent is sweet and floral but over time it becomes very sensual and almost musky. The longevity of this perfume is unreal! If wear it on my jacket and come back to it a few days later, the scent is still there. And you don't need anymore than two sprays to get this effect.
Title: Best perfume ever!

Description:
She lives in the fast lane, makes the most of every single day. She enjoys everything about Paris, and doesn't have a care in the world. Life is her playground. 
What's her fragrance? Live Irrésistible, whose exhilarating trail offers her the chance to live life to the full.
ReviewText: Beautiful bottle, smells divine, good sillage & great longevity. To my nose its starts off as a sweet floral & dries down to a sweet intoxicating musk (a mature sweet, in a similiar way to Si) This will now be my go-to perfume.
Title: Love it!

Description: Inspired by the world of motorcycles and the iconic black leather jacket, this daring fragrance captures the essence of bad boy attitude and biker cool. The fragrance delivers a punch with a fearless blend of ultra sexy leather, ambery notes and dark woods that makes a statement of bold contrasts and restless energy.
ReviewText: I bought this a few weeks ago for my boyfriend after smelling an ad in a magazine! It's to die for!
Title: LOVE this scent!

Description: Made for the woman who shatters expectations, this fragrance imbues with a feeling of power, a sense that she can attain whatever she wants—even the thrill of the forbidden. A sheer, floral-oriental fragrance, it opens with a bright burst of citrus and a dangerous hint of black pepper. This arresting introduction gives way to full-throttle femininity as its heart pulses with fruity and floral notes. The fragrance dries down to a rich, ambery base with notes of patchouli. The overall effect is young, stylish, and eminently wearable—a daring edge of sexiness and sensuality that captures the essence of Gucci.
ReviewText: Its my favourite perfume and i always buy Gucci Gulity when ever i run out and its for my everyday use i love it so much
Title: The best perfume

ReviewText: I got this at the beginning of the summer in 2016, and I use it all the time! It's the perfect scent that is wearable for everyday or a night out. I had been wanting it for a while beforehand. Best part is that it seems like it's lasting forever. A must have and completely worth the price and more. I will definitely be repurchasing!!
Title: LOVE!

ReviewText: A beautiful spicy floral scent. Not too strong. My new signature scent
Title: Spice

Description: Yardley London's classic English Rose fragrance has been transformed.  It is now an evocative light, fresh floral fragrance, combining rose absolute, neroli, and camomile, with a heart of rosebud and jasmine petals with warm base notes of amber and sandalwood, which makes it an alluring choice of scent for both daytime and evening.
ReviewText: I love the light scent and silky feel of this. It brings back fond memories of my nana, who introduced it to me as a little girl and the scent of which still makes me think of her. She was a real lady and that's what I always associated with being a lady, was the light floral rose scent!
Title: Nostalgic and feminine

Description: Yardley London's classic English Rose fragrance has been transformed. ReviewText: I am always big fan of Yardley,  I really  admire it.
Title: Loved it

Product Name: Eau de Lacoste L.12.12 Blanc Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: The pure, clean floral woodiness of Lacoste's White Edition wraps the skin in a clean, crisp, fresh scent that makes you feel elegantly audacious, light, and cool.   The bottle echoes the timeless simplicity and understated sophistication of the Lacoste polo shirt itself—and the elegant audaciousness of the fragrance inside. The pure, clean floral woodiness of Lacoste's White Edition wraps the skin in a clean, crisp, fresh scent that makes you feel elegantly audacious, light, and cool.   The bottle echoes the timeless simplicity and understated sophistication of the Lacoste polo shirt itself—and the elegant audaciousness of the fragrance inside.
ReviewText: My boyfriend has been using this cologne for years now! Every time he runs out of it, he makes sure to pick one up or I buy it as a gift for him. It has a sweet clean scent and isn't too strong on the nose. It is perfect as both a daily wear cologne or a special night out. I do highly recommend this cologne as both the man and women will be addicted to the scent!
Title: Best Gift for Him!

ReviewText: B day present for my husband.He loves it. It smells clean and fresh
Title: Eau de Lacoste

ReviewText: I received this as a sample in a huge sample bag full of various products from BeautyBOUTIQUE. Loved the scent but mostly the powdered texture. Gives a slight glow to my skin. I exchanged my points to order full size, as a bit pricey, but as with all fragrances.
Title: Fabulous scent

ReviewText: My daughter gave me a sample of this while she was visiting last summer.  It became my favourite fragrance so I purchased a bottle and wear it every day.  Makes me feel very feminine with its soft scent.  Easy to wear out and about with so many fragrance free areas but this is very light and  brings compliments when hugged by family.  I will definitely purchase this again.
Title: Beautiful Fragrance

Product Name: Lady Million Eau de Parfum Spray
ReviewText: I had bought this product before wedding. ..asked one of client before loved the smell and then bought it would recommend everyone.
Title: Amazing

Product Name: Lady Million Eau de Parfum Spray
ReviewText: I've been using this perfume for almost 4 years. I always get good compliments when I use it and it smells absolutely gorgeous
Title: Favorite scent

Description:
A captivating, voluptuous fragrance.
Rose, Orchid, Vanilla
ReviewText: There is something about this perfume that comes across as very classy, mature and comforting. I would describe it as being a strong powdery feminine smell, in which the notes blend together perfectly. While I prefer it for the winter time, it smells gorgeous in any weather, and smells quite nicely when warmed up by the sun. I would definitely recommend this!
Title: Gorgeous!

Description:
A captivating, voluptuous fragrance.
Rose, Orchid, Vanilla
ReviewText: I've been wearing this fragrance my entire adult life and still love it. My young niece even identified the signature scent when I left a sweater at her home..."this smells like Auntie". Men regularly comment on it. Many celebrity fragrances will come and go but will never replace this classic.
Title: A light and sexy classic

Description:
A captivating, voluptuous fragrance.
Rose, Orchid, Vanilla
ReviewText: I am on my second bottle now and have to say it is still one of my favourite fragrances! It stays with me all day and yet not overpowering.   I am often complimented when wearing it.  Highly recommended for the sassy and classy ladies out there!
Title: Has all day lasting power!

Description:
A captivating, voluptuous fragrance.
Rose, Orchid, Vanilla
ReviewText: I've been wearing this perfume for the past 5 years or so and I absolutely love it! I get compliments on a regular basis about it.
Title: Beautiful perfume

Description: Sauvage: raw and noble. A radically fresh composition, dictated by a name that has the ring of a manifesto.  That was the way François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-Creator, wanted it: raw and noble all at once. Natural ingredients, selected with extreme care, prevail in excessive doses. Radiant top notes burst with the juicy freshness of Reggio di Calabria Bergamot. Ambroxan, derived from precious ambergris, unleashes a powerfully woody trail. Sauvage is an act of creation inspired by wide-open spaces. An ozone blue sky sprawled above a rocky landscape, white-hot beneath the desert sun. To create Sauvage, I used man as my starting point. A strong and unmistakable masculinity. Like the image of a man who transcends time and fashion. François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-Creator.
ReviewText: I like its discription and it says it all wonderful
Title: Raw and noble

Description: Exciting. Bold. Sexy. Playful. Guess Girl makes an entrance with a burst of vibrant fruits--raspberry nectar, melon and bergamot mist. The flirtation continues with exotic and rare flowers--Brazilian Paradise Orchid, Acacia Flower and Lily. Creamy woods and vanilla tease the senses, leaving an irresistible and unforgettable impression.
ReviewText: Love this fragrance for summer, its so light and refreshing, great for a day at the office or a night on the town
Title: So fresh & light

Product Name: Modern Muse Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
Be an inspiration. Experience the fragrance that captures your style, your confidence, your creative spirit. An alluring contrast of sparkling florals and sleek, sensual woods.

Two distinctively different accords—Sparkling Jasmine Accord and Sleek Woods Accord—provide an intriguing dual impression. It's a true innovation in fragrance design, as complex and fascinating as the woman who inspires it.
The Inspiration

Modern Muse was inspired by the complexity of a modern woman, with the same dynamic contrasts as her life and her personality. Her creative energy and magnetic femininity are captured by its multi-faceted, sparkling floralcy. Her sleek style, strength and sensuality by its sleek woods.

Who is a Modern Muse? She’s confident and independent, soft and strong, feminine yet dynamic. Stylish and original, she inspires everyone she meets—without saying a word.
ReviewText: My son bought me an Estee Lauder gift pack three years ago which contained Modern Muse, after having worn a different perfume for many years I really wasn't interested in a new one.  I have never worn another one since then, the scent truly lasts and as an Instructor I have many students say "Man you smell good"  Now it is easy gift giving for me.
Title: My Forever Scent!

Product Name: La Petite Robe Noire Eau de Toilette
Description: In La Petite Robe Noire’s perfume wardrobe, I am the Cocktail Dress. A perfumed creation by Guerlain: an eau de toilette swirling fresh and floral, embroidered with citrus and white musks notes. The legendary "heart-shaped" bottle has been boldly reinterpreted with a modern touch. Its crystalline transparency, tinged with a delicate, powdery pink, reveals a sophisticated strapless dress, ready to dance! I am absolutely essential and utterly irresistible. I am the chic and very glamorous perfumed creation by Guerlain. I am La Petite Robe Noire.
ReviewText: I tried this one and LOVED it, but for some reason the eau de parfum had a different and more ideal effect (lasted longer, seemed to have more body). I think it depends on the person, but this is still one of my favourite scents and you can't go wrong with either
Title: It's great, but try the eau de parfum

Product Name: Narciso Rodriguez For Her Eau de Parfum
Description:
Narciso Rodriguez For Her eau de parfum is an elegant, sensual, mysterious and voluptuous fragrance.
Three notes enhance the heart of musk: floral-fruity, amber and woody notes. A bottle with a pink interior set off by thick glass presented in a deep-black box.
ReviewText: This is a beautiful fragrance. I loved the sample of the eau de toilette but this one is quite a bit heavier. Still a beautiful scent, but just a bit too heavy for every day (for me).
Title: Nice but heavier than you would think

Title: This one smells the best

Description: feel cleaner and more graceful than ever. pure grace spray fragrance (eau de toilette) is our infinitely clean fragrance in a concentrated form. clean and universally appealing, this soap and water scent is the perfect fragrance for anyone who wants to feel as though they just stepped out of the shower. pure grace features pure, crisp soap and water notes, creating the simplest, cleanest scent imaginable.
ReviewText: I have been using Pure Grace fragrance for a really long time. In fact, I have gotten rid of any other fragrances and use this exclusively. Imagine my disappointment when the eau de toilette fragrance became so weak. I then switched to ordering the eau de parfum spray hoping it would work better and have been making that work by layering. NOW they have discontinued the eau de parfum spray. PLEASE LISTEN to your customer base, they have been complaining for a couple years now ever since Christina Carlino sold to you. This is a solid line and our needs should not be ignored. Please upgrade this line and bring it back to it's former glory!!!
Title: Majorly disappointed!!

ReviewText: I was a baby grace girl for a very long time & I still love it. Lately, I have been reaching for pure grace! I absolutely love the pure soap & water clean, like a breath on a cold night. Ibactually mix it with baby grace and it smells beautiful. I always feel like I just came out of the shower when I spritz myself with this scent. Even my young daughter enjoys this, it is an ageless scent. Especially for ones who really don't enjoy wearing fragrance, this one will change them, everyone loves to smell clean, clean, clean! My laundry smells so good, it almost never smells "dirty" :) I love the new bottle design as well, it is much better!
Title: So clean & fresh

Description: feel cleaner and more graceful than ever. pure grace spray fragrance (eau de toilette) is our infinitely clean fragrance in a concentrated form. clean and universally appealing, this soap and water scent is the perfect fragrance for anyone who wants to feel as though they just stepped out of the shower. pure grace features pure, crisp soap and water notes, creating the simplest, cleanest scent imaginable.
ReviewText: Why would you change? My first fragrance set from Philosophy came to me about a week after my sister passed away. She ordered it for me before she passed. Pure Grace was a gift I cherished. The smell was clean, peaceful, and comforting. Like a hug from my sister. I have purchased it several times since her death in 2006, but over the past couple of years the fragrance has changed. It has no lasting power. Zero! I used to layer the body spray, lotion and perfume and it would last all day long. I received so many compliments! Now, I may as well wear nothing. By the time I walk out the door, the fragrance is gone. I am heartbroken...
Title: Why, why, why?

ReviewText: I have been using Pure Grace for 5 years now. i was used to buying the department store perfumes, and I had all of the most popular and classy fragrences, BUT NONE WERE QUITE RIGHT FOR ME. i SAW pHILOSOPHY ON A HOME SHOPPING SHOW, AND SAW THE PURE GRACE PRESENTATION. tHE SOAP AND WATER FRAGRENCE REALLY SOUNDED GOOD TO ME. i BOUGHT MY FIRST SET WHICH CONSISTED OF THE BODY LOTION, SPRAY FRAGRENCE, BODY SPRITZER, AND THE BODY WASH. hERE IT IS, FIVE YEARS LATER, AND i HAVE Never USED ANYTHING BUT PURE GRACE since the first time that I tried it. I am always asked what fragrence I am wearing. I can't do without it. I'm hooked..

Friends, Sister-in-laws, etc started buying it too. Somewhere along the way it became awful. It doesn't smell the same, and it certainly doesn't last...at all. I still wear this weak excuse for perfume daily bc I can't find anything I like...I haven't gotten a compliment in a while.

ReviewText: i love love love this scent - not too involved, just a beautiful, soft, clean scent! i went to a theme park recently, and we decided to go out to dinner afterwards. feeling awful because we had been out in the sun all day, i sprayed pure grace on me, hoping to make myself more presentable in a nice restaurant. pure grace definitely did the trick - i could not longer smell the day's fun on me, and instead i couldn't stop smelling this wonderful scent on myself! the waiter even complimented me on how nice i smelled, which never happens after i visit a theme park - this is a true winner :)

Title: So So VERY disappointed

ReviewText: I love, love, LOVE this scent! They couldn't describe it better; out of the shower, soap and water clean, is what it smells like! Even better on my body. Problem is, it fades. Very, very rapidly. To basically about non-existent within two hours. Really. No exaggeration. I've tried putting on a tad more; to no avail. I'm sorry, but for the price of these spray on fragrances, the scent ought to last longer than that. I would assume the perfume (since it's more concentrated, but also WAY more expensive) would (or *should*) last a long time, but I'm not willing to spend the money. Sorry Philosophy...apparently you've changed your formulas and this is a not-so-happy advocate of your change. Cannot recommend this fragrance.

ReviewText:
Ladies, as a Chef and Food&Travel writer/author, scent and smell are very strong motivators both good and bad.

Philosophy's Grace was first introduced to me by one of the ladies in the band Florence and the Machine (I'll spare them some anonymity) ;)

It was so subtle, so clean I had to ask.

I have bought it as a gift for several women and now use it myself (I am a straight male) and mix with my other cologne's to enhance their scent with some pretty amazing results and compliments.
I wonder if there are any pheromones in it, or is just the wonderfully clean scent alone subliminally so attractive.

Either way, like most subtle things, it doesn't knock you over, but you find yourself and those around you become happier.
(I've actually done this multiple times within the same hour in a crowd of people. Try it yourself.

Worth every penny!

ReviewText: I recently purchased this after receiving a sample of the Pure Grace shower cream. This has become a new favorite for me!! It is so soft and fresh smelling. It's such a nice change from all the other stronger fragrances that are out today. it doesn't have that typical "perfume" type of scent- just a clean, shower fresh scent. I love to layer this with the shower cream and body lotion. I wish I had discovered this sooner!!

ReviewText:
this is my most worn scent of the bunch. it is soap and water clean.
it is really a very soft floral. i have been wearing this scent for several years now, and it took me awhile to detect the subtleness of the floral. i mention this because i occasionally read questions about it's likeness to some of the clean brand fragrance. i think pg is softer and prettier -but still not so feminine that my husbands won't use it. all he smells is clean, and he will even use the lotion.
this scent is least likely to give anyone a headache, or irritate sensitives. this scent blends and becomes a part of me. long after i no longer smell it sitting on top of me, i get compliments. i can always smell it on my clothing the following day.
i also love that it layers so well with everything. i can add, change, freshen up or soften up my lotion scents with pg. it is my fail proof perfume regardless of my lotion choice for the day.

Title: pretty good

ReviewText:
Pure Grace has always been one of my favorite Philosophy fragrances. Every time I'd wear it I got compliments on how "clean " I smelled, which is exactly what I was going for, I don't like heavy fragrances, especially because I get migraines and this one I could wear because it just smelled like soap and water. However, the last bottle I purchased didn't smell like soap and water, it actually didn't have much fragrance at all, and definitely didn't have the staying power it used to......previously I'd put it on and hours later, I was still getting asked what I was wearing, but not once with the new bottle! There must be something different in the formulation??? I would ask to please go back to the original formula!!!
Also, the next fragrance I love is called "The Fragrance" , it was only a limited edition fragrance, but just a clean fresh scent, and great for migraine sufferers. I wish they'd put that into their regular line!

Title: It doesn't like ME

Description: feel cleaner and more graceful than ever. pure grace spray fragrance (eau de toilette) is our infinitely clean fragrance in a concentrated form. clean and universally appealing, this soap and water scent is the perfect fragrance for anyone who wants to feel as though they just stepped out of the shower. pure grace features pure, crisp soap and water notes, creating the simplest, cleanest scent imaginable.
ReviewText:
Between this and the berries and cream 3 in1 shower gel, I'm a philosophy girl for life now. I recieved a Pure grace set as a graduation gift {Body butter, buffing shower wash, Spritz and eau de perfume} and fell in love. It is a great everyday fragrance for those who don't want to draw alot of attention but still not go unnoticed. It is true to its name - pure Soap and water, a breath of crisp winter air on a clear night, the first untouched snowfall. Think just pure sparkling white. I recieve compliments on it all the time and it has become a workplace favorite.

However i only give it a 4/5 because it lacks the depth to be a signature fragrance for me. Hoping that falling or unconditional love will be the one for me.

But back to this perfume- It lasts [strongly} for several hours. and will last but be very faint for the rest of the day and only needs to be reapplied once mid day to maintain its orrigional scent. In my opinion it is best if used with the roll-on oil version and a spray togethor
Title: Grace at it's best

Description: feel cleaner and more graceful than ever. pure grace spray fragrance (eau de toilette) is our infinitely clean fragrance in a concentrated form. clean and universally appealing, this soap and water scent is the perfect fragrance for anyone who wants to feel as though they just stepped out of the shower. pure grace features pure, crisp soap and water notes, creating the simplest, cleanest scent imaginable.
ReviewText: A while ago I went into sephora with my dad just browsing and shopping for a couple of things. My dad wandered off like usual and came back with a roller ball bottle of philosophy's pure grace. I had smelt the perfume and thought it had a clean scent which I don't usually go for. I'm more of a fruity scent type of gal myself but I actually enjoyed it. I noticed the scent was not over whelming or way too strong where you can smell me from around the block coming. So those aspects of the scent I really liked and also the fact that this fragrance sticks with you all through out a busy day. It does not fade away too quickly. My dad said and I quote "I like this scent because it reminds me of what a school teacher usually wears" and that statement I agree with. The other thing I wanted to say is that you guys should come out with a limited edition set of roller ball perfumes of every scent so that way you can try out each of the scents and see which ones you would actually like to purchase in full size.

ReviewText: the fragrance of pure grace is so cleanly unique... nothing else out on the market even resembles it... when i was a kid we used to take a bath with plain ole white soap... i wont say the name of the brand but you know that popular soap that floats in the water becaus it is "pure" soap, well that is what this reminds me of... it doesnt smell like that brand but it is the clean smell you had when you were a kid getting out of the bath at the end of the day and drying off with a big fluffy line-dried towel... clean, fresh, innocent, delicate, and light... this is one you need to experience... As with all the graces there is something about them that really sooths the senses... it leaves you with sense of calm in your soul.... I plan to also order the pure grace shampoo and conditioner so i can really layer this scent over my entire body... this scent layers so nicely and you get pure clean simple notes... not overbearing or overpowering... not complicated... who needs complicated when our lives are so crazy... we all need simple pure clean calm

ReviewText: I wear Pure Grace everyday. It's a wonderful fragrance with a lightness to it that isn't overbearing. I am not a fan of strong smelling fragrance as it can actually be offensive to those around you. I know many people have complained that this fragrance isn't the same since Coty bought Philosophy, and to be honest I didn't use it before Coty, but I find it to be just the right amount of fragrance. I also use the shower gel and lotion in Pure Grace. While I can't actually smell it on myself hours after I initially put it on (actually you shouldn't be able to smell it on yourself - if you can, you've probably used too much), I still receive compliments on how fresh I smell several hours into my day by others. I not only spritz myself with the fragrance, but also on whatever I'm wearing that day. I did only give it 4 stars because it is a bit pricey for not being an eau de parfum, but I always wait to buy it when Philosophy or QVC has a special offer. I love the clean, light scent of Pure Grace. It reminds me of being at the ocean, which is my favorite place to be :)

ReviewText:
Like most everyone who has reviewed this...I love the smell of Pure Grace. I have been a fan of the scent for years and it was a scent that was always a staple on my dresser. It was also the only scent that I could wear around the people I know who have perfume sensitivities. That said...I have not worn it for about 2.5 years or so. However, in May of this year, I received a bottle for my birthday after I mentioned that it was one of my all time favorites (I was stoked)!! But, now I am saddened to say that I have only worn it a handful of times because it makes my head hurt so bad to the point of nausea :(, yes...I tried to wear it on different occasions (wearing it, now) in the hopes that it was something else that was making me sick. But each time the only variable is the Pure Grace. I have never been sensitive to it before and so I am wondering if the chemical formula was changed in any way. Therefore, my up/down review is based on my love for the scent and my more current painfully negative reaction to it...

I will, however, begrudgingly gift it to some other lucky person <I am not around too often> (sad sigh), because it truly is a remarkable smelling perfume!
Title: I love the wonderful smell of Pure Grace...but...has the chemical formula changed?

ReviewText:
CLEaN! i can't think of another way to describe pure grace. i love it! when the warm weather arrives im all about pure grace. i like to wear my fragrances by the season. when fall comes i break out inner grace and pure grace when it gets warm. it is crisp, clean and light. i layer from head to toe and it's like you are fresh out of the shower all day.

i have to share this story! I had gone to dinner one evening to a local mexican restaurant. after dinner when we went to pay our bill one of the waiters came up to the register next to the cashier. he was smiling. then he came out with "what is that smell you are wearing? you smell so good" at first i was confused as i'm standing in a mexican restaurant with nothing but the smell of mexican food all around me! then he said to cashier, "these are the people i was telling you about that i kept walking by their table because they smelled so good". then he said to me "you smell like you just got out of the shower"!!! Omg, i knew right then and there it was my pure grace!!! so i told him what it was and where he could find it because he wanted to get it for his girlfriend.

Yes my fellow philosophy lovers....pure grace is as clean as it gets!!
Title: Oh soooo clean!

Description: feel cleaner and more graceful than ever. pure grace spray fragrance (eau de toilette) is our infinitely clean fragrance in a concentrated form. clean and universally appealing, this soap and water scent is the perfect fragrance for anyone who wants to feel as though they just stepped out of the shower. pure grace features pure, crisp soap and water notes, creating the simplest, cleanest scent imaginable.

Title: smells so clean

Description: feel cleaner and more graceful than ever. pure grace spray fragrance (eau de toilette) is our infinitely clean fragrance in a concentrated form. clean and universally appealing, this soap and water scent is the perfect fragrance for anyone who wants to feel as though they just stepped out of the shower. pure grace features pure, crisp soap and water notes, creating the simplest, cleanest scent imaginable.
ReviewText:
about 10 years ago when I was 13 i walked into sephora for the first time. this was when i started to realize that maybe it was time for this 13 year-old to start wearing perfume and focusing on beauty products.

pure grace struck me instantly. i loved the description of "soap and water clean" and "feeling like you're wearing your favorite white t-shirt." i bought it along with a set of 6oz grace 3 in 1's, a set of solid grace perfumes, and purity made simple facial cleanser. at that point the only graces were pure, baby, and amazing. this was my first exposure to philosophy and those were my first purchases, and i've been hooked ever since. funny how this is my first review of pure grace!

I used up this perfume in a month, I believe. i sprayed it constantly. i adored it so much. it really does smell "soap and water clean." it's fresh, light, airy and crisp. very simplistic, but beautiful. i never fail to get compliments when i wear any philosophy, and that is no different with pure grace. people usually ask what soap i use because it is so subtle. it makes people think you yourself smell good, rather than a perfume you put on yourself. that is true for all of philosophy, but never more true than with pure grace.

So here i am, 10 years later and just getting around to a review! i still use this at least once a week, and that has been true throughout this past decade of my life. i have never been without pure grace. it's a great base for other perfumes and a great pairing for any lotion. it's classic, timeless, fresh, and simple perfection. I will continue to use pure grace for as long as it is around!
Title: first philosophy purchase...

ReviewText: Starts fruity and a bit sharp, but it resolves fairly quickly into a feather-soft, warmish smell. It has decent staying power; perhaps refresh once at lunch and once before evening if you wanted to.  In its favor, it is pretty, and quite wearable, and reasonably sophisticated. It strikes me as a fragrance for someone who does not wish to call attention to their fragrance, but even within those confines, I can think of better, more interesting choices for myself. I would reccomend only buying the smallest bottle unless you seriously fall in love.
Title: Sweet, Vanillic, & Honeyed

ReviewText: I bought this perfume a week ago and I fell in love .. I wear it every day and even before I go to sleep ... it start with a jasmine smell and ends with pure vanilla
Title: Amazing perfume

Product Name: Only The Brave Tattoo Diesel For Men
Description:
Only The Brave collection by Diesel received another edition in 2012. The new Only The Brave Tattoo is available in characteristic flacon (glass fist), in dark shades, with inscribed Only The Brave Tattoo in "La Graffiti" style. The outer packaging goes great with design of the flacon.

Only The Brave Tattoo is composed of apple, opening the composition with its zest. A heart comprises sage and Bourbon pepper, while a base features amber-wood tacts, benzoin, tobacco, and patchouli.

He tattooed his initials R.R. and the motto Only The Brave above his ankle and Mohawk Indian logo on his arm. "I like the idea of writing on the body," explains Rosso. 'We were born without any marks and I think it is important to leave trace on the body we were given.
ReviewText: First thing I smelled was candied lemon with some leathery notes, once that receeded my skin smelled like cedary-amber-musk. It's suitable for summer wear and has great lasting power; even after a shower I was left with a wonderful vanilla-cedar aroma on my skin.
Title: A Citrus Scent

Description:
Shalimar is the first oriental perfume in history. L'Eau de Parfum Shalimar is a mythic fragrance with bergamot, iris and vanilla notes; an intense wake with a touch of impertinence, always glowing which embodies skin-caressing sensuality with a hint of the forbidden.

Inspired by the passionate love story between an emperor and an Indian princess, Shalimar, which means "temple of love" in Sanskrit, symbolises the promise of eternal love forevermore. It is a fragrance of desire. In 1925, the Shalimar bottle designed by Raymond Guerlain won first prize at the Paris Decorative Arts Exhibition. Its curves were inspired by the basins of the famous Shalimar gardens. The fan stopper with its sapphire transparency recalls the garden's eternally gushing water.
ReviewText: I recently bought a bottle of Shalimar Eau de Parfum. I have loved this perfume for a very long time and I love the story behind it.Look it up on line if you don't know it! It has been around since the 1920s and is still going strong - oriental, exotic, light, floral and slightly spicy all in one perfume. It is a tribute to Mumtaz Mahal for whom the Taj Mahal was built as well as Shalimar Gardens in Lahore, Pakistan- I always think of her and the beautiful palace and gardens created for her when I wear it.It is an honour to wear this perfume.
Title: A Classic

Description:
Shalimar is the first oriental perfume in history. L'Eau de Parfum Shalimar is a mythic fragrance with bergamot, iris and vanilla notes; an intense wake with a touch of impertinence, always glowing which embodies skin-caressing sensuality with a hint of the forbidden.

Inspired by the passionate love story between an emperor and an Indian princess, Shalimar, which means "temple of love" in Sanskrit, symbolises the promise of eternal love forevermore. It is a fragrance of desire. In 1925, the Shalimar bottle designed by Raymond Guerlain won first prize at the Paris Decorative Arts Exhibition. Its curves were inspired by the basins of the famous Shalimar gardens. The fan stopper with its sapphire transparency recalls the garden's eternally gushing water.
ReviewText:
For those who love spicier notes, Shalimar is exquisite, evocative of such richness yet not overpowering, especially when the Eau de Parfum or Cologne is applied. 

Plus - the bottle is truly a keepsake!
Title: exquisite classic

Description: A tantalizing abstract floral cocktail, this fragrance reflects the same colorful vibrancy, optimistic energy and open-minded movement of Ed Hardy. Glittering fruits and florals, radiant woods and sensual musks are brought together for an airy and open feeling, much like the Ed Hardy style. Blood orange and juicy Gala apple meet violet leaf while energetic waves of mango, apple blossoms, and pink jasmine soon join in at the hear. The alluring background blend of cashmere musk, amber, warm benzoin tears and blonde woods captivates anyone who dares to follow.
ReviewText: It's nice enough, but has nothing to distinguish it from the umptillion other such things on the market other than the fun bottle. It's my least favorite Ed Hardy scent so far.
Title: Not For Me

Description: An unconventional blend of rich floral and daring fruity notes with an unexpected boyish black tea twist.The scent creates a contrast of tones and sensations, fusing traditionally feminine and unexpected masculine notes to redefine the conventions of female fragrances and reflect HUGO’s minimalist glamour.
ReviewText: I bought this perfume because I had a sample of it and fell in love with the scent.  It's my NEW favorite!!  A very soft scent!!
Title: Wonderful scent!!

Description: Voluptuously sensual and luminous, Black Opium Eau de Toilette gives addiction a touch of brightness. Daringly feminine, the rose-gold glitter is enhanced by rose-gold juice. The opening notes first break with a zingy blackcurrant accord, followed with a heady whirl of fragrant jasmine tea. And of course coffee bean notes, now rendered unique, highlighted with a luminous floral heart.  Black Opium Eau de Toilette is a green coffee, a new facet of the very first floral coffee introduced by Black Opium.
ReviewText: I bought this about 2 months ago and I have NEVER had so many compliments on my fragrance in my life! Even strangers in grocery store stop me and ask me what I'm wearing. I think what I like about this is you can put it on 2 different people standing side by side and it mixes with their body chemistry to  create your own personal scent!!

ReviewText: I bought this Cologne for my husband. He enjoys wearing this product and I love the smell of it on him. He get many compliments on the scent and people always ask...what are you wearing. We proudly say, EUPHORIA
Title: Favorite product

Description: Sparkling. Spontaneous. Exhilarating. Awake in the dewy grass of an early summer morning with  Ô De Lancôme. An emblematic fresh-citrus fragrance originally created in 1969,  Ô De Lancôme is a sparkling flurry of citrus and flowers that delivers a fresh, clean scent that evokes spontaneity.
ReviewText: My father first bought this for me years ago, so every time I spritz it on I think of him. It is my absolute favourite for summer as it is refreshing and light. Love this scent !
Title: O de Lancôme perfume is O so wonderful

Description: Sparkling. Spontaneous. Exhilarating. Awake in the dewy grass of an early summer morning with  Ô De Lancôme. An emblematic fresh-citrus fragrance originally created in 1969,  Ô De Lancôme is a sparkling flurry of citrus and flowers that delivers a fresh, clean scent that evokes spontaneity.
ReviewText: I love this citrusy fragrance and have worn it for years. Reminds of a similar fragrance I used to wear in London but can't find now. Long lasting, and do I get compliments! Can't wear those overpowering candy, fruity, spicy perfumes, but cleaner, citrusy scents seem to suit me. Good price as well for the size. You can easily pay double for much smaller bottles.
Title: A favorite for years

ReviewText: I got this a month ago. I was trying to find some fresh fragrance for summer then. And this is the unique one I found. Different from many other fresh scent, this is not fruity and sweet. It is more like a fresh feel of the grass and leaves after a rain.

Description:
Jean-Paul Guerlain created Samsara for the woman of his life. His only indications were sandalwood and jasmine, which the "Lady of Samsara" particularly liked. Jean-Paul Guerlain travelled to India many times to acquire the purest sandalwood and a jasmine used only for religious offerings until then. Samsara is a sensual version of seduction for a woman who has found harmony and balance, which is notably conveyed through the composition's raw materials. 

It was at the Musée Guimet that Robert Granai found inspiration for creating the shape of Samsara. The bottle is flamboyant red, a sacred colour, which evokes through the fullness of its shape a statue of a Khmer dancer. The stopper echoes the shape of the eye of the Buddha, a symbol of meditation, which leads the way to supreme awakening.
ReviewText: Samsara isn't spicy or resinous, it is warm and creamy, sweet and clean. It isn't loud or overly demanding especially if you buy it in Eau de Toillette form. It's one of my prefered scents for fall even though it isn't in fashion.
Title: Reminds me of the late 80s

ReviewText: This perfume is absolutely gorgeous. It has such a distinct addictive smell to it. It is light, powdery, woody, feminine, simply gorgeous! And the body lotion is even better! Compliments the perfume wonderfully! Must Try!

Product Name: Alien Essence Absolue Eau de Parfum Intense
Description: A new solar goddess is born,revealing the supreme fragrance of extraordinary femininity. The rich, bewitching nectar is captured inside an everlasting drop of gold that radiates a divine mystical energy. ALIEN Essence Absolue is a modern and decadent interpretation of ALIEN that will indulge the solar goddess in every woman.
ReviewText: I've had so many compliments wearing this fragrance. I really don't want to share this secret but it is my favorite fragrance right now. I've worn Angel for the longest time but I'm sorry I didn't discover this perfume long ago. Came across it accidentally testing the Mugler fragrances at Shoppers Drug Mart in Grimsby, ON. The girls there were very friendly and helpful. Can't believe I've been missing out all along. Happy to have it now. Sweet. Sultry. Sensuous. Me!
Title: Alien Essence "Absoluely" Beautiful!

Product Name: Alien Essence Absolue Eau de Parfum Intense
Description: A new solar goddess is born,revealing the supreme fragrance of extraordinary femininity. The rich, bewitching nectar is captured inside an everlasting drop of gold that radiates a divine mystical energy. ALIEN Essence Absolue is a modern and decadent interpretation of ALIEN that will indulge the solar goddess in every woman.
ReviewText: I find this perfume is very similar to classic Alien but with more sophisticated vibe of warm vanilla in it. You can notice this note in the very beginning when you just sprayed the perfume, but after a while you actually will be able to smell classical Alien. I definitely recommend this perfume for everybody who is in love with various versions of Alien perfume as well for those who love perfumes  on a heavier side. It had jasmine and vanilla notes in it. Perfect for winter days and special evening occasions.

Product Name: Eros pour Femme Eau de Parfum Spray
Description: Versace Eros pour Femme, the fragrance for a passionate woman. Eros, the Greek god of love, is seduced by the power of nature in the guise of a beautiful woman.  For a woman who is intuitive and spirited. Inspired by the magic and seductive power of a love story and fatal attraction.  Olfactive family: Floral - Woody- Musk.  Top notes: Sicilian lemon, Calabrian bergamot,pomegranate grains.  Mid notes: jasmine infusion, jasmine absolute Sambac, peony petals, and lemon flower.
ReviewText: I was looking for a scent that was unique and could easily go from day to night. I tried this on my lunch break and was skeptical. At the end of the work day, I received so many compliments on my fragrance that I ran back to buy it. It's an interesting scent to wear for any occasion. A little pricey but worth it!

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText: I have been a philosophy girl for a long time now & own every fragrance they make. My favorites WERE Baby & Summer Grace. When I received this bottle and sprayed it onto my wrists, I was at a loss for words. It is absolutely beautiful! So clean, very ethereal, just a very classy & feminine scent. This is without doubt, my new favorite scent. I have gotten so many compliments while wearing this one, you have to experience it to believe it! I highly recommend this one, it's truly ageless. If I had to compare it to current scents, I'd say a little Pure, a little Amazing and a hint of Baby but fragrance is different on everyone. Get this one!!
Title: Should Be Called Heavenly Grace!

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText: I was so pleased to receive living grace from philosophy and this one is quickly becoming my new favorite grace. the scent is crisp and clean with some floral and musk scents also. i also can smell some citrus but not as much citrus as i smell in eternal grace. to me, this isn't as floral as amazing grace but still smells really beautiful. i have been wearing this everyday and can still smell it on myself as the day goes on. i think this is a scent that could be worn all year round, it isn't too heavy or sweet. i would definately buy a 4oz bottle and also am excited to try the shower gel and lotion. a real winner!!
Title: a new favorite!

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText: how can a fragrance be calming, yet energizing? Living grace reminds me of the purifying, uplifting scent of air in a garden after a heavy rainfall. throughout wear i get whiffs of lily of the valley, and occasionally white flower notes, but overall this is like a wave of ozone that refreshes and invigorates my senses and my energy level. it's a completely positive scent, totally devoid of dark or disagreeable undertones. It can be worn anywhere at any time, and a little spritz during the day works better than a coffee break. living grace is really irresistible, and it's definitely right up there in the, "you smell so good" category, alongside Amazing grace, falling in love, and pure grace.
Title: Calming energy

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText:
I bought "Living Grace" because of all the positive reviews I had read. although I am not a floral sent person, I thought a nice fresh sent would be a good, little change.

unfortunately this sent is not for me, I have only worn it twice; and both times I have not enjoyed the over powering floral fragrance that sticks with me all day.

Living Grace is not a bad sent, however I prefer fragrances that are more musk and subtle, than floral and powerful. I wish philosophy would consider fragrances that are a little less powerful floral for those of us with a different taste in fragrance.
Title: NOt my kind of fragrance

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText:
First, this a great smelling perfume. Feminine, fresh, and light. Lily of the Valley & citrus as the main base notes. This smells closer to AG than any of the other scents. a mixture of eternal grace and amazing grace imo. more AG with crisp and a little citrus.
What I really dislike, this doesn't last more than 1hr on me. I've even asked others to smell my wrist or neck, and they detect nothing. Doesn't even last if i spray it in my hair. why would you make a beautiful scent and only formulate it to last for an hour at the most? I would give this product 5 stars if it would last but it doesn't. Gave it two because its too good of a perfume for them to not give it staying power. fix it philosophy and it would be my HG scent.
Title: Smells femone & beautful but fades quickly.

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText:
Living grace is a challenge for my to describe because the word that comes to mind is clean. a clean fresh fragrance...that first warm day in the spring when you open the windows and let the sunshine flow in and the air has the clean crisp scent.

It's not the same clean soapy scent of pure grace. living grace is a fragrance of it's very own that can't be compared accurately to the other philosophy fragrance to describe it.

On my skin, this fragrance did have lasting power and evolved from a strong scent when first applied to a very wearable clean scent.

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText: This fragrance reminds me of a beach... it's not heavy, but not too light, just in between... hours later you can still smell it on your self... its kind of clean, fresh, and not florally at all... so if you don't like floral try this... living grace is not one of my favorite philosophy scents but I wouldn't say it is the worst... I prefer Baby grace, eternal grace, and amazing and pure graces... if I had to choose this over philosophy's other new scent, love sweet love, id choose love.. sorry guys... this one just doesn't impress me all that much.
Title: Beachy...

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText: i love philosophy products, and i love perfumes, but this is my first philosophy perfume. i chose it because it was a small bottle, something i like to carry in my purse. i am not sure why, but this is a migraine trigger for me. at first sniff, i thought it was light, fresh, clean. it was different from my favorites (chanel no. 5 & coco, juicy couture couture) . i found myself getting a headache a few hours after i wore this for the first time. i'm not saying it caused it, but it definitely aggravated it. i will probably give this to my mom:(
Title: doesn't work for everyone!

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText: this is definitely my new favorite scent! it has the clean scent of pure grace with a hint of a floral as well. This has a clean, yet sophisticated scent. i have hesitated to write a review because i was trying to figure out exactly what it smells like to me and i'm struggling with this...probably because to me it just smells perfect! every time i wear this i get compliments and when i wear it i feel pretty, classy, professional, and balanced. this is my new go-to fragrance and although i love pure grace, this one has it beat for me!
Title: Clean and sophisticated

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText: This is the scent I have been looking for!! I love the simple clean scent of pure grace, the unique scent of summer grace, and the soft scent of baby grace, but I was searching for one that almost had all of these qualities, and living grace is it! it has a clean element, yet it is somewhat soft and perfect for every day. it is sophisticated, yet humble - not too overpowering, but enough of a scent to be noticed and loved. thank you so much philosophy - this is my new signature scent :)
Title: absolutely in love with this scent

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText: i am so in love with this fragrance! i have been wearing it everyday since i received it and i can't get enough of it. this is a timeless fragrance that works for every season. there is a top note of citrus, mostly like orange, with floral undertones and a hint of musk. the scent is very clean, even more so than pure grace. it is not over-powering and yet it has good staying power and lasts through my 8 hour work day. this is definitely my new favorite fragrance from philosophy.
Title: a new favorite

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText: this new scent is so beautiful! it makes me feel the same way about a fragrance when i first tried amazing grace 10 years ago. it has a strong citrus scent when you first spray it, but it dries down to a lighter citrus, a hint of musk, and some floral notes. it's very soft, but i thought was pretty long lasting. eagerly waiting for the shower gel and lotion to come out! i think you can tell that cristina carlino worked on this fragrance since it is more old-school philosophy.
Title: love this new fragrance!

ReviewText: I don't care much for this fragrance. It just smells like Amazing Grace, which I do like, with some added musk and possibly other notes that I don't care for. I wish Philosophy would bring back Baby Grace. That smelled unique and divine. I just got nearly accosted at the grocery store while wearing Baby Grace parfum for the first time (Ebay). It's ok, but there is better and I'm guessing it's cheaper to make this than the discontinued scents.
Title: smells like a muskier Amazing Grace

ReviewText: I finally got a chance to smell this baby, and it's nice. It's nothing miraculous, like amazing grace. like all philosophy scents, it's just super fresh and non-offensive. and flowery, of course. (i really wish philosophy would get away from strictly-floral scents and venture out with something with a ton of vanilla, tonka, or amber! ;) overall, i don't think i'll be buying it since it's nothing too special. it is a pretty scent though.

ReviewText: i like soft floral scents so i was really looking forward to this one. the initial scent after first applying it was really nice and i thought i may have found myself a new scent, but when it dried down it changed to a more perfumy scent which doesn't mesh well with my body chemistry. i see that other reviewers say the scent lasts, but it didn't last long on me at all which worked out in the overall scheme of things.

I'll have to see if it comes in a rollerball yet for touch-ups when i'm away from home.

Title: somewhere between Amazing and inner

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText: this fragrance is extremely clean, but not in the same way as amazing and pure grace. it's almost unisex, and seems to remind me of the all too famous unisex perfume from the 90s. it's very light and fresh. i prefer a sweeter or more feminine scent, so this one is not up my ally. but if you are a big pure grace fan or looking for another fresh, clean scent, you might really enjoy this.

Thank you, philosophy for this wonderful and beautiful gift which lifts my spirits every day of my life,
Title: light, clean fragrance

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText:
i honestly can't stop smelling my wrists! living grace is wonderful! thank you philosophy for choosing me to sample it!

the lily of the valley, warm musk and touch of citrus work so perfectly together! in my opinion, when it's dry it turns into a soft, clean, almost powdery floral.

this is one of those scents where you keep trying to figure out what smells sooooo good and then you realize, it's you!!! you won't draw attention to yourself by wearing it but, people will definitely be wanting to lean in to you to get a better sniff!

for me, living grace is a comforting, soothing scent--similar to the way wearing baby grace is like a big hug, pure grace is fresh out of the shower clean, and amazing grace is feminine and pretty.

I just now ordered the matching body emulsion! I can't wait to layer!

thank you, philosophy!!!

p.s. please make a regular spritz in this scent, this would be a beautiful scent to spray my sheets with at night!!!

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText:
living grace is my favorite of all the new philosophy fragrances. this is a true philosophy fragrance that smells like i expect a philosophy fragrance to smell. it is smooth, calm, nuturing, soft, doesn't induce headaches and makes me feel good when i wear it.

i love the lilly of the valley smell in living grace, it is done perfectly. it is not a sweet floral, and that is what i really like about it. this is a very clean, fresh green scent. it smells wonderful, and is the best "green" fragrance i've worn, it is so refreshing. the first notes out of the bottle are pure lilly of the valley and citrus, then it has a wonderful dry down that is soft and clean and not overpowering. it has wonderful staying power, it lasts a long time on me.

i like eternal grace, because it too is a green fragrance, but i think living grace is better. living grace has more body and fuller green notes to it, it really is the quintensential spring scent, but great any tine of the year.

i really think after pure grace this is the cleanest, freshest smelling scent philosophy has done. i just love it and am glad to have another true graceful grace.

Title: The best

Description: living grace spray fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, is deeply sensuous, multi-sensory and truly a heavenly inspiration. living grace is an ethereal, clean fragrance of fresh neroli to create uplifting feelings of vibrancy, soft, clean lily of the valley brings a sense of gratitude and sensuous, warm musk embraces you to the beauty of living in the present moment each day.
ReviewText:
i received this as a gift from philosophy. thank you for such a lovely surprise, philosophy! as i've been wearing this over the past month, i've really been intrigued and taken in by this scent. Living grace seems to be very different from all my other Grace fragrances, but yet it still feels like it belongs to the Grace family.

The first notes are strong but clean, with a feeling of brightness or a floral-touched green that makes me feel refreshed when i first spray it on. as the scent starts to develop, the fragrance really touches my senses with a floral musk that hints at a little sexiness!

i have been struggling to put my finger on what makes living grace a little more unique than the other fragrances, and i think it is because All the different notes are blended together so well ... you can get a sense of each one and single them out, yet none of them overpower the rest!

throughout the day, i keep catching myself sniffing my arm - i can't believe how intoxicating and addictive this scent is to me!

i'm very happy to say how well this fragrance lasts. it is stronger than the rest of the graces, but not so strong that it becomes overpowering to those around you.

i've been wearing living grace more now as the weather is starting to turn more to fall ... with it's complexity and intensity, it just seems to be perfect for the fall and winter season!
Title: living grace fragrance

Description:
The Aqua Allegoria are among Guerlain's most emblematic fragrance collections. Their launch in 1999 was a bold gamble. That of taking nature as sole muse and creating a unique olfactory genre: the first collection of eau fraîche in perfumery.

Pera Granita is a juicy and cheerful Eau de Toilette, a walk among the garden of the Hesperides. 

Its pure and refined bottle with a golden mesh celebrates the iconic Guerlain Bee Bottle.
ReviewText: A beautiful fresh scent perfect for fall!! I am never disappointed with any Guerlain perfumes.
Title: Guerlain

Description:
Pi is a celebration of what makes a man seductive - his intelligence, courage, and contributions. Pi is more than a name, it's a symbol. 
Givenchy fragrances tell an eternal, timeless story. Pi; beyond infinity. The pi man is a precursor; his thoughts always take him to the limits of the possible and the unknown. He is characterised by a warm sensitivity and emanates balance and serenity.
ReviewText: I bought this for my Husband and I will follow him anywhere.  Such a refreshing fragrance, not to bold.  He has been asked what fragrance he is wearing by other women.  I would wear this as well, it is not fragrance that screams "man". But an all around beautiful scent.
Title: Just Delicious!!
