ReviewText: The bottle will look amazing on your dresser and this one is a classic from the 70's... but it is NASTY! Smells worse than Deeps Woods OFF and Muskol! I've heard that it depends on your own pheromones though. Never worked with mine.
Title: A nasty classic

ReviewText:
The description on this scent might have you thinking you'll start smelling like Marlon Brando in his prime; all sexiness and bad boy vibes. But this cologne smells like straight up diesel oil, and if thats what you like have at it, but I can't guarantee women will be fauning over you like they did Mr. Brando.
This might be the real world embodiment of Sex Panter from Anchorman.
Title: I Gagged

Description:
Radiant, Voluptuous, Addictive
The top note opens with a sun-kissed, radiant orange blossom, a true ode to light. The middle note develops into jasmine absolute -a legendary flower in perfumery- revealing voluptuousness and elegance that combines with a pure, modern patchouli heart. The base note unfolds into a cedar wood accord adding character and a lingering trail, while the honey rose envelops the composition in a beautifully addictive note.
ReviewText: It took me over 50 years of sampling perfumes to settle on one that would be my "signature scent".  This glorious scent, with its orange blossom and jasmine, is absolutely stunning.  Not too overpowering, and long lasting.
Title: Absolutly Gorgeous!

Description:
Radiant, Voluptuous, Addictive
The top note opens with a sun-kissed, radiant orange blossom, a true ode to light. The middle note develops into jasmine absolute -a legendary flower in perfumery- revealing voluptuousness and elegance that combines with a pure, modern patchouli heart. The base note unfolds into a cedar wood accord adding character and a lingering trail, while the honey rose envelops the composition in a beautifully addictive note.
ReviewText: I love this perfume! Tried it as a sample and loved it enough to buy a full bottle. The scent is subtle and not overpowering, which makes it appropriate for the work place. It also lasts a long time without wearing off.
Title: Smells amazing!

ReviewText: The perfume is my regular perfume and I love it, but even more impressive was the care with which it was shipped: it was in a special blue box wrapped in tissue carefully and the sample gifts were in a small mesh bag - totally high-end and impressive - especially compared with the way The Bay ships.
Title: Love my perfume, but especially loved the shipping

Product Name: Gucci Guilty Intense Eau de Parfum Spray
Description: An intensified olfactory experience, Gucci Guilty Intense adds a twist to Gucci Guilty, making it more provocative and sensual. Guilty Intense is a warm yet striking oriental floral, which opens to a natural rush of mandarin shimmering alongside an audacious fist of pink pepper. The middle notes are a floral signature of the lilac flower, enriched with violet accents and hints of powdery notes, and balanced by a vibrant burst of peach. The base of addictive patchouli and the unique ambery dry-down have been greatly enhanced for a darker and more provocative trail.
ReviewText: I absolutely love this perfume! It has an amazing scent and it lasts, definitely recommend if you're looking for a new perfume
Title: Amazing scent

Product Name: Gucci Bamboo Eau de Parfum Spray
Description: Mirroring the Gucci Woman`s confident persona, the fragrance is soft and intense at once. The duality is expressed with strong notes that resonate through the heart and base. Deep Sandalwood, heady Tahitian Vanilla and unique grey Amber accords strike a complementary contrast with the inherent femininity found in exotic floral notes of sensual Casablanca Lily, feminine Orange Blossom and delicate Ylang Ylang.
ReviewText: It's a conservative / ladylike floral musk, not too strong, not too sweet, hyper-clean. The lasting power is reasonable enough, If I didn't know, I'd have pegged it as an Eau de Toilette instead of an Eau de Parfum.
Title: Ho Hum

Description:
The « French style elegance » of Hubert de Givenchy and the « American spontaneity » of Audrey Hepburn interlace to create : Very Irrésistible Givenchy. 
A tribute to Givenchy's early days when fashion and cinema were intertwined, Very Irrésistible Givenchy unites the elegant tradition of French style with the energy and pop-culture pizzazz of American film. "Hollywood Glamour".
Experience Very Irrésistible Givenchy today and discover your own irresistibility.
ReviewText: I discovered this scent as a beauty boutique sample and fell in love with it. A light and delicate scent, with some bright floral notes that linger but don't overpower. This has quickly become my new favourite!

Product Name: Amor Amor Eau De Toilette Spray
Description: The sparkling head notes carry a citrus-and-black currant scent all the way to the base. In the middle, we discover a fruity, sensual freshness born of a blend of jasmine and apricot. The seductive, mouth watering finish unites powerful notes of vanilla, musk and sandalwood.
ReviewText: I won this in a contest basket that I split with my mum and I just LOVE love love this as my every day scent. It's the perfect blend of spice and nice, and the scent lasts you all day long, no need to re-apply after two spritzes.
Title: My every day go to!

Product Name: Amor Amor Eau De Toilette Spray
Description: The sparkling head notes carry a citrus-and-black currant scent all the way to the base. In the middle, we discover a fruity, sensual freshness born of a blend of jasmine and apricot. The seductive, mouth watering finish unites powerful notes of vanilla, musk and sandalwood.
ReviewText: Bought this for the first time years ago, my second perfume addiction, and wear it still-keep an extra bottle in case they ever discontinue (but how could they?) I never want to be without this one!

Description: Yves Saint Laurent Beauté introduces a new sparkling fragrance, inspired by Paris, the city of intense love. Red berries and pear immediately exude sensuality and femininity. The exotic white Datura flower, the soul of the fragrance, embodies desire and seduces the senses. Finally, this modern and daring floral scent is balanced by creamy white musks and patchouli. A passionate and unforgettable whirlwind journey to Paris.
ReviewText: I just bought this and it's my new favorite, I wore it to work and got many compliments. It's not overly heavy just soft and feminine, love, love, love it.
Title: Gorgeous Fragrance

Description: Yves Saint Laurent Beauté introduces a new sparkling fragrance, inspired by Paris, the city of intense love. Red berries and pear immediately exude sensuality and femininity. The exotic white Datura flower, the soul of the fragrance, embodies desire and seduces the senses. Finally, this modern and daring floral scent is balanced by creamy white musks and patchouli. A passionate and unforgettable whirlwind journey to Paris.
ReviewText: It is not so sweet as to cross over into the gourmand category (it is not as sweet or loud as Dior's new Poison Girl). With plenty of fruit at the beginning,(watery)  florals in the heart which are relatively transparent, and the  "chypre" base, likewise clean and pale, it is completely done. The pink fruity category has not been neglected on perfume counters lately, and perhaps as a consequence, I found Mon Paris rather dull and faceless. The lasting power is just fine.
Title: Wearable

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Intense Eau De Parfum
Description: A new flower in the bouquet of fine delicacies. La vie est belle intense is an exclusive reinterpretation of the iconic scent with a remarkable note of Tuberose, the noble white flower of sensuality.
ReviewText: I ordered a 200ml bottle for my mom as her birthday present, since this has been her signature scent for a while. But as soon as I opened the box, I found the bottle cap was detached and broken to two parts, and the top nuzzle also fell off. For a 200+ dollar perfume, this is so unacceptable! I just hate to call the customer service and go through all inconvenience of returning, I have to glue the broken part together. Fortunately, the juicy inside is still as good as usual, I will just keep it myself and buy something else for my mom's birthday. I will not shop at this site again! so disappointed!
Title: bad luck or no quality control?

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Intense Eau De Parfum
Description: A new flower in the bouquet of fine delicacies. La vie est belle intense is an exclusive reinterpretation of the iconic scent with a remarkable note of Tuberose, the noble white flower of sensuality.
ReviewText: I was given my first bottle as a gift and loved it, so once I ran out I got another one. Within a month it went from a pinkish color, to a gross orange color and it smelled awful! I stored it exactly the same as the last one (in a box in the cupboard at room temp). I don't know if I got a bad batch or something. I went back to where I bought it, but they said they couldn't do anything about perfumes and I'd have to contact Lancome. I'm really disappointed.
Title: Turned orange and spoiled (?) within a month

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Intense Eau De Parfum
Description: A new flower in the bouquet of fine delicacies. La vie est belle intense is an exclusive reinterpretation of the iconic scent with a remarkable note of Tuberose, the noble white flower of sensuality.
ReviewText: The first time I smelled this fragrance in a magazine strip of all places I knew I had finally found my new fragrance. This is feminine, but with just the right amount of sexy to make it a grown womans fragrance. When I walk into my room later in the evening and catch a whiff of this still in the air I can't help but inhale, I love this. If I had one caution it would be not to overdo this as a little goes a long way.
Title: Finally

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Intense Eau De Parfum
Description: A new flower in the bouquet of fine delicacies. La vie est belle intense is an exclusive reinterpretation of the iconic scent with a remarkable note of Tuberose, the noble white flower of sensuality.
ReviewText: It makes me beautiful inside and in every scent and way...Living life is all about the way you feel and how you communicate with others, each individual has such a great part on the whole picture...Do you know what I mean? Looking good and smelling great does so much for the morale, this essential scent leaves its' mark in such a feminine and noteworthy way...
Title: La Dolce Vita

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Intense Eau De Parfum
Description: A new flower in the bouquet of fine delicacies. La vie est belle intense is an exclusive reinterpretation of the iconic scent with a remarkable note of Tuberose, the noble white flower of sensuality.
ReviewText: Love this fragrance. I always get compliments when I wear it. It is floral and spicy at the same time. Excellent all year long as it is more floral in the summer and musky in the winter. I have tried all the variations of the original scent and although I prefer the original, the entire La Vie Est Belle line is fabulous. Long lasting but not overpowering.
Title: Always get compliments when I wear La Vie Est Belle

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Intense Eau De Parfum
Description: A new flower in the bouquet of fine delicacies. La vie est belle intense is an exclusive reinterpretation of the iconic scent with a remarkable note of Tuberose, the noble white flower of sensuality.
ReviewText: I LOVE how there is a fragrance for me that is my own when I spray it on! I will be 40 this year and I was looking for a more mature, sexy spicy, warm scent that defined me as I am. I turning a new chapter in my life. Also, I love Julia Roberts and the meaning she gave this perfume by the name of the fragrance.
Title: Ageless Beauty

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Intense Eau De Parfum
Description: A new flower in the bouquet of fine delicacies. La vie est belle intense is an exclusive reinterpretation of the iconic scent with a remarkable note of Tuberose, the noble white flower of sensuality.
ReviewText: I went to the Bay looking for a new fragrance when a cosmetician handed me a blotter... Out of everything new I have tried this was by far the most beautiful! I have gotten so many compliments I lost count, absolutely love "La vie est belle," and yes life is beautiful with this fragrance!!

Description: The essence of a classic. Acqua di Gio Essenza Eau De Parfum, a more intense and sensual interpretation of Acqua di Gio. At its heart is the blend of two new extraordinary elements: Cascalone, with fresh and powerful aquatic accents, and the luminous Paradisone, which brings out each of the fragrance’s subtle notes. All the founding elements are present, reinvented to create a more vibrant, sensual fragrance.
ReviewText: I bought this for my boyfriend and he loves it but not as much as me! It's a classic scent that's super fresh and smells so clean.
Title: Smells oh so good!

Description: The essence of a classic. Acqua di Gio Essenza Eau De Parfum, a more intense and sensual interpretation of Acqua di Gio. At its heart is the blend of two new extraordinary elements: Cascalone, with fresh and powerful aquatic accents, and the luminous Paradisone, which brings out each of the fragrance’s subtle notes. All the founding elements are present, reinvented to create a more vibrant, sensual fragrance.
ReviewText: Giorgio Armani Acqua Di Gio has become a modern classic over the years. If you wear this one, many people will be able to identify it, as it has become a staple. It's very clean, citrusy, and smells marine like. I recommend Givenchy Blue over this one; I find them to be quite similar but Acqua Di Gio not as long lasting and less robust. Overall, it's still a wonderful cologne and has sold so well for a reason!
Title: Classic

Product Name: Nude by Rihanna Eau de Parfum 50 mL
Description: Third fragrance by Rihanna, Nude, is a reflection of her ever evolving style and multifaceted personality. Nude by Rihanna bares her sensual, but playful side; revealing a soft, modern interpretation of skin scent. It is a hypnotic fruity oriental scent that hooks the wearer in with a warm base. Nude is perfect to wear when you aren’t wearing anything at all. Discover the Eau de Parfum 50 mL spray.
ReviewText: I do love this purfume. Its affordable and it smells great. I wear it to work and everyone tells me i smell really good! The only thing that i dont like is how it doesnt last long at all. After an hour you cant smell it anymore.
Title: Sweet scent

Description: A new wave shakes the MUGLER galaxy: it is the birth of a new astral body in the Angel constellation. A bold, bright, regressive, and unsettling woody fragrance that spreads a new irresistible gourmandise.
ReviewText: I absolutely love this perfume.  The scent is so soft and alluring. Most people stop and ask me what I am wearing. They say I smell sooo good. I feel soft and sexy when I wear this fragrance.
Title: Soft and Alluring

Description: A new wave shakes the MUGLER galaxy: it is the birth of a new astral body in the Angel constellation. A bold, bright, regressive, and unsettling woody fragrance that spreads a new irresistible gourmandise.
ReviewText: Let me start by saying I love the original Angel. I can understand why it is polarizing but for me it smells incredible. I believe Angel Muse will be somewhat less offensive to those who do not like Angel but that is not to say that this is not a complex perfume. It starts off quite strong but after 30 min it develops into a soft, beautiful mix of vanilla, whipped cream and vetiver. It's very sweet and addictive. It lasts about 12 hours on me but after the first few hours it is a closer skin scent. Gourmand perfumes are my favourite and this one is definitely in my top 3.
Title: As good as the original!

Description: A new wave shakes the MUGLER galaxy: it is the birth of a new astral body in the Angel constellation. A bold, bright, regressive, and unsettling woody fragrance that spreads a new irresistible gourmandise.
ReviewText:
If you like the original Angel you'll love this! It starts out smelling a lot like the original then morphs into a soft warm version more floral then heavy patchouli.
This was my first time ordering from here but it certainly won't be the last, super fast shipping and this is $14.00 cheaper here than at "S" .

Thank-you 
Brenda Brock
Title: Givenchy-Hot Couture

ReviewText: I personally didn't find Hot Couture to be a particularly nuanced scent, but I like it okay. I'd rather purchase other perfumes but understand why so many women enjoy it. The top fruity notes do settle into creamy, sweet, floral territory but don't entirely disappear.   I would assume most women would wear this on a girls-night-out.

ReviewText: I received the parfum 4 days after I shopped it online. It's nice packed. The feature of the parfum is exactly same as I expected. Since this is the first time I shopped through beautyBOUTIQUE, somehow I didn't link my points card when I checked out. I brought the problem to its customer service via email. I was quickly replied and redeemed the points into my account. Thanks!
Title: Great online shopping experience

Description:
Dahlia Noir is a feminine and mysterious name referring to a flower that does not exist: the paradoxical black dahlia. Structured and rigorous, yet feminine and soft, the dahlia epitomizes Givenchy’s style.
True dahlias have no scent, leaving room for imagination and fantasy. The fragrance, created by François Demachy and Riccardo Tisci, has a distinctive personality, yet is reminiscent of a tradition of beauty and femininity.
ReviewText: Sometimes this scent smelt a little too medicinal on my skin, perhaps it was the 'powdery-ness' at the end. The starting citrus fruit smells is nice but at the end it returns to its patchouli styled base (not a fan). It's a fairly conventional smell, not unsophisticated, wearable and pleasant enough but I don't think anyone will be making a statement with this scent any time soon.
Title: A Woody Oriental

Description:
Dahlia Noir is a feminine and mysterious name referring to a flower that does not exist: the paradoxical black dahlia. Structured and rigorous, yet feminine and soft, the dahlia epitomizes Givenchy’s style.
True dahlias have no scent, leaving room for imagination and fantasy. The fragrance, created by François Demachy and Riccardo Tisci, has a distinctive personality, yet is reminiscent of a tradition of beauty and femininity.
ReviewText: If you like powdery perfumes you will like Dahlia Noir for sure. I was hoping for more darkness in it but all i get is powder with some flowery undertone. It smells good and clean suitable for day wear.
Title: Very Powdery

ReviewText: This is a big whollop of an oriental scent. Things like bay leaf and citrus start out first and strong but don't stick around. But Opium is really about the dry down smells like wood, balsam, tarragon, resins, and honey-tea. It definitely brings something new to the table as far as orientals go, and if you adore spicy scents try this one out.
Title: Big and Potent

Product Name: Daisy Dream Forever Eau De Parfum Spray
Description: Inspired by eternal blue skies, infinitely reaching and never-ending, Daisy Dream Forever embodies the youthful reverie and ethereal charm of Marc's dream girl. An elegant addition to the Daisy Dream fragrance family. Get lost in a dream with this irresistible eau de parfum. Daisy Dream Forever is a deeper interpretation of the signature's key notes of blackberry, blue wisteria and white woods which leave a lasting impression of luxurious floralcy, airy succulence and a velvety dream of a drydown.
ReviewText: I already used 2 bottles of this awsome perfune and ready to buy 3rd. I love this and wear every single day. It gives me the filling of freshness everytime

Product Name: Prada Amber Eau de Parfum Spray
Description: Prada Amber is highly feminine and highly personal, subtle yet meticulous, made from the highest quality ingredients and blended by the world's leading noses. It is a fragrance that the Prada woman knows she deserves, something instantly recognizable as unique and sensually evocative. Prada Amber reveals a new age in the history of Amber fragrances. The spirit of Amber, an inherent component of the roots of ancient perfumery, has been re-developed along four precise dimensions: pure, addictive, precious, and profound. Each quality is based on one ancestral ingredient: pure Sandalwood oil from India; addictive Patchouli leaves from Indonesia; precious Labdanum resin from France; profound Benzoin from Siam.
ReviewText: 'Amber' starts out very nicely, a little green and peppery, and dark herbal spicy notes. However after a while all I could smell was sickly sweet amber, it clung to me like static on a blanket and reminded me of churches. Not only that but it reminded me of too many other scents I've owned so I couldn't justify purchasing it. I can't stress it enough for a person to try first on the wrist then see how the day progresses before buying this scent. As far as price goes, the small bottle is worth the $98, the $128 bottle not as much.
Title: Going to Church

Product Name: Anais Anais Eau De Toilette Spray
Description: The sparkling head notes carry a citrus-and-black currant scent all the way to the base. In the middle, we discover a fruity, sensual freshness born of a blend of jasmine and apricot. The seductive, mouth watering finish unites powerful notes of vanilla, musk and sandalwood.
ReviewText: This scent is  a light airy floral with hint of citrus.  I really enjoy this scent because of how light it is, however , don't mistake lightness for staying power!  This scent lasts all day on me with just a couple of sprays.  I have not worn this fragrance since last summer but I was standing in a store  behind a woman who was wearing this and I immediately thought of summer.  When I got home I put some on right away,  This beautiful scent almost made me forget that it was -20 and a winter day.  Why wait for summer!?
Title: Reminds me of summer!

Product Name: Anais Anais Eau De Toilette Spray
Description: The sparkling head notes carry a citrus-and-black currant scent all the way to the base. In the middle, we discover a fruity, sensual freshness born of a blend of jasmine and apricot. The seductive, mouth watering finish unites powerful notes of vanilla, musk and sandalwood.
ReviewText: THE CACHAREL-ANAIS ANAIS EAU DE TOILETTE SPRAY CONTINUES TO BE MY MOTHER'S FOREVER MUST HAVE "FRAGRANCE" ABOVE ALL OTHERS FOR OVER 50 YEARS!! THIS ONE OF A KIND FRAGRANCE HAS FRESH AND SUDDLE BLENDS OF VANILLA,MUSK AND JASMINE FOR ALL WOMEN WANTING THE PERFECT FRAGRANCE AND CAN RECOGNIZE, TRUE CLASS!! TRADITIONALLY BOTTLED WITH A WELCOME IMPRESSION OF SOFTNESS AND AND BLENDED FRESHNESS. A TRADITIONALLY PERFECT CHOICE FOR ANY WOMAN
Title: MOM'S PERFECT FIND

Description: Reflecting the art of craftsmanship with a modern edge, John Varvatos ARTISAN is a refreshing composition of ingredients. The scent opens with a citrus explosion developing into a spicy, floral blend that delves into a long lasting woody and masculine.
ReviewText:
Holy smokes if you want an alternative to the usual makers of male-centric colognes then this is one for you. Light and refreshing yet still woodsy and masculine I can guarantee that this scent is worth every penny you pay.
If you want, search for the sample collectors set, this one was my favourite but I liked every single one of them. If you like citrus style woodsy colognes this one is for you.
Title: This. Scent. You Guys.

Description: The delicious new floral by Dior. Bright and colourful, Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming is a floral delight you return to over and over.  A positive and joyful harmony for a playful and irresistible Miss Dior. "Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming is an instant present  for you. It is a beautiful gift that strikes you immediately." François Demachy, Dior Perfumer Creator
ReviewText:
This has become my favorite perfume ever! I used to have the old Miss Dior Cherie a long time ago, but then I was not impressed with the reformulation and didn't care about the Miss Dior line anymore... until I discovered the Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming.
This perfume smell classy, luxurious and very sexy. I hope it's not gonna be a limited edition because I would definitely love to buy it again!
Title: My favorite perfume

Description: The delicious new floral by Dior. Bright and colourful, Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming is a floral delight you return to over and over.  A positive and joyful harmony for a playful and irresistible Miss Dior. "Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming is an instant present  for you. It is a beautiful gift that strikes you immediately." François Demachy, Dior Perfumer Creator
ReviewText: I bought blooming bouquet and love it, but this is an amazing addition to your fragrance wardrobe! It's similar to blooming bouquet but less sweet, more musky and perfect for evening or to wear with a business suit & heels!
Title: A more sophisticated bouquet!

Description: The delicious new floral by Dior. Bright and colourful, Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming is a floral delight you return to over and over. ReviewText: This is a lovely scent! My boyfriend loves when I wear this!
Title: Lovely

Description: The delicious new floral by Dior. Bright and colourful, Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming is a floral delight you return to over and over.  A positive and joyful harmony for a playful and irresistible Miss Dior. "Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming is an instant present  for you. It is a beautiful gift that strikes you immediately." François Demachy, Dior Perfumer Creator
ReviewText: My hubby got this for me as a birthday present, late August. I was a little nervous to try this because I'm not into the floral types of perfume but this one is actually really nice. The scent is not overpowering at all. It's very subtle and refreshing when sprayed directly on your skin. It did last all day for me. A little sweet but very gentle on your nose. It's so worth it :)
Title: Worth it!

Description: The delicious new floral by Dior. Bright and colourful, Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming is a floral delight you return to over and over. ReviewText: Came across this for the first time at the airport and fell in love! This fragrance is such a beautiful, delicate scent perfect for those who, like me, don't like too 'girly' or too 'fruity' a scent but still enjoys that light delicious fragrance. Love!
Title: Absolutely Divine!

Description: The delicious new floral by Dior. Bright and colourful, Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming is a floral delight you return to over and over. ReviewText: My favourite summer perfume for sure. Smells beautiful and Isn't too strong
Title: Refreshing

Product Name: Lacoste Essential Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: The patented time-release technology in this unique fragrance results in the slow release of fresh, energetic top notes of tangerine, bergamot, tomato leaves, and cassis. This energetic burst will be experienced throughout the length of the day, in combination with woody base notes of patchouli and sandalwood that produce a totally unique fragrance experience. The fragrance is "reanimated" as your body heat rises during sports, walking, or simply rubbing the skin.
ReviewText: Bought this as a gift for my husband. Not too strong smelling.  Great price point!
Title: Light and Crisp!

Description: An intensified Cashmere Mist – The sheer scent inspired by the feel of cashmere upon a woman's skin, this fragrance combines Moroccan jasmine, lily of the valley and bergamot with warm undertones of sandalwood, amber and musk.
ReviewText: I tried this Scent at my local Beauty Boutique and I must say that this is my favorite perfume ever! It's such a nice, clean & crisp, light fragrance. Great signature scent and all you need is one Spritz...Enjoy!
Title: Love this Scent!

Description: An intensified Cashmere Mist – The sheer scent inspired by the feel of cashmere upon a woman's skin, this fragrance combines Moroccan jasmine, lily of the valley and bergamot with warm undertones of sandalwood, amber and musk.
ReviewText: Have been using it for years! Powdery and not too sweet. Used to use Chanel 5 prior to this. Love the scent that lasts and also use the DK deodorant in the same scent.
Title: Great product!

Description: An intensified Cashmere Mist – The sheer scent inspired by the feel of cashmere upon a woman's skin, this fragrance combines Moroccan jasmine, lily of the valley and bergamot with warm undertones of sandalwood, amber and musk.
ReviewText: Bought this recently. I tend to be allergic to strong perfumes and hate reapplying perfumes that wear off. This one is light and only requires a couple of squirts and you're good for the day. Love it.
Title: Lasts long

Product Name: La Petite Robe Noire Eau de Parfum
Description: In La Petite Robe Noire’s perfume wardrobe, I am the Original Dress. A perfumed creation by Guerlain: An eau de parfum embroidered of the most beautiful "black" notes of perfumery. The legendary "heart-shaped" bottle has been boldly reinterpreted with a modern touch. Its crystalline transparency, fading from black to powdery pink, reveals an iconic little black dress. I am absolutely essential and utterly irresistible. I am the chic and very glamorous perfumed creation by Guerlain. I am La Petite Robe Noire.
ReviewText: While I like the red-fruit top note of this perfume and the bergamot that comes after, I'm not as big a fan of licorice with cherry as others so this isn't a scent for me. I'd say grab a sampler first if you can before deciding on a full bottle.
Title: Get a Sample First

Product Name: La Petite Robe Noire Eau de Parfum
Description: In La Petite Robe Noire’s perfume wardrobe, I am the Original Dress. A perfumed creation by Guerlain: An eau de parfum embroidered of the most beautiful "black" notes of perfumery. The legendary "heart-shaped" bottle has been boldly reinterpreted with a modern touch. Its crystalline transparency, fading from black to powdery pink, reveals an iconic little black dress. I am absolutely essential and utterly irresistible. I am the chic and very glamorous perfumed creation by Guerlain. I am La Petite Robe Noire.
ReviewText: So i tried samples, and kept coming back to smell it, ended up buying the smallest size imaginable, wore it ALMOST every day for a year (i like to collect a bunch of different scents, but this was like an absolute fave of mine), and i'm just waiting to get a bigger size that will last longer. IT SMELLS SO GOOD, it's flowery yet sophisticated and it really did the trick as an everyday and even an evening scent depending on the application
Title: Simply dying to get this again

Product Name: La Petite Robe Noire Eau de Parfum

ReviewText: I bought this over a year ago at one of the Beauty Boutiques. I sampled many perfumed that day and kept coming back to this scent so I went with it. It's my first Guerlain and I really love it, the cherry is amazing and unique.....recommend for sure!
Title: Not your average perfume!

Product Name: Lacoste Touch of Pink Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: A breath of freedom infuses this sensual, carefree Lacoste eau de toilette. Its fresh and delicate notes will appeal to an independent and elegant woman.
ReviewText: This is a perfume that I have been used for over 10 years! I love how subtle yet recognizable the scent it. Its not overly strong so it is perfect for everyday where. I think this perfume is a crowdpleaser--it fits with most peoples scent preferences! Would definitely recommend, especially if you're looking for your first perfume!
Title: A crowdpleaser

Product Name: Lacoste Touch of Pink Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: A breath of freedom infuses this sensual, carefree Lacoste eau de toilette. Its fresh and delicate notes will appeal to an independent and elegant woman.
ReviewText: I have tried many perfumes over time and I have never found one that I like more. It's so awesome. I hope it never gets discontinued because it is my Holy Grail, Ride or Die!!!!
Title: This is my ALL TIME FAVORITE FRAGRANCE!!!

Description: Part of our iconic Big Pony fragrance collection, this eau de toilette spray comes in a colorful bottle with signature details.
ReviewText: Big pony # 2 has to be the best scent of all the big pony collection. It's light, lasting, and an everyday scent. I smelled this as a sample and can't get it out of mind. The sample is almost done and I will be splurging on a big bottle.
Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE

Product Name: Viva La Juicy Noir Eau de Parfum Spay
Description: Bold. Sensual. Arresting. Viva La Juicy Noir embodies the woman who is dangerous in a good way. Unapologetic, she takes risks and gets rewarded. Leave a lasting impression with Viva La Juicy Noir, because the nighttime is full of endless possibilities.
ReviewText: I HAD THIS PURCHASED FOR ME AS A GIFT LAST CHRISTMAS. THIS IS THE LONGEST LASTING PERFUME I HAVE EVER HAD. IT LASTED ME AT LEAST THE WHOLE YEAR. NICE AND STRONG THE WAY I LIKE IT. THIS WAS MY FAVORITE VIVA LA JUICY PRODUCT. IF YOU LIKE POWERFUL PERFUME WITH REALLY NICE SMELL, GIVE THIS ONE A TRY.
Title: EXCELLENT PERFUME

Product Name: Viva La Juicy Noir Eau de Parfum Spay
Description: Bold. Sensual. Arresting. Viva La Juicy Noir embodies the woman who is dangerous in a good way. Unapologetic, she takes risks and gets rewarded. Leave a lasting impression with Viva La Juicy Noir, because the nighttime is full of endless possibilities.
ReviewText: I have always been a huge fan of juicy couture purfumes but this has to be my absolute favourite. I cant get enough of it and will be purchasing it for years to come! I would not reccomend juicy couture perfume to anyone who doesnt like sweet scents.
Title: All time favourite

ReviewText: This is such a sweet, sultry, sexy scent! I loved the Viva La Juicy but I have a new favorite!!
Title: Love!

Description: Twenty years after the creation of Trésor, Lancôme reveals Trésor In Love and writes a new story: the treasured moment when everything starts, a liberated spirit of romance conveyed with floral notes. Both luminous and vibrant, sensual and radiant, Trésor in Love is a soaring hymn to love... The heroine of Trésor in Love lives her love story with a disarming spontaneity. Like the mixed feelings of a young woman in love, when the infinite sweetness of the meeting becomes confused with the intensity of the feelings, the juice of Trésor in Love is made with many contrasts: a new irresistible floral, composed of a touch of nectarine and wood of cedar, a characteristic rose and a bright jasmine.
ReviewText: This is the ultimate day time fragrance for any occasion whether it be work or play! I wear it daily and it has become my signature scent.
Title: My signature scent

Description: Tempting. Delightful. Indulgent. Treat your sweet tooth with Viva la Juicy Sucré, a fresh indulgence for the enticingly delightful Viva girl.  The fragrance instantly takes you to a decadent patisserie where you can live in the moment without holding back and never forget to  #EatDessertFirst.
ReviewText:
I bought this for myself as I'm a huge Juicy Couture fan!
The bottle is pure eye candy!! Whimsical and elegant- all wrapped up into one amazing bottle!
The scent is sweet, light and happy- like walking into a little patisserie in Paris!!
Title: Candy without calories!

ReviewText: This product went as a great addition to my other Juicy fragrances. It smells very similar to Viva La Juicy but much sweeter! The bottle is cute - as always. Its a definite bonus to my display.
Title: Loved it!

ReviewText: Very nice perfume! If you like the other juicy perfumes, then you will definitely like this one. Sweeter smell for sure (hence the name) but a must have for my perfume collection.

Description: Insolence Eau de Toilette embodies a sparkling sensuality for a spontaneous, free and bold woman. An impertinent, floral, and fruity creation which is built around an overdose of violet, orange blossom, and red berry notes. Created by the sculptor Serge Mansau, the Insolence bottle seems carved in light. Nothing comes between the glass and the radiance it captures. Body, neck, cap: these three half-spheres form a triple revolution around themselves.
ReviewText: This is lovely for day or evening.i have wore this for years. It's my signature parfumerie. I am older but I get complements all the time even from younger ladies.
Title: Soft and subtle

ReviewText: I got a sample of this perfume and loved it!  The scent is feminine, but not strong and stays all day, without being overpowering, definitely on my to buy list.
Title: Amazing scent!

ReviewText: this fragrance is really nice....very light, and something you can wear every day. Not sickeningly sweet or too florally like some heavt perfumes.
Title: Smells great

Product Name: I Love Juicy Couture Eau de parfum Spray
Description: I Love Juicy Couture reveals another facet of the modern Juicy Couture girl’s persona. She does not love half heartedly or lightly, timidly or passively. Channeling her dynamic and bold nature, she conveys her unwavering sense of self and passion for life, love and all things Juicy Couture with this daring new scent from Juicy Couture.
ReviewText:
I got this a few months ago and I am completely in love with it!!
You only need a few sprays and the scent lasts all day long. 
I am so in love with the scent! It is awesome.
Title: I love it!!

Product Name: I Love Juicy Couture Eau de parfum Spray
Description: I Love Juicy Couture reveals another facet of the modern Juicy Couture girl’s persona. She does not love half heartedly or lightly, timidly or passively. ReviewText: I purchased this a couple of weeks ago and I love the scent!  Juicy Couture never disappoints!
Title: Perfect for Fall/Winter!

Product Name: I Love Juicy Couture Eau de parfum Spray
Description: I Love Juicy Couture reveals another facet of the modern Juicy Couture girl’s persona. She does not love half heartedly or lightly, timidly or passively. ReviewText: I bought it for a Christmas gift, so I don't if the person I bought it for will like it or not
Title: loved the bottle design

Product Name: Embrace Rose Buds & Vanilla Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Sophisticated. Intimate. Romantic. A fragrance of desire. A modern vision inspired by timeless sophistication. A collection of 3 fragrances that evokes the intimacy and emotion of Vera Wang.
ReviewText: So I have personally only tried this on a tester card so I cant say how it reacts on my skin but I sure plan on giving it another try to find out!. When I sprayed this in the store, the very top note of this fragrance starts out as a burst of real rose bud but soft, also getting a hint of sweet vanilla. I thought it was nice but then when I arrived home 30 mins later I smelt it again and said Mmm! The up front rose note had stepped back and really let the vanilla shine through with just a soft touch of the Rose lingering. If there was such a thing as a "Rose cupcake" this would be the scent!. Not in a sugary way but in a vanilla batter way. This fragrance needs to be praised more!. Love it.
Title: Mmm...

Product Name: Embrace Rose Buds & Vanilla Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Sophisticated. Intimate. Romantic. A fragrance of desire. A modern vision inspired by timeless sophistication. A collection of 3 fragrances that evokes the intimacy and emotion of Vera Wang.
ReviewText: Beautiful scent; such a find! How can you go wrong with vanilla and rosebuds? On my second bottle, and I have a huge fragrance selection.
Title: A new favourite!

Description: HONEY channels the eclectic appeal of Marc's DOT signature and adds her own golden touch. HONEY is a sunny enticing floral - happy and energetic with a touch of the unexpected. It energizes with the freshness of green pear, the sparkling femininity of honeysuckle and peach brighten the heart, while honey and vanilla offer a smooth warm golden base.
ReviewText: Out of all of Marc Jacobs' newest scents this is the one I enjoyed the most. Aim for a sample box first and see where it goes from there, but I really enjoyed this one. The honeysuckle is a fantastic smell with the vanilla not being overbearing. One spritz of this is all you'll need though, trust me on that, otherwise you may find it cloyingly sweet. Heck if a guy isn't too 'manly' and he enjoyed this one too I'd say go for it. Completely worth the price for an Eau du Parfum
Title: Enjoyed the most

Description: HONEY channels the eclectic appeal of Marc's DOT signature and adds her own golden touch. HONEY is a sunny enticing floral - happy and energetic with a touch of the unexpected. It energizes with the freshness of green pear, the sparkling femininity of honeysuckle and peach brighten the heart, while honey and vanilla offer a smooth warm golden base.
ReviewText: I can't wear any other perfume now! This one smells so absolutely amazing, like I'm in a meadow in a fairy tale (I'm a little obsessed with all things enchanted :P). I absolutely love everything in the Daisy perfume line. I also have an allergic reaction to a lot of perfumes (not hives, but a lot of them make me sneeze) and I'm totally alright with this one.
Title: The best

Description: HONEY channels the eclectic appeal of Marc's DOT signature and adds her own golden touch. HONEY is a sunny enticing floral - happy and energetic with a touch of the unexpected. It energizes with the freshness of green pear, the sparkling femininity of honeysuckle and peach brighten the heart, while honey and vanilla offer a smooth warm golden base.
ReviewText: I wanted a clean, fresh-smelling light scent. That's exactly what I found in this perfume. I have worn it every day  since I bought it a month ago.
Title: fresh scent

Product Name: Ange ou Démon Le Secret Eau de Parfum
Description:
Experience Givenchy's best kept secret.
Fresh and luminous, the fragrance faithfully reflects its inspiration's transparency and delicacy. The result is an unmistakable signature, very Givenchy.
ReviewText: This is my third bottle of this perfume and it is my favourite go to scent. It is a unique scent that is not to sweet but fresh and intriguing. I get complimented on this perfume regularly. The price point is high but well worth it
Title: Sexy and fresh

Description: Introducing Jimmy Choo MAN, the first fragrance for men from Jimmy Choo. A powerfully fresh and modern fragrance, created for a confident and refined man with a rebellious spirit. It captures the independant attitude of the dynamic and urban Jimmy Choo Man: emphasizing his classic elegance with a modern twist. His fragrance is his ultimate accessory, complementing his innate sense of style.
ReviewText: My fiance wears this cologne and I love how it smells. It's fresh and light without making him smell like he bathes in it. Definitely a must buy.
Title: Smells Amazing

Product Name: Eau de Lacoste L.12.12 Pour Elle Natural Eau de Toilette Spray
Description:
The lightness and natural elegance of the LACOSTE pleated skirt has been captured in a collection of fresh, uplifting scents. EAU DE LACOSTE L.12.12 Pour Elle is a trio of fragrances reflecting the three moods of the LACOSTE woman: Sparkling, Elegant, and Natural.

EAU DE LACOSTE L.12.12 Pour Elle Natural is uplifting, authentic, warm—and yet constantly surprising. Coconut accord wraps its warming feel around a delicate construction of raspberry leaves, mandarin and pineapple. The powdery notes of orris bring a long-lasting soul to a fresh, light scent. Discreet yet addictive.
ReviewText: I was looking for a nice fresh light summer scent and stumbled onto this when I was buying the hubby his Lacoste cologne.  I typically wear Viva La Juicy Noir but find it a bit strong for spring summer.  This scent has similar notes but has a fresher fruitier scent and less of the sweet strong gourmand notes of the juicy.  Im really happy with this - just wish the scent had more staying power.
Title: Perfect summer scent

Description: dual scent fresh and warm coming together, first strike of electric freshness then a magnetic warmth on skin.

Description: Feminine. Flirty. Fun.  A blend of water hyacinth, princess lily,and sweet caramel, it’s a classic and daring scent that is worthy of being called Juicy. This fresh, fruity, floral is born in the glamorous USA, and fabulous everywhere.  For the classic Juicy girl who is FEARLESS in everything she does and making  a statement without trying.
ReviewText: I got this perfume for Christmas and I am in LOVE! I'm addicted! It smells like heaven. Since Christmas I have already purchased another one. It is well worth the price and the scent is long lasting. One spray goes a long way! Over amazing product. Highly recommend!
Title: Amazing Smell!

Product Name: Angel Eau de Toilette Refillable Comet
Description:
Empowering and seductive, with the same carnal sensuality... But with a new melody. More than just a difference in concentration, Angel Eau de Toilette is a unique harmony of scents.It has become an "Oriental - Gourmand - Powdery" scent, revealing new charms, woven together with softness and subtlety. Angel Eau de Toilette envelops you like a soft, sensual, carnal caress.
Succumb to a light addiction.
Size: 40 mL.
ReviewText: I love this perfume!! When I first smelt it on my friend, I was instantly drawn to it! Years later, I was at work and a customer came in with the perfume on. I was in love with the scent!! I asked her what it was and to my surprise, it was the same scent I liked on my friend. I had to buy it for myself! From that day one, it's my go to perfume. It has a hint of musk to it, with a bit of sweetness. Very feminine scent.
Title: My favourite perfume!

Description: Feel très soleil—every day! Clarins uplifting treatment fragrance—with sparkling twists of Mandarin, Grapefruit, Ylang-Ylang and Patchouli—captures the fun-loving essence of summer sun. Pampers and protects with hydrating Watermelon, soothing Mimosa, smoothing Camomile and Linden. Non-photosensitizing formula is safe enough to wear in the sun. Spray over Sunshine Fragrance Body Lotion to layer-on the good feelings.
ReviewText: I love this fragrance.....it's my "go to" bottle for a little smell of summer!
Title: Summer in a bottle!

Product Name: Viva La Juicy Gold Couture Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
A decadent rendition of Viva La Juicy that indulges the senses with luscious wild berries, a kiss of honeysuckle and a luxurious elixir of golden amber, melted caramel, and vanilla. Introducing Viva La Juicy Gold Couture, the latest scent from the Juicy Couture fragrance collection.
A decadent rendition of Viva La Juicy that indulges the senses with luscious wild berries, a kiss of honeysuckle and a luxurious elixir of golden amber, melted caramel, and vanilla. Packaged in a metallic gold carton with a vibrant pink embossed logo, Viva La Juicy Gold Couture is the ultimate statement of luxury – it’s simply unforgettable.
ReviewText: I bought this perfume a few weeks ago, and I absolutely love it! I previously used the regular viva la juicy, and they are similar but I personally I like this one a bit better. It's a sweet smelling perfume, and with only a few sprays, I can smell it for hours.
Title: Smells great!

Description: From the Mediterranean, epicentre of harmonies and contrasts, the classic perfume, Dolce & Gabbana Pour Femme, is reborn embodying the essence of the Dolce & Gabbana woman – passionate, sensual and maternal. For the woman that is aware of her strength and her instincts.

Title: Warm Sexy Vanilla/Cinnamon

Description:
An olfactory treasure captured in a gem-like bottle

Created in the purest spirit of contemporary fine jewellery, an exceptional bottle, crafted by Lancôme. Finely cut with an admirably symmetrical glass weight, its original form is inspired by 1952’s original Trésor, a raw diamond chiselled into 75 facets.

Like a radiant, scintillating gemstone, its transparency reveals all the seduction of a delicately pink-tinged fragrance. Its crowning adornment is a black satin rose tied around its neck, further enhancing the absolute seductiveness of this treasure of femininity.
ReviewText: I fell in love with this perfume the first time I smelled it. I put it on and it just kept smelling better and better. By the end of the day, I just had to get myself a bottle. The scent is just so beautiful. Even my man was impressed and kept giving me hugs all day... he said he couldn't get enough of me... ;P. I would most DEFINITELY recommend this perfume... and so would my man lol.
Title: Heaven in a bottle!

Description:
An olfactory treasure captured in a gem-like bottle

Created in the purest spirit of contemporary fine jewellery, an exceptional bottle, crafted by Lancôme. Finely cut with an admirably symmetrical glass weight, its original form is inspired by 1952’s original Trésor, a raw diamond chiselled into 75 facets.

Like a radiant, scintillating gemstone, its transparency reveals all the seduction of a delicately pink-tinged fragrance. Its crowning adornment is a black satin rose tied around its neck, further enhancing the absolute seductiveness of this treasure of femininity.
ReviewText: There is nothing negative about this perfume, it makes me smell absolutely amazing! lasts all day. Can be worn at work or a night out. it's overall amazing!!
Title: LOVE!!!

Description:
An olfactory treasure captured in a gem-like bottle

Created in the purest spirit of contemporary fine jewellery, an exceptional bottle, crafted by Lancôme. Finely cut with an admirably symmetrical glass weight, its original form is inspired by 1952’s original Trésor, a raw diamond chiselled into 75 facets.

Like a radiant, scintillating gemstone, its transparency reveals all the seduction of a delicately pink-tinged fragrance. Its crowning adornment is a black satin rose tied around its neck, further enhancing the absolute seductiveness of this treasure of femininity.
ReviewText:
This perfume was meant for me. Let me tell you why.
I got a sample of this fragrance, and I knew upon the first use that I had to have a full bottle of it. So I went and bought the 50 ML bottle. I'm blind, and I was quite surprised when I picked up the box and it said La Nuit Tresor in braille on the side of the box, underneath the wrapping. I don't know who's idea that was, but it's pretty unique and awesome!
This scent, to me, is the scent of desire. I get a glimmering note of lychee at the top, then it turns into a beautiful, deep vanilla with black rose. It smells so delicious and smooth, I can't stop sniffing my wrist. The longjevity is impressive. I sprayed it on at 5 p.m. and I could smell some base notes still at 7 a.m. the next morning. I also love the bottle. I obviously can't look at it, but I love the feel of it. It feels like a luxurious, fine gem with a silky rose.
This is my first Lancome fragrance I've bought, and I'm impressed. They've really knocked it out of the park. I will definitely recommend this to every lady I know! Thanks, Lancome!
Title: The scent is pure desire, and the bottle is beautiful!

Description:

ReviewText: I love this scent so much. Have used La vie est belle for a year & now this is my new love. The spray is so light & airy. I got the largest size & I'm really pleased i did as i wear it even for bed !

Description: The ARMANI CODE Satin fragrance celebrates youthful, exuberant femininity. A “Tasty Floriental,” its gourmand notes are lusciously addictive. The fragrance is tantalizing—pierced with a new and beautifully luminous neroli essence, exclusive to CODE Satin.
ReviewText: Just got this for my birthday from a family member and I must say...It's such a wonderful scent. It's fruity and so amazing and it lasts for such a long time! I will most definitely get this scent in the future!
Title: My new Signature Scent

Description: The ARMANI CODE Satin fragrance celebrates youthful, exuberant femininity. A “Tasty Floriental,” its gourmand notes are lusciously addictive. The fragrance is tantalizing—pierced with a new and beautifully luminous neroli essence, exclusive to CODE Satin.
ReviewText: I tried this scent while aimlessly trying others as well. But I kept going back to this gorgeous deep red bottle! The fragrance is very strong at first but not long after it settles down and you're left with a deep sensual gourmand fragrance. It's very warm and spicy but all things feminine! It's not cheap but worth the price with it's longevity and depth. So sweet yet so warm with almost a cinnamon like fragrance to it. I think the ginger gives it something that makes it stand out. Love love love.......
Title: Definitely my Signature scent!

Product Name: Rogue by Rihanna Eau de Parfum 75 mL
Description:
PUSH BOUNDARIES.  BE BOLD.  GO ROGUE.
ROGUE by Rihanna is a feminine composition that captures the mischievous nature that lies within every modern woman.  An unexpected combination of feminine jasmine, plum and patchouli for a fragrance that captures Rihanna’s unexpected style, to be discovered in a 75 mL spray Eau de Parfum.
ReviewText: Bought the gift set when it went on sale and I'm in love

Description: She'll charm, she'll dance, she'll captivate all hearts with Anna Sui's newest fragrance, La Nuit de Boheme. Description: Dolce & Gabbana Intenso is pure instinct; the power of an emotion that is freely expressed. It is the force of a determined man, with a heart that is rooted in tradition, yet revels in the modern world. Dolce & Gabbana Intenso is a woody aromatic fragrance, whose profound appeal is defined by a brand new discovery in the olfactory world: the Moepel accord which has been re-created from the flowers and leaves of the Milkwood tree using Headspace technology.
ReviewText: Bought this some time ago because I had the dolce gabbana light blue but this is much stronger I find it to be like an old type cologne fragrance.
Title: Nice but old fashion smell

ReviewText: Omg i can't believe how much i like this perfume!! I smell pineapple and coconut and i'm in pina-colada heaven!! Longlasting and refreshing.
Title: Heaven!!

Description: A stunning new statement for the fragrance brand that embodies the introspective, raw and multi-faceted story told through the "The Pinkprint" album and Global Tour. This fragrance connects fans to Nicki's bold personality and celebrates her brilliance and evolution as an artist.
ReviewText: I loved the scent and the price! But, after using it over a weekend I noticed that a rash had broken out every where I had sprayed the perfume (wrists, chest, etc.) I was able to return the product but was very disappointed that I would not be able to use this product in the future.
Title: Great scent but...

ReviewText: Signorina Misteriosa is a creamy delicious gourmand for both girls and grown-up women. SWEET TEMPTATION. Dark berry vibe and dark vanilla - so delightful! I was hooked from the moment I smelled it on the bottle.This fragrance is so gorgeous that I consider making it my signature scent, although I love MANY fragrances. And the bottle  is STUNNING!
Title: Absolutely Amazing!

Description: The ocean's energy locked in a unique fragrance. An all-over fresh aquatic body spray enriched with ocean water. Experience an intense revitalizing sensation inspired by breaking waves.
ReviewText: This is my best friend @ the gym after a good workout. I have many times tried to replce it with cheaper men's washes, but nothing comes close to this awesome shower gel. It is rich, hydrating and smells fantastic. It smells so good both in the shower and out that I have had many guys at the gym ask me what I use and where they can get a bottle. With the number of bottles I now see in the locker room at the gym I have certainly helped propel sales for you lol You only need a little, it foams like crazy when mixed with water, and believe me, everyone will compliment on how good you smell when your walking out of the gym!
Title: The best Body wash for men ever!

Description: The ocean's energy locked in a unique fragrance. An all-over fresh aquatic body spray enriched with ocean water. Experience an intense revitalizing sensation inspired by breaking waves.
ReviewText: This fragrance is real nice. Not overpowering at all. Just a quick spray and done. Have received many good comments from both genders about the scent and how nice it is. Will definitely purchase again.
Title: Great scent

Product Name: Oscar Eau de Toilette Natural Spray
Description: A romantic fragrance, a refined signature.Oscar de la Renta once dreamed of creating a perfume that in one drop captured all of the joy and sophistication of his designs. The realization of that dream was Oscar, the essence of an irresistible woman - created in 1977 and today a modern classic. Unmistakably feminine and joyously fragrant, Oscar is the symbol of a never-ending love affair between oscar de la renta and women around the world.
ReviewText: I absolutely love Oscar. It has a fresh scent and had forgotten how much I love it. Have tried other scents but this is the one for me.
Title: Oscar

Description: Top notes: Passion fruit sorbet, blood orange, Brazilian cherry. Middle notes: yellow tiger orchid, mango blossom, orange hibiscus flower. Dry notes: honey amber, teak wood, rio sunset musk.
ReviewText: I got this perfume as a gift for Christmas from my older brother. He doesn't know much about anything beauty-related, but someone told him that it was a great gift for me. I fell in love with Beyonce Heat Rush, right away. It smells amazing and lasts all day. It's not too strong of a smell, so you don't feel like you're over-doing it. I even got a matching moisturizing cream to go with it that has a bit of glitter. I'm super happy to have this product and use it for special occasions or even daily! I was unsure at first, but it's well worth it.
Title: Great Gift

Description: Top notes: Passion fruit sorbet, blood orange, Brazilian cherry. Middle notes: yellow tiger orchid, mango blossom, orange hibiscus flower. Dry notes: honey amber, teak wood, rio sunset musk.
ReviewText: I always have a bit of prejudice towards inexpensive celebrity fragrances. I purchased this on a whim since it was on sale and never regretted it since! It actually smells really great. A sweet and warm, but still grown-up, fragrance. My mom even uses it too. The longevity isn't that great, but the same can be said about many expensive perfumes as well. I definitely think it's worth the money!
Title: Beyonce never lets me down!

Description: Top notes: Passion fruit sorbet, blood orange, Brazilian cherry. Middle notes: yellow tiger orchid, mango blossom, orange hibiscus flower. Dry notes: honey amber, teak wood, rio sunset musk.
ReviewText: I'm usually not a fan of the "celebrity scents" but I got this as a gift. It's so lovely! It's a very different scent than I normally wear, it smells much heavier in the bottle then it ends up being on my skin. Lovely scent for day or night, any season!
Title: Lovely scent!

Description: Top notes: Passion fruit sorbet, blood orange, Brazilian cherry. Middle notes: yellow tiger orchid, mango blossom, orange hibiscus flower. Dry notes: honey amber, teak wood, rio sunset musk.
ReviewText: I know it's a celebrity scent, but it smells soo good! If you like sweet scents, you'll love it. Gotta be honest though, scent doesn't last the longest (five hours tops).
Title: Yummy

ReviewText: This is a lovely scent. Not too strong, thankfully. I appreciate that it doesn't have that sickeningly sweet smell.

Title: Burberry Brit on Beauty Boutique

Description: Jimmy Choo Eau de Parfum is a fragrance inspired by modern women — empowered, beautiful, seductive and alluring with a mysterious sense of confident sensuality. The Jimmy Choo woman has an independent mind and a confident spirit. She is glamorous, modern and intelligent with a sense of fun and fashion. Her fragrance is her ultimate accessory.
ReviewText:
Lets face it, when it comes to perfume reviews they only take you so far since everyone smells things differently. I tend to not enjoy the usual scents, they remind me too much of cotton and roses (not for me) by the time the top notes have died down and the heart of the perfume emerges. But this perfume is feminine without being sugary sweet and doesnt make you smell like fresh laundry either. Orchid is light and airy but the heart of the chypre comes out nicely with the pear nectar dialing it back so the woodsy scent isn't over powering.
This is definately a perfume for the type of woman who wants to make her presence known without bowling anyone over.
Price wise it will sound awful, but it is totally worth it since you only need to spray once and you get to have gentle reminders as you move about your day.
Title: A Different Perspective

Product Name: La Petite Robe Noire Eau Fraîche
Description: In La Petite Robe Noire’s perfume wardrobe, I am the new Petal Dress. A perfumed creation by Guerlain:  An Eau Fraîche in which sparkling mandarin, rose petals and biting pistachio set hearts a flutter. My legendary glass bottle – instantly recognizable by its rounded shoulders and stopper in the shape of an upside-down heart – reveals my new style of dress. Sketched in black ink, my low-cut Petal Dress is beautifully set off by translucent glass with a soft green lacquer. I am absolutely essential and utterly irresistible. I am the chic and very glamorous perfumed creation by Guerlain. I am La Petite Robe Noire.
ReviewText: Always looking for something new to wear in the summer.  I picked this one and I could not be happier.  I wear it everyday and everywhere I go people say how nice I smell. It will always be in my collection now. Love, love, love!!!
Title: In Love With This Scent!!!

Product Name: La Petite Robe Noire Eau Fraîche
Description: In La Petite Robe Noire’s perfume wardrobe, I am the new Petal Dress. A perfumed creation by Guerlain:  An Eau Fraîche in which sparkling mandarin, rose petals and biting pistachio set hearts a flutter. My legendary glass bottle – instantly recognizable by its rounded shoulders and stopper in the shape of an upside-down heart – reveals my new style of dress. Sketched in black ink, my low-cut Petal Dress is beautifully set off by translucent glass with a soft green lacquer. I am absolutely essential and utterly irresistible. I am the chic and very glamorous perfumed creation by Guerlain. I am La Petite Robe Noire.
ReviewText: I tried this in store after returning Chanel Chance's eau fraiche (too much hyacinth). i loved it on so i got a tester. This is amazing. Creamily nutty, pleasant but not generic smelling and it lasts. A lot of perfumes turn sour on my skin but this didn't. Buying the 100ml bottle immediately. This is going to be my scent this summer.
Title: Best Eau Fraiche in the market

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle L'Eau de Toilette Florale
Description: La Vie Est Belle L’Eau de Toilette Florale offers a brand new vision of the exceptional bottle, designed by Catherine Krunas. Its crystal smile is seen in more profound, radiant form than ever, taking flight with delicate fragility. Its new, pared-down lines are magnified with an iridescent white organza ribbon with sheer airy petals paying tribute to the floral fragrance, forming two ethereal wings on its joyful silhouette, like symbols of freedom. Fresh and luminous, its rosé elixir adds to the elegance of this concentrate of happiness.
ReviewText: One of the best smelling perfumes. So feminine and beautiful. Love it!
Title: Beautiful Scent

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle L'Eau de Toilette Florale

Description: Rose Couture, a new chypre floral and addictive eau de toilette. From Couture to Perfume, Rose Couture, with a new floral poetry, opens with a peony-rose accord. At the heart, the luminous orange blossom mingles with transparent jasmine and delicious rose nectar. This new floral echo to the Elie Saab Le Parfum’s signature is bolstered by a base of voluptuous sandalwood and elegant patchouli. The iconic facetted bottle reveals a crystalline pink fragrance, its pastel pink box is decorated with delicate flowers.
ReviewText: I got this scent for Christmas (It was on my list - lol) and I couldn't be happier! Looking for the body lotion now. I am a "mood" fragrance wearer - and this is my new go-to on days when I want to feel ultra feminine.
Title: Such a Feminine scent!

Description: Rose Couture, a new chypre floral and addictive eau de toilette. From Couture to Perfume, Rose Couture, with a new floral poetry, opens with a peony-rose accord. At the heart, the luminous orange blossom mingles with transparent jasmine and delicious rose nectar. This new floral echo to the Elie Saab Le Parfum’s signature is bolstered by a base of voluptuous sandalwood and elegant patchouli. The iconic facetted bottle reveals a crystalline pink fragrance, its pastel pink box is decorated with delicate flowers.
ReviewText: I was looking for a light fragrance for the summer and came across this one. It's a light flowery scent that isn't too overwhelming.
Title: Perfect for Summer!

Description: Decadence Is A Luxurious Sensual Woody Scent. The Fragrance Captivates With A Sultry Top Of Succulent Italian Plum, Golden Saffron And Velvety Iris. The Heart Is A Bouquet Of Rich Bulgarian Rose That Mingles With Lush Orris And Creamy Nuances Of Jasmine Sambac. Sexy Liquid Amber, Heady Vetiver And Warm Papyrus Woods Dry Down To A Signature Of Sophisticated Indulgence
ReviewText: I received the Marc Jacobs scent, Divine Decadence for Christmas. My husband thought I would love a Marc Jacobs purse but unfortunately the price on the purses are far out of our price range. The perfume is packaged to resemble a luxury bag, just like the ones Marc Jacob crelates which is remarkable enough and justified the purchase! The fact the scent is magnificent is icing on the delicious cake! It's very different to the floral scents I'd come to associate with Marc Jacobs perfumes as it has a rich vanilla with almost a smoky cigar note that richly envelops the wearer. I adore the darker layers in the smell. Extremely decorative collectible bottle. I'm proud to have this in my collection. Would recommend and will re purchase!
Title: Divine Scent!

Description: Decadence Is A Luxurious Sensual Woody Scent. The Fragrance Captivates With A Sultry Top Of Succulent Italian Plum, Golden Saffron And Velvety Iris. The Heart Is A Bouquet Of Rich Bulgarian Rose That Mingles With Lush Orris And Creamy Nuances Of Jasmine Sambac. Sexy Liquid Amber, Heady Vetiver And Warm Papyrus Woods Dry Down To A Signature Of Sophisticated Indulgence
ReviewText: I have sampled other Marc Jacobs fragrances before and never cared for them. When I came across this it was definitely something different. It almost reminded me of a cross between Bon Bon with some kind of woodsy/floral scent blended in. I was surprised how much I liked it, really worth checking out, plus the bottle looks like a cute little purse.
Title: The First Marc Jacobs Fragrence I liked

Description: Decadence Is A Luxurious Sensual Woody Scent. The Fragrance Captivates With A Sultry Top Of Succulent Italian Plum, Golden Saffron And Velvety Iris. The Heart Is A Bouquet Of Rich Bulgarian Rose That Mingles With Lush Orris And Creamy Nuances Of Jasmine Sambac. Sexy Liquid Amber, Heady Vetiver And Warm Papyrus Woods Dry Down To A Signature Of Sophisticated Indulgence
ReviewText: You have to let this one sit; it's a floral scent no doubt but does have a touch of woodiness and vanilla in there. It's an evening wear perfume but take note and give yourself time to 'air out' a little before diving into a big crowd or theatre, this is one you can go overboard on, and it sticks around.
Title: Floral to The Max

Description: Decadence Is A Luxurious Sensual Woody Scent. The Fragrance Captivates With A Sultry Top Of Succulent Italian Plum, Golden Saffron And Velvety Iris. The Heart Is A Bouquet Of Rich Bulgarian Rose That Mingles With Lush Orris And Creamy Nuances Of Jasmine Sambac. Sexy Liquid Amber, Heady Vetiver And Warm Papyrus Woods Dry Down To A Signature Of Sophisticated Indulgence
ReviewText: This parfum is absolutely beautiful. It is a dark, sensual scent while still being floral and feminine, which is nice. It also has a nice Vanilla note to it that balances out the heaviness. I wouldnt call this scent sweet or "uplifting" or annoyingly floral. It also lasts all day with just one spritz, and with moderate use is not overpowering at all. Even my 3 year old son loves it! Its becoming my new signature fragrance, i think!
Title: A very Sexy Fragrance!

I get so many compliments on it. It last all day when you wear it but it's not really over powering. I would recommend Marc jacobs perfume to everyone.
Title: Smells amazing!

The bottle is also beautiful to look at and though it is expensive ( as most parfumes are) it has a lot of product as well. I would definitely repurchase.

Title: Great packaging!

ReviewText: Like Aura by Swarovski, it is pink and it smells pink, and they also share the same dollop of pink pepper. It's pleasant and inoffensive, and easily qualifies for office wear; however, I wouldn't call it memorable. Considering the steeper price of Signorina, you'll want to spritz it on your wrist at the store and glide through your day before opening your wallet.
Title: A Cheerful and Undemanding Fruity Thing

ReviewText:
While Burberry isn't normally the brand most men gravitate towards (mostly the brand name makes you think of women's scarves) I would reccomend giving this one the old college try.
More for the younger man (20-30s) this cologne says "I'm a laid back sort of dude who would be fine walking the streets listening to the different street musicians". Granted if you have an office job I don't see why you couldn't wear this scent there either.
Title: Decent Price

ReviewText: Although I'm a fan of Burberry Brit for women, Burberry Brit Men is quite bland. I find that it doesn't offer anything unique in comparison to other scents. It may compliment your pheromones better than it does with mine, but overall the scent is boring and smells generic.
Title: Bland

ReviewText:
In terms of quality, Narciso Rodriguez For Her does not lack. In terms of fragrance notes, however, it does not impress. This fragrance appears to, when applied to the skin, have nothing much to say. 

Disappointing, considering that a woman is asked to trade her resources for it and surprising, given the array of other fragrances a woman can choose from!
Title: intriguing but ...

ReviewText: I have all of the Chloe perfumes with the exception of the original which I find to be too heavy on the rose. This is a great easy to wear floral that doesn't overwhelm. I find this is exactly in the middle between the original Chloe (which begins and ends with ROSE ROSE ROSE) and the younger and more playful See by Chloe Original (which is fruits and honey). While the staying power isn't great (only about 4 hours) the scent left behind is warm and sweet so as long as you keep a sample in your purse, you'll be fine.
Title: Best New Chloe!

Description:
This sensual musky, floral fragrance gives the confidence and the bliss to let inner beauty radiate. It is all about femininity at its ultimate power. Ever Bloom fragrance is composed with “radiance accord” and “presence accord”.
The PRESENCE accord is the heart of the fragrance,  with enchanting Orange Blossom Absolute, Gardenia and  Sylkoide musk.
The RADIANCE accord brings radiance to the fragrance with delicate Cyclamen, Lotus and Rose essence.
ReviewText: It's a great purchase to smell nice all the time!  Highly recommend this!
Title: everyday scent

ReviewText: I bought this a couple months ago and the product is definitely worth every penny I spent. The smell is yummy and delicious. It's very sweet and I love it!
Title: Awesome fragrance

ReviewText: I tried it and smell is amazing! Prada rules, i love all the fragranses from prada

ReviewText: Thank yu - beautiful package and this is the fragrance I wanted
Title: Great Service from Beauty Boutique

Description: Refreshing mist that fights daytime stresses and addresses dryness and oiliness.
ReviewText:
I use it during the day when I don't wear make up. A couple of sprays makes my skin feel restful and revived as if you washed your face with cold water. Needless to say it's very easy to apply.
That said, if you apply the product more than once, a.k.a. a new layer on top of another, it leaves a thin dry coating on your face, which is somewhat unpleasant. Also the bottle didn't last long because I tend to apply the mist more than recommended as the cooling effect feels so good.
Title: Very pleasant cooling effect

Description: Refreshing mist that fights daytime stresses and addresses dryness and oiliness.
ReviewText: Saw it, smelt it, loved it, bought it ! I use it everyday, every chance I get.
Title: Shiseido-quick fix mist

ReviewText:
Yes, yes and yes to this scent. I normally hate super fruity or girly scents cause they end up smelling like cotton. This one however does not, it has so many things happening that one moment you may smell the apricot, the next jasmine, if you're really good at smelling scents, the undertones of woody musk.
This is not your averge scent, not every woman will be owning it, and it's certainly for a particular taste. However I would reccomend this one in a heart beat. I personally like the Eau du Toilette more than the Eau du Parfum but that's merely preference.
The price is even manageable for a 50 mL bottle (that's honestly all you need if you switch between scents a lot) and I am going to carry a little travel sized version around in my purse.
Title: Definate Buy

ReviewText: This perfume is an absolute delight for summer! I bought this fragrance last year, and it sparked my love for fragrances. While I have amassed a large collection over time, this still remains an important staple for me, and I am sure to always have a bottle! It's a very nice sweet fruity-floral smell. The longevity of it on my skin is average (lasting from 3-4 hours), and the silage is relatively soft. Overall, it is very inoffensive, and brightens up my mood every time I wear it.
Title: One of my favourites!

ReviewText: This is the second bottle that I have purchased of this fragrance. I love the fresh notes which are perfect for springtime, but also the little hint of 'sexy' that is released when wearing it.
Title: Vent du Sud is amazing!

ReviewText: This is my second bottle of this fragrance because I find the scent to be so good.

Product Name: Yellow Diamond Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Versace Yellow Diamond is a new captivating and voluptuous fragrance for a true femininity, trusting on one's own charm, in harmony with the unmistakable glamour of Versace. A new bright fragrance, pure like sunlight, an extraordinary bright hue that radiates with a fiery intensity, sparkling the way that only a diamond can.
ReviewText: This is my go to scent. Every time I wear it I get so many compliments and the men at my work have gone out to buy it for their wives.
Title: This is a beautiful fragrance

Product Name: La Nuit Trésor Eau de Parfum Caresse
Description: A sultry night, when lovers embrace with absolute love.  [Myth] Goddess of night adorned with a starry veil. Eau de Parfum Caresse composed of the rarest raw materials: a tender Heart of Rose Essence, skin to skin with caressing white Musks, interlaced by a luscious Tonka beans accord. First Caressing Rose created for Lancôme by two stars of French perfumery as the new love philtre of the 21st century.
ReviewText: I recently purchased my first bottle of Lancome's La Nuit Tresor, and I have religiously worn it everyday. The scent is unlike anything I've smelled before! It is warm, addictive and the perfect fall/winter scent! The bottle is so beautiful that I keep it on my vanity for display. I am absolutely in love and will repurchase this perfume when I am finished.
Title: Entrancing Scent

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Eau Légère
Description: L'Eau de Parfum  creates a lighter, silkier trail while remaining equally chic and delightful as the classic Eau de Parfum. This fragrance represents a new category, between an Eau de Parfum and an Eau De Toilette.
ReviewText: I ordered a 200ml bottle for my mom as her birthday present, since this has been her signature scent for a while. But as soon as I opened the box, I found the bottle cap was detached and broken to two parts, and the top nuzzle also fell off. For a 200+ dollar perfume, this is so unacceptable! I just hate to call the customer service and go through all inconvenience of returning, I have to glue the broken part together. Fortunately, the juicy inside is still as good as usual, I will just keep it myself and buy something else for my mom's birthday. I will not shop at this site again! so disappointed!
Title: bad luck or no quality control?

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Eau Légère
Description: L'Eau de Parfum  creates a lighter, silkier trail while remaining equally chic and delightful as the classic Eau de Parfum. This fragrance represents a new category, between an Eau de Parfum and an Eau De Toilette.
ReviewText: I was given my first bottle as a gift and loved it, so once I ran out I got another one. Within a month it went from a pinkish color, to a gross orange color and it smelled awful! I stored it exactly the same as the last one (in a box in the cupboard at room temp). I don't know if I got a bad batch or something. I went back to where I bought it, but they said they couldn't do anything about perfumes and I'd have to contact Lancome. I'm really disappointed.
Title: Turned orange and spoiled (?) within a month

Product Name: La Vie Est Belle Eau Légère
Description: L'Eau de Parfum  creates a lighter, silkier trail while remaining equally chic and delightful as the classic Eau de Parfum. This fragrance represents a new category, between an Eau de Parfum and an Eau De Toilette.
ReviewText: The first time I smelled this fragrance in a magazine strip of all places I knew I had finally found my new fragrance. This is feminine, but with just the right amount of sexy to make it a grown womans fragrance. When I walk into my room later in the evening and catch a whiff of this still in the air I can't help but inhale, I love this. If I had one caution it would be not to overdo this as a little goes a long way.
Title: Finally

ReviewText: It makes me beautiful inside and in every scent and way...Living life is all about the way you feel and how you communicate with others, each individual has such a great part on the whole picture...Do you know what I mean? ReviewText: Love this fragrance. I always get compliments when I wear it. It is floral and spicy at the same time. Excellent all year long as it is more floral in the summer and musky in the winter. I have tried all the variations of the original scent and although I prefer the original, the entire La Vie Est Belle line is fabulous. Long lasting but not overpowering.

ReviewText: After first smelling La Vie Est Belle, I was enchanted. I use it for classier engagements, and it makes me smile every time I put it on. Because it has warmer notes to it, I tend to wear it more in the colder seasons, but it's classic enough to wear any time of year. This can easily be a staple in your fragrance line-up.
