Description: DKNY Be Delicious is an apple loved around the world,  a playful, fun apple floral that inspires you to take a bite out of life!
ReviewText:
This is a nice unoffensive fruity perfume that is the best to wear when you feel like having a nice scent around you without overpowering anyone in close vacinity. Think movie theatres, or pubs. Not so much a winter scent, it's more meant for spring or summer when everything is green and growing.
Could be less in the price department; maybe just buy the smallest size.
Title: Light and Fresh

Description: DKNY Be Delicious is an apple loved around the world,  a playful, fun apple floral that inspires you to take a bite out of life!
ReviewText: One of my go to perfumes. It has a nice fruity, citrus scent without being overwhelming. Just a few spritz and I am out the door, I am forever getting compliments on the scent. I love this one and also the travel size is perfect for your carry on.
Title: Be Delicious

Description: DKNY Be Delicious is an apple loved around the world,  a playful, fun apple floral that inspires you to take a bite out of life!
ReviewText: I first bought this scent when I was 18. Its a youthful and fun scent that's good for day. It does have a strong scent of green apples but more of a synthetic finish instead of fresh juice. I'd recommend for teenagers.
Title: Casual Daytime Scent

Description:
SUN di Gioia: a solar floral (Marie Salamagne Firmenich)
In this amber bottle infused with light is cradled a modern floral bathing in sunlight. Sensual notes reminiscent of sun-warmed skin emerge with a surging top note of bergamot-freesia, a generous floral salicylate heart (notes at once solar and saline)of frangipani-ylang-ylang-Sambac jasmine, and a warm, richly elegant base composed of iris, vanilla, and benzoin. A luminous and sensual fragrance with a luxurious, comfortable “chic Monoï” effect.
ReviewText: I purchased this last summer when looking for something that reminded me of being on a beach, and this was that and more!  It's such a warm, sensual scent, without being too sweet.  It's gorgeous!
Title: Summer In A Bottle!

Description:
SUN di Gioia: a solar floral (Marie Salamagne Firmenich)
In this amber bottle infused with light is cradled a modern floral bathing in sunlight. Sensual notes reminiscent of sun-warmed skin emerge with a surging top note of bergamot-freesia, a generous floral salicylate heart (notes at once solar and saline)of frangipani-ylang-ylang-Sambac jasmine, and a warm, richly elegant base composed of iris, vanilla, and benzoin. A luminous and sensual fragrance with a luxurious, comfortable “chic Monoï” effect.
ReviewText: I always gift this during the winter holidays because I know that's when my friends and family are craving the warm sun the most! This brings such a warm and relaxing yet sensual wave to your routine, just like the sun. Just what you need in this Canadian winter!
Title: Like a mini vacation

Product Name: La Vie de Boheme Eau de Toilette
Description: She is an adventurer and romantic at heart. Unshakeable in her convictions.  Unstoppable in her passions. Unconventional in her lifestyle, mixing a dash of creativity with endless originality, she sets out to change the world one day at a time.  La Vie de Bohème captures this energy.
ReviewText: It surprisingly reminds me a lot of Forbidden Affair; I like the blackberry smell it has ,you don't get much blackberry out there. It would be nice for chilly winter days.
Title: It's Nice

ReviewText: It is an okay scent, I've worn it and so have some friends of mine but we found we all smelled too strongly of wood and coffee for it to be pleasant for us.
Title: Meh

ReviewText: I bought this for my husband as a gift because I loved the smell in the store and was hoping he would love it. Bought the smaller bottle incase he didn't like it, but he ended up loving it too and has used it ever since!
Title: Won't be sorry!

ReviewText: I am wearing this fragrance since it came out and I always get compliments when I am wearing it. It creates a cloud around me and absolutely love it.
Title: Perfect

Product Name: Always Red Femme Eau de Toilette
Description: Own the town. This intriguing, feminine and dynamic interpretation of Always Red is a spirited and sensual floral expression of the woman who sets the New York City pace. As the metropolis calls, she responds… it’s all or nothing. Always Red Femme. A perfect blend of Blackcurrant Bud, Peach Blossom, Moss and Patchouli.
ReviewText: I have been searching for a new scent for over a year now, and this was the first one I came across that I got super excited about.  I tried it on with testers at stores and it proved to be something I can wear all day.  Used to wear Fantasy by Britney Spears, but as I'm approaching 30, I felt the need for a different perfume.  The only reason I gave it a 4, is because I don't think the smell lasts as long as I would like it to.
Title: Finally Found my new Fragrance

ReviewText: This perfume smells wonderful on me. It almost smells like Armani Si but less expensive. Also very long lasting. Great job coach.
Title: Smells Amazing!!

ReviewText: Keeping in mind Coach wanted to make a perfume every woman would buy, the perfume smells nice and bright, starting from fruity then going into vanilla territory. It is a pretty enough fragrance if not particularly interesting
Title: Beautiful Bottle

Description: Oh, Lola! is charming, with a sparkling personality. It leaves you feeling youthful, flirting with your senses!
ReviewText: Love the scent. Recommend this product to anyone who enjoys wearing Marc jacob
Title: Lovely

Product Name: Elizabeth Arden ALWAYS RED Eau de Toilette Spray
Description:
Light up the town.

Bold, modern, inviting. An alluringly luxurious floriental fragrance made for the leader of the "in" crowd. Bright accents of red plum and passion fruit lead to a textured floral heart and rich ambery base, for the strikingly confident woman.
ReviewText: For a long time i was avoiding Elizabeth Taylor fragrances as they all seemed to be very mature,very clean or very floral. Not my cup of tea. The SA suggested this to try as she remembered i love Hot Couture (which is great for a sale assistant to remember!!) I told her this brand doesn't appeal me much but she insisted it's different, and it was love!! Woow what a perfume. When i kept sniffing and the sa kept snizzing coz the perfume is soo peppery and bold.just the way i like it. I was affraid that i could not wear it in public it is very strong perfume. I bought it anyway and i am enjoying it at home for now. I will wait for colder days to wear it in public. I should thank this professional assistant for introducing me to this beauty.
Title: My New Favourite

Product Name: Elizabeth Arden ALWAYS RED Eau de Toilette Spray
Description:

Bold, modern, inviting. An alluringly luxurious floriental fragrance made for the leader of the "in" crowd. Bright accents of red plum and passion fruit lead to a textured floral heart and rich ambery base, for the strikingly confident woman.
ReviewText: I bought the 1.7 first, and is almost gone so I cannot run out of this perfume. I get so many complements when I wear it!
Title: Love it!

Product Name: Mon Jasmine Noir Eau de Parfum spray
Description: The sophisticated Eau de Parfum within Jasmine Noir franchise, very prestigious, recognizable Bvlgari signature. A creation centered around one of the “diamond” of Perfumery, the jasmine flower. The most evocative of all flowers; symbol of beauty and luxury.   Style: Shimmering Mother of Pearl. Refined Light Gold and Shiny Black.   Notes:   Luminous, Sparkling, Golden Cedrat, Lily of the Valley, Elegant, Bewitching, Sambac Jasmine, Angel Wing Jasmine, Addictive, Sensual, Musky Nougatine, Vibrant Wood
ReviewText: Just bought it today did not know how it would smell they did not have tester at the store so basically had No idea how it smelled took a chance and now very Happy.
Title: Amazing smell :)

Description: Live your dreams. Believe in yourself. The fragrance is a vivacious, feminine and glamorous scent that plays on a harmonious multiplicity that is warm and fresh, rich and transparent, sweet-scented and sparkling. It is a delightful dream full of fantasy and sensual innocence that only Anna can make happen. SUI DREAMS is a world built by femininity, existing in a vast yet intimate place close to the heart and empowered by inspiration. The scent is a vehicle of Freedom, its destination in no way limited by the horizon. And only those with the will to bring this world to life can make it happen.
ReviewText: I'm so happy I found this perfume again it's one of my favourites and I just love it. I only wish they had a bigger bottle!
Title: Smell great

ReviewText: Sweet, subtle. I feel like a princess when wearing it.

Description:
For the sheer pleasure of it.

A lively, modern balance of Pleasures' signature Lilies, Peonies, Jasmine, and Baie Rose.

The innovative spray creates an air-light mist, perfect for delicately scenting the body all over. In one glamorous gesture, airy notes are swept over the skin in a cool rush—like walking through a luxurious, fragrant cloud.
ReviewText: I loved it 10 years ago and I love it today! Classic. Beautiful, light and feminine.
Title: smells amazing

Description: The timeless, woody scent gets a new twist where rose gold meets fragrance. The new Dahlia Divin Eau de Toilette is to be worn as an Haute Couture dress—as the quintessential object glorifying the Givenchy woman’s talent and iconic elegance.
ReviewText: I found the toillette to be superior to it's parfum counterpart, it's one of my frequent wears.
Title: A Good Christmas Gift

Description: The timeless, woody scent gets a new twist where rose gold meets fragrance. The new Dahlia Divin Eau de Toilette is to be worn as an Haute Couture dress—as the quintessential object glorifying the Givenchy woman’s talent and iconic elegance.
ReviewText: I bought Dahlia Divin and I love this sent. Beautiful
Title: Beautiful sent

Description: Passion burns brightest in the dark. Indulge in the fragrance of Ralph Lauren Midnight Romance, and experience the essence of sensual pink peony and mysterious black vanilla.
ReviewText:
This perfume is exactly what it claims to be; when you spritz it on you instantly feel like you could be in a whorlwind romance on the coblestone streets of Italy, all intense kisses and hushed conversations under the stars.
Perhaps the price may make you think twice about purchasing but I can say that this scent could easily become a signature smell for the rest of your life.
Title: Exactly What it Claims

Description: Passion burns brightest in the dark. Indulge in the fragrance of Ralph Lauren Midnight Romance, and experience the essence of sensual pink peony and mysterious black vanilla.
ReviewText: I had a coupon/gift certificate for a fragrance from the Perfume Sampler Box.  I wasn't sure which perfume to buy, but I did narrow it down to Marc Jacobs Daisy and this one.  Although I loved the Daisy bottle, the cosmetician suggested I try this Ralph Lauren as customers always come back for more.  Despite my hesitation, I carried out her recommendation and I am so happy.  I get a lot of compliments on this fragrance...it is not too strong and tends to last most of the day.  I would purchase again!
Title: A real showstopper!

Description: Passion burns brightest in the dark. Indulge in the fragrance of Ralph Lauren Midnight Romance, and experience the essence of sensual pink peony and mysterious black vanilla.
ReviewText: Wonderful light, sweet scent! I received this as a Christmas gift from my husband and absolutely love it!!
Title: Beautiful Scent

Description: Inspired by the heritage of British male perfumery, constructed to embody the Burberry man. Mr. Burberry is a scent as timeless and iconic as the trench coat, as unique and unexpected as the city of London. A man of contrasts. Classic yet contemporary; sophisticated and sensual. A sartorial elegance with a rebellious attitude. Authentic and British. London is his home, a city of subtlety and surprise. Mr. Burberry embodies the Britishness of the brand, and the cool attitude.
ReviewText: I never liked cologne for men until I got this. I use it everyday now. I am really surprised.
Title: Awesome Stuff

Description: Inspired by the heritage of British male perfumery, constructed to embody the Burberry man. Mr. Burberry is a scent as timeless and iconic as the trench coat, as unique and unexpected as the city of London. A man of contrasts. Classic yet contemporary; sophisticated and sensual. A sartorial elegance with a rebellious attitude. Authentic and British. London is his home, a city of subtlety and surprise. Mr. Burberry embodies the Britishness of the brand, and the cool attitude.
ReviewText: This scent reminds me of Abercrombie & Fitch and not in a good way. I know it's a scent marketed as 'A man of contrasts', but I just didn't smell it, it was rather generic and plain to me. Rather than marketing to only males I think they should have gone unisex.
Title: Not Worth the Money

Product Name: L'Instant de Guerlain Eau de Parfum
Description: L'Instant de Guerlain Eau de Parfum illustrates one of those unique moments where everything can change. An intense moment of emotion between a man and a woman. Sambac jasmine, ylang-ylang, and solar flowers highlight an amber accord. A really solar perfume. Its bottle is cut from a luxurious and transparent block of glass. Crowned with a flat stopper, sculpted like a cabochon, and engraved with the Guerlain logo, its shapes play with the contrast between the rectangle and curves.
ReviewText:
I appreciate Guerlain fragrances because they are one of the very few that don't give me headaches or irritate my sinuses.

However, L'Instant is not one I would choose, as it was far too light for my taste (and I like to be subtle rather than bold when it comes to fragrance), although I would have no hesitation to gift a young girl with this fragrance - for a child, it would be a beautiful, delicate indulgence!
Title: almost imperceptible

Description:
Jean-Paul Guerlain created Samsara for the woman of his life. His only indications were sandalwood and jasmine, which the "Lady of Samsara" particularly liked. Jean-Paul Guerlain travelled to India many times to acquire the purest sandalwood and a jasmine used only for religious offerings until then. Samsara is a sensual version of seduction for a woman who has found harmony and balance, which is notably conveyed through the composition's raw materials. 

It was at the Musée Guimet that Robert Granai found inspiration for creating the shape of Samsara. The bottle is flamboyant red, a sacred colour, which evokes through the fullness of its shape a statue of a Khmer dancer. The stopper echoes the shape of the eye of the Buddha, a symbol of meditation, which leads the way to supreme awakening.
ReviewText: I often used this perfume when my children were small. When I was at Shoppers the other day I sprayed a sample on myself and remembered how much I loved the scent. When I got home my younger daughter said that perfume reminds me of when I was little. You should wear that again you smell really good.
Title: Smells wonderful and lasts a very long time.

Description: For the man who lives for the thrill and has an active lifestyle. Bold and deep, it’s for the sleek and refined modern Aramis man. Inspired by the sleek elegance of the contemporary man, this new Aramis fragrance is a unique combination of bold freshness and intense masculinity. Grapefruit, elemi, and fresh green leaves nuance the juniper wood, incense, vetiver, and tonka bean in the back.
ReviewText: I bought this for my husband and I can't get enough of him wearing Aramis Black. It smells so amazing and sexy, if a fragrance could get you pregnant from smelling it - it would be this one. Highly recommended for any man in your life!
Title: Not your Daddy's Aramis!

ReviewText: My wife got this for me for our anniversary and the first spray of this i was hooked and there isn't a day that might go by that someone doesn't say boy you smell good. i have ever since that first spray till today worn this product, well it has been 6 years or more now and i have been loyal to this product and still get comments on how good i smell. Any Mans man or Ladies man must have this on their shelves.
Title: Makes A Man Smell Like A Real Man

ReviewText: I always get this for my husband....this smells amazing and stays on for days....must try.
Title: Very sexy and exotic smell

ReviewText: It smells great, love it. Gonna buy it soon to gift it to my husband.
Title: adorable

Product Name: Beautiful Love Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
The fragrance that celebrates the joy of romantic love.
Lush Magnolia Blossom, rich White Jasmine, Mango Mist, Heliotrope and Vetiver release an emotional rush like the feeling of new love.
ReviewText: I bought this perfume about a month ago and I absolutely love love love this perfume. I like Dior's Pure Poison and Burberry Body and this is definitely comparable to one of those.
Title: I'm in LOVE with this fragrance

Description:
A team of fragrances that empowers a man to get in the game with sport, seduction, adventure and style.

The seductive fragrance for the guy who loves the thrill of the chase.
ReviewText: I bought it for my husband's birthday gift and he loves it! I was going to buy small size, I search amazon, bay and other store and finally I came to Shoppers website and when I realized that the big size price is lower than other store I bought vigger one! In comparison to other pleces price I found this one fantastic.
Title: A really good price!

Description:
Givenchy Pour Homme Blue Label. For the man who exhibits elegant style with a casual touch, aka "the james dean attitude”. 
Blue Label embodies the energy, style, and attitude of today's man. From chilling out to thrilling adventure, this invigorating cocktail of fresh citrus mingled with aquatic notes, vibrant spices, and masculine woods makes the perfect accessory for the man who wants it all.
ReviewText: I've been wearing this one for years. It's more of a summer scent, citrusy, and smells marine like. Lasts long and many people will compliment you on your scent. Similar to Giorgio Armani Acqua Di Gio. (Better though!) I highly recommend Givenchy Blue!
Title: Fantastic!

Description:
Givenchy Pour Homme Blue Label. For the man who exhibits elegant style with a casual touch, aka "the james dean attitude”. 
Blue Label embodies the energy, style, and attitude of today's man. From chilling out to thrilling adventure, this invigorating cocktail of fresh citrus mingled with aquatic notes, vibrant spices, and masculine woods makes the perfect accessory for the man who wants it all.
ReviewText: I've been wearing Givenchy Pi for years and decided to get a bottle of Blue Label & some Pi Neo to switch it up, glad I did. It's got wonderful citrus scents and is a great long lasting cologne.
Title: Smells great!

Product Name: Brit Rhythm Floral Eau de Toilette
Description: Backstage. The heat rises. Sultry and intimate. Sensual fruits, lilac and ambery woods pulse on her skin.
ReviewText: When it comes to Burberry i can blindly know i will love their scents and this is no exception. It's fresh and woody. The only woody fragrance for summer. If you want to smell sophisticated yet fresh on a hot summery day go for this.
Title: Another great perfume

Product Name: Brit Rhythm Floral Eau de Toilette
Description: Backstage. The heat rises. Sultry and intimate. Sensual fruits, lilac and ambery woods pulse on her skin.
ReviewText: This scent is adorable! It makes me feel good, cuddled, happy and very girly. I bought this recently and i received many compliments. Perfect for any occasion and every season. I'm in love! <3
Title: Great Scent!! :)

Product Name: Brit Rhythm Floral Eau de Toilette
Description: Backstage. The heat rises. Sultry and intimate. Sensual fruits, lilac and ambery woods pulse on her skin.
ReviewText: My default fragrance. I bought the holiday gift set which came with the 30ml extra small bottle which is really useful for travel.
Title: Smells amazing

Product Name: Brit Rhythm Floral Eau de Toilette
Description: Backstage. The heat rises. Sultry and intimate. Sensual fruits, lilac and ambery woods pulse on her skin.
ReviewText: Made me feel sophisticated and girly and the same time. I love the scent of this perfume!
Title: Beautiful perfume!

Product Name: Chloe Love Story Eau de Toilette
Description:
A tender take on Love Story’s orange blossom. Fresh and floral, this new fragrance mingles with the scent of the dew.
A symbol of love, a flower given by those who finally dare to bare their heart.  
Prunus flower reveals its intense green facet, heightened by a dewy floral accord, marked with carefree joy.
ReviewText: I love I bought this perfume. I'm getting another one with my points
Title: Awesome

Description: Darkness doesn't hide… it reveals. It leads us through the unknown. And awakens our senses to all we cannot see. From darkness comes light. Introducing John Varvatos Dark Rebel.
ReviewText: I first came across this cologne in a beauty boutique sample, and was taken in by its subtle and sultry scent.  I bought it for my husband but frequently wear it myself. Not too heavy or strong, soft, subtle, slightly early and herbal.
Title: Intoxicating scent

Description: An invitation to indulge, Marc Jacobs Decadence is a luxurious sensual woody scent. The fragrance captivates with a sultry top of succulent Italian plum, golden saffron and velvety iris. The heart is a bouquet of rich Bulgarian rose that mingles with lush orris and creamy nuances of jasmine sambac. Sexy liquid amber, heady vetiver and warm papyrus woods dry down to a signature of sophisticated indulgence.
ReviewText: this is by far the best perfume by Marc Jacobs. I am one who loves smelling good whole day .it does make me fell fresh
Title: the way i like it

Description: An invitation to indulge, Marc Jacobs Decadence is a luxurious sensual woody scent. The fragrance captivates with a sultry top of succulent Italian plum, golden saffron and velvety iris. The heart is a bouquet of rich Bulgarian rose that mingles with lush orris and creamy nuances of jasmine sambac. Sexy liquid amber, heady vetiver and warm papyrus woods dry down to a signature of sophisticated indulgence.
ReviewText: I love this perfume! It has a warm scent to it, and the smell lasts all day long. I get so many compliments and my boyfriend adores it :) I have Lola by Marc Jacobs as well, but this one will definitely replace it !
Title: Love it

Description: An invitation to indulge, Marc Jacobs Decadence is a luxurious sensual woody scent. The fragrance captivates with a sultry top of succulent Italian plum, golden saffron and velvety iris. The heart is a bouquet of rich Bulgarian rose that mingles with lush orris and creamy nuances of jasmine sambac. Sexy liquid amber, heady vetiver and warm papyrus woods dry down to a signature of sophisticated indulgence.
ReviewText: My husband got it last year for my bday. It's the best gift ever. The aroma is sooo good. I always receive complements about it. It's a must have in your collection!
Title: The best fragrance ever

Description: Wrap your body in a veil of softness with Désirable Body Veil Parfumé. Paraben-free, this light, fluid moisturizing lotion leaves your skin feeling fresh and delicately scented with Désirable. Tested under dermatological control.
ReviewText: I bought this years ago and love it.  I have Asthma and I find the cream veil is awesome , not too strong and I can still wear perfume . Also not flowery scent which I'm allergic to.  Wonderful Product. Would recommend to anyone not wanting a strong smelling scent but still a beautiful scent
Title: Wonderful Light Fragrance

ReviewText: One of the first brands of perfume I purchased and loved ever drop of this scent. Subtle and sweet, this was a lovely refreshing perfume perfect for casual and formal settings.
Title: Deliciously sweet

Product Name: Eau de Lacoste Eau de Parfum Spray
Description: A very feminine Lacoste eau de parfum, light and unprecedentedly sensual. A soft feeling of freshness infuses this elegant and modern fragrance.
ReviewText: Been buying Lacoste for years! Absolutely love all their frangrances! Totally worth the $
Title: Love <3

Product Name: Eau de Lacoste L.12.12 Pour Elle Sparkling Eau de Toilette Spray
Description:
The lightness and natural elegance of the LACOSTE pleated skirt has been captured in a collection of fresh, uplifting scents. EAU DE LACOSTE L.12.12 Pour Elle is a trio of fragrances reflecting the three moods of the LACOSTE woman: Sparkling, Elegant, and Natural.

EAU DE LACOSTE L.12.12 Pour Elle Sparkling is sweet and playful, with an edge of attitude "à la française." There is more than a hint of LACOSTE’s French roots in the playful sweet note of macaron at the heart of this scent. Top notes of fruit and spice provide sparkle with an edge, while patchouli adds its sophistication as a base note to this irresistible creation.
ReviewText: I absolutely adore this Lacoste scent. Its so fruity and innocent and its always the purfume i take with me when i travel. Definitely a must have.
Title: love love love

Product Name: Eau de Lacoste L.12.12 Pour Elle Sparkling Eau de Toilette Spray
Description:
The lightness and natural elegance of the LACOSTE pleated skirt has been captured in a collection of fresh, uplifting scents. EAU DE LACOSTE L.12.12 Pour Elle is a trio of fragrances reflecting the three moods of the LACOSTE woman: Sparkling, Elegant, and Natural.

EAU DE LACOSTE L.12.12 Pour Elle Sparkling is sweet and playful, with an edge of attitude "à la française." There is more than a hint of LACOSTE’s French roots in the playful sweet note of macaron at the heart of this scent. Top notes of fruit and spice provide sparkle with an edge, while patchouli adds its sophistication as a base note to this irresistible creation.
ReviewText: I bought one as a gift for my sister when i visited her in china, she loved it and would love to buy more for her girl friends as well.
Title: great smell, last longer!

Description: The unmistakable Lotus Flower of Omnia Crystalline has been wrapped in a warm breath of textured and precious sensations of pure luxury.  Style:  a White Woody-Floral Eau de Parfum     Notes:  Top Notes of  Italian Mandarin – Lotus Flower yielding a vibrant, fresh and luminous tender Floralcy .  Mid Notes: Lotus Flower - Orris Concrete – Heliotrope  a highly textured heart, velvety and vaporous .  Base Notes:  White Sandalwood–Benzoin from Siam– Musks  A white silky-like cloud feeling, yet addictive and sensual  with creamy effects.
ReviewText: I've never been the fancy perfume type, but this has completely changed my life! It's refreshing, light and elegant. A wonderful combo for anyone looking to turn heads.
Title: Beautiful, long-lasting scent!

Description:
A fragrance with sensual, ultra-feminine notes.
Rose, Orange Blossom, Vanilla
ReviewText: Classic, timeless, vintage quality yet, at the very same time very modern and wearable. A safe blind buy if your love floral orientals with spices. Upon first spritz I get orange flower and star anise, then it quickly morphs into a deliciously creamy long-lasting skin fragrance with decent projection. Almost edible but certainly not a gourmand. This is a signature scent. You can dress it up or down. Very chic. Very femme. Highly recommend.
Title: Classic

Description: Celebrate with Viva la Juicy Rosé, a springtime toast to the forever vibrant Viva girl. An irresistible bouquet of honey-like pink blossoms pops with fizzy citrus perfection and is kissed by the glow of sensual amber. Cheers.
ReviewText: I went in for the new Ariana Grande scent, and left with this. It's captivating and a sophisticated take on sweet, light mists. It is unique, being a very crisp fruity scent. Makes me think of a first/second date getting sweet drinks on a patio in the sun, or walking through Europe in a pretty dress. It lasts about 4 hours at full volume, then lingers down for another 4 hours as a slightly different scent. I only need to reapply if I perfumed in the morning and am going out again that night! x
Title: Summery, Clean, Fruity, Patio drinks with new love

Description: Celebrate with Viva la Juicy Rosé, a springtime toast to the forever vibrant Viva girl. An irresistible bouquet of honey-like pink blossoms pops with fizzy citrus perfection and is kissed by the glow of sensual amber. Cheers.
ReviewText: I LOVE all the Juicy perfumes and this one is just as perfect as the rest. The Rose smell is not overpowering, I would highly recommend this perfume to anyone!
Title: Smells amazing!!!

Description: Celebrate with Viva la Juicy Rosé, a springtime toast to the forever vibrant Viva girl. An irresistible bouquet of honey-like pink blossoms pops with fizzy citrus perfection and is kissed by the glow of sensual amber. Cheers.
ReviewText: I ordered this online after falling in love with a magazine test strip. Unfortunately, the fragrance was a major disappointment. It begins smelling heavily of alcohol then fades into a lovely scent that last for maybe 30 minutes. I will love the bottle I bought, but will have to reapply so often it will last maybe 2 months. I won't be repurchasing
Title: Alcohol heavy with absolutely no staying power

Description: Celebrate with Viva la Juicy Rosé, a springtime toast to the forever vibrant Viva girl. An irresistible bouquet of honey-like pink blossoms pops with fizzy citrus perfection and is kissed by the glow of sensual amber. Cheers.
ReviewText: I received two of these Fragrance Bottles as gifts. I'am one lucky Girl. I love this perfum spray & body lotion. I always keep a bottle on hand never want to run out..
Title: Viva La Love this Fragrance

Description: Celebrate with Viva la Juicy Rosé, a springtime toast to the forever vibrant Viva girl. An irresistible bouquet of honey-like pink blossoms pops with fizzy citrus perfection and is kissed by the glow of sensual amber. Cheers.
ReviewText:
Just light enough to be appropriate.
Floral but not overpowering.
Title: Beautiful rose fragrance!

Description: Celebrate with Viva la Juicy Rosé, a springtime toast to the forever vibrant Viva girl. An irresistible bouquet of honey-like pink blossoms pops with fizzy citrus perfection and is kissed by the glow of sensual amber. Cheers.
ReviewText: Light fresh and girly. Perfect for every day. My new go to scent.
Title: Fresh

Description: Take a deep breath and rediscover the sensation of walking by the seashore. Relive the exhilarating rush of the ocean with Eau Océane, an uplifting, vivifying body fragrance!
ReviewText: Very fresh and nice fragrance. Long lasting. Receive many compliments!
Title: Nice!

Product Name: endless euphoria Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
Refreshingly light and radiant, endless euphoria Calvin Klein translates the provocative fantasy of the iconic euphoria fragrance into a sunlit daydream filled with cherry blossoms and an air of sheer sensuality.

endless euphoria Calvin Klein opens with an intoxicating breeze of cherry blossoms, tipped with refreshing mandarin and bergamot. the heart blooms with beguiling floral notes of violet, pastel rose and syringa. at the base, bamboo, sandalwood, and bare musk exude a dream-like seduction. 

Top: cherry blossom, mandarin, bergamot.

Mid: violet, pastel rose accord, syringa.

Dry: bamboo, sandalwood, bare musk accord
ReviewText: I bought this perfume for my mother as a Christmas present and she loved it. The perfume has a beautful fruity touch to the scent that does not give a nauseous smell to it. This was a good choice to purchase as a gift. Will buy this again!
Title: Beautiful Spray

Product Name: Eros Pour Femme Eau de Toilette
Description: Versace Eros pour Femme Eau de Toilette is a new sensual and fresh scent with notes of citrus, fruity , floral and musk/woody.
ReviewText: I believe in having what I call a signature scent - a scent that defines me. Every couple of years I change the scent, because I change. I tried a sample of this Eau de Toilette last year and loved it. It's a soft scent and not overpowering. Nothing compares to quality perfumes and colognes. The cheap stuff wears off way too fast and you end up having to use a lot, plus they're irritating (I get migraines) because of the chemicals in them. I use 2 - 3 spritzes before I leave the house. This Eau de Toilette lasts all day so I never have to reapply it and only people who stand close to me notice it. When they notice it, I always get comments and compliments, asking me what perfume I use because they love the scent. I love it!
Title: My new signature scent

Product Name: Eternity Now Eau De Parfum Spray
Description: The Fragrance Continues The Brand’s Heritage Of Florals By Opening With A Bold Burst Of Freshness As The Juicy Nectarine, Succulent Lychee, And Quince Sorbet Envelopes Skin With Light Fruity Nuances That Radiate A Distinctive Youthful Energy.  The Heart Blooms With A Floral Bouquet Of Peony, Peach Blossoms, And Dewy Neroli Petals, Leading To A Dry down Of A Soft Cashmere Veil And Traces Of Sensual Ambrox And Precious Musk That Translate The Attraction And Power Of A Beautiful Love Story About To Unfold.
ReviewText: I bought a sample pack with 10 different fragrances including this one and within one spray it was an instant favourite. Light, fruity and floral this is a very feminine scent and is perfect for day, but can definitely transition to night. I am sensitive to a lot of fragrances, they easily give me headaches, but this scent has a softness and does not irritate my nose or cause any sensitivity. I have a few other fragrances; but this is my go to.
Title: My all time favourite scent

Description: A unique and contrasting signature, with a powerful enchanting trail. Fresh Sicilian Mandarin notes, and the surprising combination of masculine Wood and Leather with an unprecedented Violet accord.
ReviewText: I like its smell. I have been using it for long and love it
Title: Great smell

Product Name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: The complexity of this fragrance begins at its core, which is composed of both Rose and Osmanthus flower, a rare and delicate bloom originating in China. The combination of these two powerful flowers reaches a perfect accord in which the light, fruity quality of the Rose is counterbalanced by the velvety, leathery aspects of the Osmanthus. The striking design of Flora by Gucci underscores the fragrance’s unusual appeal. Though born from the iconic flora motif, the new creation is rigorously novel and pushes forward the boundaries of design & style.
ReviewText: I got this as a gift 6 years ago and it was just the start for obsession, every one loves it on me it stays for hours without changing it makes me feel like I'm in a garden ☺
Title: My favorite perfume for all times

Product Name: Fuel For Life Men's Eau de Toilette
Description:
Diesel has created a life. Sexy and energetic potion for a generation who wants to live each day of its life as if there were no tomorrow. A powdery fougere with an enhanced manliness which acts like a singularly unique balm. Attention, use with caution. Second effects are not controllable.
FOUGERE: Powdery.
TOP NOTES: Star anise, pink pepper.
MIDDLE NOTES: Raspberry, lavender.
BASE NOTES: Heliotrope, immortelle flower, vetiver.
ReviewText: This is a really nice cologne, nice smell and it stays for a long time.
Title: My Favorite

Description:
Gold is strength, power, courage and confidence. Everything Jay-Z touches turns into gold. Discover his new fragrance GOLD for men.
GOLD by JAY Z has an iconic golden freshness, perfected through a layered blend of tailored modern style and refined gilded sensibility. Discover the Eau de Toilette 50 mL spray.
ReviewText: i bought this scent for my partner when it first came out. in the bottle, it smells like a warm, toned down vanilla spicebomb. i suffer from migraines so i struggle to find scents we can both wear. this is probably my favourite discovery yet! it warms up on the skin and mellows out and has a really light and pleasant kind of musk. somehow all this magic comes together under a gold cap and makes me want to eat his skin every time he wears it!
Title: surprisingly lovely!

Product Name: Gucci Rush Eau de Toilette Spray
Description: Introduced in 1999, Gucci Rush is a fantasy to be reached through an intoxicating, addictive combination of florals and spices. A sensual burst unlike any other.
ReviewText: May daughters wore this a few years back and I really loved the smell.  I decided to buy my own bottle this year.  The scent is so soft and beautiful.  It is not an overpowering scent because I wouldn't be able to wear it.  I will definitely be buying another bottle when I run out.
Title: Beautiful scent

Description: Sensual. Seductive. Captivating. HYPNÔSE  will draw you into a world of seduction with its captivating notes. It ’s a helix of sensuality whose notes are intimately blended. Passion Flower embodies sublime femininity and makes an extraordinary radiant, bright, and youthful impression. Vanilla clings to skin to tempt and entangle with creamy softness and mouth-watering seduction. Warm Vetiver is surrounded by Passion Flower —to create a deep and lingering sensuality.
ReviewText: I've used this for about ten years and will likely continue using it. The fragrance is refreshing without being overpowering. It's a classic scent that will always be in fashion.
Title: I've used it for years

Description: Sensual. Seductive. Captivating. HYPNÔSE  will draw you into a world of seduction with its captivating notes. It ’s a helix of sensuality whose notes are intimately blended. Passion Flower embodies sublime femininity and makes an extraordinary radiant, bright, and youthful impression. Vanilla clings to skin to tempt and entangle with creamy softness and mouth-watering seduction. Warm Vetiver is surrounded by Passion Flower —to create a deep and lingering sensuality.
ReviewText: I have only Lancome parfume! I love everything cream Day&Night, serum, make up!
Title: Perfect!

Description: Sensual. Seductive. Captivating. HYPNÔSE  will draw you into a world of seduction with its captivating notes. It ’s a helix of sensuality whose notes are intimately blended. Passion Flower embodies sublime femininity and makes an extraordinary radiant, bright, and youthful impression. Vanilla clings to skin to tempt and entangle with creamy softness and mouth-watering seduction. Warm Vetiver is surrounded by Passion Flower —to create a deep and lingering sensuality.
ReviewText: I love this new fragrance, every time I were , people they ask me the name.

Description: She’s irreverent and unconventional with an intense and playful sensuality that makes her unforgettable. She is bold and fearless.  A glamorous rebel with an individual spirit and style that makes a statement to the world. Her fragrance declaration is: I AM JUICY COUTURE.
ReviewText: I usually don't like a lot of perfume as most reminds me of an old lady (my nose doesn't pick up a lot of particular smells, only if it smells good or bad).  This perfume, however, is a GREAT smell.  Smells to me like a fruity scent which I love.  Definitely will buy again!
Title: The smell is so divine!

Description: She’s irreverent and unconventional with an intense and playful sensuality that makes her unforgettable. She is bold and fearless.  A glamorous rebel with an individual spirit and style that makes a statement to the world. Her fragrance declaration is: I AM JUICY COUTURE.
ReviewText: I'm a fan of Juicy Couture but there is just something about this scent that captivates me. Hard to describe, but it's everything I've been looking for in a perfume.
Title: Beautiful scent!

Description: She’s irreverent and unconventional with an intense and playful sensuality that makes her unforgettable. She is bold and fearless.  A glamorous rebel with an individual spirit and style that makes a statement to the world. Her fragrance declaration is: I AM JUICY COUTURE.
ReviewText: I love this perfume, it's perfect for summer. It has an amazing sweet/fruity scent without being overpowering and the subtle scent lasts all day.
Title: Sweet and delicious smelling

Description: A charmingly playful yet lethally gorgeous Floriental fragrance, opens with tempting dark berries and lush plum that blend into an opulent floral heart. The softness and grace of the heart is highlighted by the Royal Red Velvet flower that leads into an intoxicating background of precious woods and sensual musk. Own The Throne!
ReviewText: Musky fragrance with sweet notes. Lingers on the skin, lasts for hours and hours. I adore it, and the packaging is so cool. Makes you smell like a high-end fashionista.
Title: LOVE!

Description: A charmingly playful yet lethally gorgeous Floriental fragrance, opens with tempting dark berries and lush plum that blend into an opulent floral heart. The softness and grace of the heart is highlighted by the Royal Red Velvet flower that leads into an intoxicating background of precious woods and sensual musk. Own The Throne!
ReviewText: I bought this a little over 3 months ago, and now I don't go anywhere without it, it's my signature smell
Title: True love in a bottle

Description: A charmingly playful yet lethally gorgeous Floriental fragrance, opens with tempting dark berries and lush plum that blend into an opulent floral heart. The softness and grace of the heart is highlighted by the Royal Red Velvet flower that leads into an intoxicating background of precious woods and sensual musk. Own The Throne!
ReviewText: This is a great "everyday wear" scent. It is soft and fresh, and most importantly, not too strong! I have received a lot of compliments when I wear it. Highly recommended!
Title: Great scent!

Description: A charmingly playful yet lethally gorgeous Floriental fragrance, opens with tempting dark berries and lush plum that blend into an opulent floral heart. The softness and grace of the heart is highlighted by the Royal Red Velvet flower that leads into an intoxicating background of precious woods and sensual musk. Own The Throne!
ReviewText: This is on of the nicest sense I have ever put on. A must have for everyday
Title: Feel beautiful,  smell beautiful

Description: A charmingly playful yet lethally gorgeous Floriental fragrance, opens with tempting dark berries and lush plum that blend into an opulent floral heart. The softness and grace of the heart is highlighted by the Royal Red Velvet flower that leads into an intoxicating background of precious woods and sensual musk. Own The Throne!
ReviewText: i got this for my birthday and i love it its a bit spicy but i love it
Title: great scent

Description:
L’Eau Couture, the unique contrast between the sophistication of a couture look and the springtime freshness of an eau. A sophisticated and sensual freshness.
In the top notes, an armful of fresh citrus notes bring lightness and radiance, Calabrian bergamot and magnolia. In the heart notes, orange blossom unveils the sunny signature ingredient of the Elie Saab Le Parfum collection. In the base notes, delicious and crunchy green almond mingles with an addictive mouth-watering vanilla Infusion.
ReviewText: I purchased a fragrance sampler box and stumbled upon this fresh, happy smelling scent that became my go to daily perfume. Not overpowering but stays with you all day long and as it smells great, this is a true bonus!
Title: My fragrance sampler chosen take home bottle!

Description: The ideal man is a myth. His fragrance, a reality. Guerlain decodes men’s aspirations and creates for them a concentrate of ideal.  The ideal cologne? It has the energy of citrus, the charm of fresh, masculine almond and the classic loyalty of a musk and vetiver blend. Three elements which will turn you into the ideal man: sought-out and much-coveted. The ideal bottle? Masculine, luxurious, distinguished. The box, with its bold twist of vibrant blue, comes equipped with a flash code that invites you into a digital universe. The bottle’s luminous matte white lacquer emphasises the purity of its minimalist design. The heavy cap, also in matte white, is resolutely masculine, its design recalling the world of watchmaking with a nod to the form of a classic winder.
ReviewText: I picked this up for my dad on his birthday... he loves it!
Title: My dad loves it

Product Name: La Petite Robe Noire Eau de Parfum Intense
Description:
In La Petite Robe Noire’s fragrance wardrobe, I’m the Stylish Dress. A fragrance creation from Guerlain: an Eau de Parfum Intense with a floral sillage fashioned with deliciously gourmand notes. The glass of the legendary “upside-down heart” bottle has been tinted a magnetic and incredibly chic midnight blue. In silhouette, the new dress design is revealed – it leaves the shoulders bare and seems ready to take flight at the slightest movement!
I’m absolutely indispensable and totally irresistible. I am Guerlain’s chic and terribly glamorous fragrance creation. I’m La Petite Robe Noire.
ReviewText: I bought this about a month ago and I'm in love with it!  The scent lasts a long time and gives me that sensual feminine feeling,  woman in charge feeling.  Very sophisticated.  I would definitely recommend this fragrance . It's a bit pricey but totally worth it :)
Title: Great scent lasts all day

ReviewText:
Panic search for birthday gift!....... 
BINGO! 
Very carefully arranged scent selection!!! 
Perfect blend for not choking on the scent while trying to breath next to a man who uses it :-)
After all, the people around him need to like it too!!!!!

Highly recommend it!!!
Title: Truly manly!

Description:
BE THE EVOLUTION.
Mankind by Kenneth Cole is an aromatic woody delivering a fresh, modern and masculine scent. A sleek, tailored bottle, encased with leather, affixed with chrome bolts and topped off with a leather-wrapped cap, Mankind speaks to the quality and masculine style of the modern man. Discover the Eau de toilette 100 mL spray.
ReviewText: I purchased this item for my husband for Christmas.  I had actually ordered perfume, Tresor, for myself and received a deluxe sample of this cologne. It is not a typical woodsy scent.  It is more spicy, fresh, and warm all in one.  Scents react differently to the skin and I love the way this reacts with my Man and my man likes it.
Title: I Love this scent on my Man.

Product Name: Michael Kors for Men  Eau de Toilette
Description: Whether he's in the air, on the water or behind the wheel, Michael Kors for Men 120 ml Eau de Toilette Spray is the essential luxury for the man who is always on the move. For the ultimate jet setter, this fragrance is the perfect balance of urban sophistication and jet set style, giving him the confidence to take on any landscape, no matter where the day takes him.
ReviewText: I bought this for my husband a month ago...I melt every time he walks by and I get a whiff of his irresistible aroma! Yummmmmy!!
Title: Schmexy Man!!!

Product Name: Modern Muse Chic Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
Be an inspiration. Experience the fragrance that captures your creativity, your exuberant style. A bold contrast of vivid florals and sensual ebony woods.

Two distinctively different accords—Vivid Florals Accord and Striking Ebony Woods Accord—provide an intriguing dual impression. It's a true innovation in fragrance design, as complex and fascinating as the woman who inspires it.
The Inspiration

Like the award-winning original Modern Muse, Modern Muse Chic was inspired by the complexity of a modern woman. Who is Modern Muse Chic? She’s the rare woman who defines style on her own terms. Her mantra is never be ordinary. Bold, original, extroverted and creative. Her love of fashion and the way she uses accessories to express her innate sense of style inspires everyone she meets.
ReviewText:
I have purchased this product and i must say i am so glad I did. It has a beautiful scent and so many people even strangers have commented how how nice the scent is then they ask me the name. I where it all the time. It is even in a beautiful shade of pink in the bottle. My fav colour. 
Thank you.
Title: Beautiful scent

Description:
Be an inspiration. Experience the fragrance that captures your creativity, your exuberant style. A bold contrast of vivid florals and sensual ebony woods.

Two distinctively different accords—Vivid Florals Accord and Striking Ebony Woods Accord—provide an intriguing dual impression. It's a true innovation in fragrance design, as complex and fascinating as the woman who inspires it.

Like the award-winning original Modern Muse, Modern Muse Chic was inspired by the complexity of a modern woman. Who is Modern Muse Chic? She’s the rare woman who defines style on her own terms. Her mantra is never be ordinary. Bold, original, extroverted and creative. Her love of fashion and the way she uses accessories to express her innate sense of style inspires everyone she meets.
ReviewText: I have been buying Modern Muse for a few years now, and absolutlely love the smell.  Every time I where it I get compliments galore!  I can't go a day without it.  I feel great when wearing Modern Muse, it really uplifts my spirits!
Title: Beautifully Intoxicating Scent

Product Name: Modern Muse Chic Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
Be an inspiration. Experience the fragrance that captures your creativity, your exuberant style. A bold contrast of vivid florals and sensual ebony woods.

Two distinctively different accords—Vivid Florals Accord and Striking Ebony Woods Accord—provide an intriguing dual impression. It's a true innovation in fragrance design, as complex and fascinating as the woman who inspires it.

ReviewText: First off, I am a perfume junkie, I probably have 30 different kinds, you know the drill - you like it in the store but once you get it home and wear it a couple times, you realize its too strong, too flowery, too musky...but I find myself reaching for this one 99% of the time. I'm currently almost halfway through my second bottle of this perfume, it smells amazing! I get compliments all the time, its great to wear daily, for special occasions, anytime!

Product Name: Rogue Man By Rihanna Eau de Toilette
Description: Rihanna unveils her first-ever fragrance for men. ROGUE MAN by Rihanna is an inherently masculine and ultra sexy fragrance. An irresistible contrast between citrus, herbs and spicy black pepper creates a clean opening impression to draw you in. The seductive tension continues throughout, as soft velvet florals blend with the strength of cedar wood that lingers on your skin. Discover the Eau de Toilette 100 mL spray.
ReviewText: I actually received this last year as a gift and I've been searching everywhere for it! It has such a phenomenal smell that last the whole day! Rihanna truly surprised me with this cologne. She definitely knows what a man should smell like and how to attract the girls.

Description: Anna brings us the magic, the legends, the belief of wishes. Translucent as a fairy's wing, mysterious as a moonlit forest, Secret Wish embodies the enchanting essence of a fairy tale. The instant the scent is released, a lush, ripe world opens up, filled with a bouquet of juicy fruits: fresh, sparkling lemon; summery melon; and velvety tagete, a soft, apricot-scented flower. Like fairies taking flight, it darts, hither and yon, surprising as it wafts in the air. A burst of joyful pineapple adds a note of flirtatious charm, as acidulous blackcurrant offers its mysterious facets. The fragrance deepens into a magical twilight with warm white cedar wood and sensual amber adding an intense and alluring character. Finishing with a light touch of musk, like falling star dust, it leaves an infinitely feminine wake. A fragrance that is at once as powerful as a charm, and as beguiling as a fairy kiss, it is a perfect balance of fruity and floral notes. Totally in command of a woodland realm. In a shade as soft as a fairy mist, the softest aqua dew, this is truly an elixir of fantasy and emotion. Secret Wish, the mystical fragrance... Overseen by a fairy.
ReviewText: I have loved this scent for many years! It has been out of stores for years and I've had to purchase through ebay, I am so happy to see this back in stores!! I always receive complements when I wear this!! Very very happy to see this back!!!!!!!!
Title: Beautiful Scent!

ReviewText: This is one of my all-time favourite scents. Soft and musky. I finally treated myself to bottle and was complimented on my first day wearing it. It's and up close and personal scent.

Description: A perfume with a thousand different facets, Ysatis combines the richness of the east with the spirit of the west. Ysatis symbolizes an affirmed, fascinating and mysterious seduction. The Ysatis woman dreams of having as many aspects to her character as her perfume. She exudes an irresistible charm to intrigue and bewitch.
ReviewText: I have been wearing this perfume for many years and always receive at least one compliment from strangers/friends. I love the subtleness and the fact that one small spritz will last me ask day. The price is well worth it.
Title: Compliments from all

Description:
ETERNITY, inspired by the ideal of lasting love and intimacy, is a romantic floral fragrance. This harmonious blend of classic and contemporary is truly the perfect combination of timeless quality and modern style.

The ETERNITY fragrance.  Inspired by a beautiful wedding band, a gift from the Duke of Windsor to his much-beloved Duchess.  The ring, a simple band of diamonds, was inscribed with one word – “ETERNITY” – the perfect symbol of enduring love and commitment.  This idea lives on in the romantic floral scent of the Eternity fragrance.

top notes:   freesia, mandarin, sage.
middle notes:   muguet, white lily, marigold, narcissus.
bottom notes:   patchouli, sandalwood, amber.
ReviewText: This is a great perfume for everyday wear and goes with almost any occassion. I love the men's version of it too.
Title: Everyday wear

Description: The brilliant, almost blinding scent of the Ed Hardy tattoo art was the inspiration of this super vibrant and sexy fragrance. An odour explosion of fruits opens the accent including Tropical Mango, Wild Strawberries, and Ruby Red Grapefruit vintage floralcy with a Rock’n Roll edge brings a dark eeriness including Black Freesia. This contrast of floralcy merges into a background of Hot Skin and Warm Soulful Amber. It is a delicious and very addictive fragrance statement.
ReviewText: I received the roll-on version of this as a gift, I keep it in my purse for those mid-day touch ups on days I'm running around a lot. The scent is great, it is nice and light but can be added to if needed! I find it doesn't clash with whichever perfume I'm already wearing.
Title: Great simple go-to!

An intensely feminine celebration of nature, with a sensual, seductive side.

Embrace the velvety, voluptuous bouquet of Peony, Pink Tiger Lily and Jasmine.

I thought that because it was One Direction, it would have more of an alcohol scent, but this perfume is amazing. It smells so good, people have actually complimented me on it! It lasts throughout the day, and it's subtle enough that it doesn't overpower you or people you're around. Love it!

Description: Loverdose is an aromatic fragrance launched in 2011 from Diesel. This exquisite perfume is beautifully crafted to spice the world of all dainty ladies. This perfume is based on a floral composition with a subtle hint of spice with star anise and mandarin. You will be mesmerized how your man gets swayed away by the floral fragrances of sambac jasmine, licorice, and gardenia petals composition, placed on an Oriental base of amber, vanilla and woody note. Going by the name, the stylish bottle resembles a heart-shaped diamond pierced by an arrow, colored in intense shades of purple.
ReviewText: I have been wearing this sent for two years now on my second bottle. It is lovley you really get the vanilla essence with and over tone of licorice! Delightful
Title: Amazing

Title: Beautiful scent

Title: My go-to perfume!

Description: Uplifts, Refreshes, Captivates. A surprising combination of essential oils and plant extracts with aroma and phyto-therapy benefits. The sparkling freshness of fruity zests, a captivating note of wild rose and the scent of comforting wood. All the charm of a dream-like garden combined with the skin care benefits of beech, sorbier and blackcurrant bud extracts. Moisturizes, soothes and ensures beautifully soft skin.
ReviewText: I was writing another review for a Clarins skincare product and I quickly caught this product in the inventory of products. I was instantly thrilled. I had forgotten how much I love this body scent. Its soooooo sexy and light and sensual. Its been awhile since I bought this and I used to use it all the tie. Seeing it here online has prompted me to zip out and pick up a bottle becausse I love it so much. For anyone who loves a natural sensuality to scent, this is it. I used to spray it in the air and wave my hair through it and wow, I used to get stopped in grocery stores all the time with people saying I smelled so nice. One time the giy at the gas station even commented. Got to go people.....on my way out to pick up another bottle of my long lost lovely Eau des Jardins
Title: Ahhh my lovely Eau des Jardins

Description: Uplifts, Refreshes, Captivates. A surprising combination of essential oils and plant extracts with aroma and phyto-therapy benefits. The sparkling freshness of fruity zests, a captivating note of wild rose and the scent of comforting wood. All the charm of a dream-like garden combined with the skin care benefits of beech, sorbier and blackcurrant bud extracts. Moisturizes, soothes and ensures beautifully soft skin.
ReviewText: I bought Eau des Jardins 2 years ago in a Munich airport when I had my leftover euros to waste before I went back to Canada. My favorite perfume ever, and I'm in love with the scent! It lasted me exactly 2 years ( I bought it in February 2011, when it first came out) and now I'm down to the last few drops after using it almost every day! :'( I will definitely be buying this again, and probably for the rest of my life.
Title: The Best Perfume I Have Ever Had

Description: Uplifts, Refreshes, Captivates. A surprising combination of essential oils and plant extracts with aroma and phyto-therapy benefits. ReviewText: I sampled Clarins Eau des Jardins in Shoppers Drug Mart a while back and was so pleasantly surprised that it was such a gorgeous fragrance.  I wear it to work and it smells fresh and not cloying like some scents are. I get compliments all the time on how nice it smells. Would not have thought Clarins made such a delicious fragrance on top of their wonderful skin care line.
Title: Hidden Gem

ReviewText: I just happened upon this beautiful scent, looking for another product from this wonderful line of skin care and makeup. I wasn't so exuberant over the original scent, and then just sprayed a bit of this scent, and fell in love immediately. I hope this scent remains for a very long time. I can share i t with my young daughters, being it is not overpowering.
Title: A fragrance that smells delightfully luscious.

I have gotten compliments on it, which is always nice. I even spray a little of it in my hair for a lasting hint of fragrance.

Description:
Fresh and light as the morning dew. Airy and sensual, Miss Dior Silky Body Mist delicately perfumes and beautifies the skin. Its easy to apply formula combines the benefits of an enhancing body care with the freshness of a mist. Light and non-oily, it preserves the skin’s hydration for 6 hours, leaving it infinitely soft upon application. Your skin is nourished, smooth, glowing and the trail of your Miss Dior fragrance is extended and intensified.

"The silky texture of Miss Dior Silky Body Mist creates a delicate trail, full of nuance. A moment in the beauty ritual to truly connect with oneself." François Demachy
ReviewText: Love this , its just like the perfume but much cheaper would buy again, it doesnt last as long as the perfume but its great for if ur only going to be out for no more then 4 hours.
Title: Smell so good

Description: The original sweet and savory fragrance, MUGLER Womanity perfume is built around the fig, a symbol of femininity. The fragrance has a fig and caviar accord The bottle is a sculpted work of art.
ReviewText: This was my first try of Womanity by Thierry Mugler. If you like deep woody scents, this one is for you. It is subtle and at first appears fruity but after few minutes reveals true undertone of earthy, woody scent.. I am happy to have tried it albeit this may not be exactly "me"
Title: Deep yet subtle woody scent

Description: The original sweet and savory fragrance, MUGLER Womanity perfume is built around the fig, a symbol of femininity. The fragrance has a fig and caviar accord The bottle is a sculpted work of art.
ReviewText: This fragrance is very unique and is definitely one of my favourites.
Title: Unique fragrance!

Product Name: Angel Eau de Parfum Non Refillable
Description: The MUGLER ANGEL Shooting Star perfume bottle features blue gems and delicately sculpted facets that reflect light and shadows.
ReviewText: I tried this out on a few occasions, not my favourite scent but I find that it does settle nicely on my skin and doesn't change over time.I wouldn't recommend it just because I'm not particularly fond of it but I have a friend that swears by Angel. I would recommend testing it out if you do like the scent out of the bottle.
Title: Not my cup of tea

Product Name: Angel Eau de Parfum Non Refillable
Description: The MUGLER ANGEL Shooting Star perfume bottle features blue gems and delicately sculpted facets that reflect light and shadows.
ReviewText: I love the lasting power of this scent.  The notes are very rich and it's a great scent for the fall/winter.   I will be repurchasing this one again and again!
Title: Love this perfume!

Product Name: Angel Eau de Parfum Non Refillable
Description: The MUGLER ANGEL Shooting Star perfume bottle features blue gems and delicately sculpted facets that reflect light and shadows.
ReviewText: This is a very sweet, sexy scent. It comes in a refillable version which is quite a bit more pricey but worth it if you will be sticking to it for a long time.
Title: Sweet and sexy

Product Name: Amber Pour Homme Intense Eau de Parfum
ReviewText: This is definitely Amber Pour Homme without the shaving cream aspect.  It's heavier on the amber and patchouli, it's darker, spicier, and not quite as smooth. Despite the heavier concentration, it doesn't strike me as any louder or stronger, either; It's more of a fall scent than spring or winter. It's well done, and I suspect many men will like it better than the original.
Title: More Masculine than Feminine

Description:
Pretty pink gel creates a rich lather that surrounds you with the rich scent of Beautiful as it gently cleanses your skin.
Beautiful is the fragrance of a thousand flowers. A rich blend of Rose, Lily, Tuberose and Orange Flower. Brightened with citrus, warmed by woods.
ReviewText: This bath and shower gel is amazing. Makes my body feel great and it smells amazing. Perfect for spa nights at home.
Title: Great Bath And Shower Gel

Description: The colour Black becomes the predominant element in the presentation of this perfume, Ferrari Black. Spirit, mystery, sensuality…the concept that inspired the creation of this perfume. Style:  Strong. Warm. Sensual. Elegant.  Notes:  Bergamot. Lime. Red Apple. Plum. Cardamom. Cinnamon. Jasmine. Rose. Cedar Wood. Amyris Wood. Vanilla. Amber. Musk Crystals.
ReviewText:
Mystery and Sensuality the description says...yeah I could get behind that. At first it smells predominantly like oranges and vanilla, which I like, so no problem. I didn't realise that this scent was geared towards women though (the bottle seems to be marketing towards men), so what I thought would turn into a heavy pepper turned into a soft watercolour.
Perhaps if you're feeling firey or sexy as all get out and want to let the people know you run the world, this could be the one for you.
Title: Surprised

Description: When absolute freshness meets ultimate distinction. Discover the new sensual & sophisticated fougere woody fragrance by Ralph Lauren, Polo Blue Eau de Parfum.
ReviewText: I bought this product as a new year's gift to my friend and absolutely loved it.
Title: Very Good for everyday use

Description: Feel the Power with Drakkar Essence, an aromatic woody fragrance for the charming and daring man. His fragrance is an irresistible blend of spearmint, lavender, and sage, that collides with the warm and vibrant base of dry woods, musk, and tonka bean—resulting in a statement-making sophistication. This fresh and aromatic essence is at once bold and sensual, evoking an air of unstoppable self-confidence.
ReviewText: I bought this a couple weeks ago smells good  only used on special occasions
Title: Good product

Description: Emozione, the scent of emotions celebrating life’s true Glamour. The floral quintessence of real luxury. The emotional harmony of beautiful shades of white, from pale pink peony, sheer peach to golden white iris and suede.
ReviewText: Marketed towards older women (in a relative sense), Emozione reminds me of Lacome La Vie Est Belle and Georgio Amarni Si. It smells very soft when first put on, almost peachy, and turns into pale cosmetic powder which smooths over the floral scents so nothing stands out too much, like the rose or patchouli. I was impressed by Emozione, I wouldn't buy it, but I fully understand why someone else would if they needed a discreet no-brainer powder scent in your collection. It's pretty, discreet, and manages to live up to the 'modern, sophisticated and elegant' description.
Title: No-brainer Powder Scent

Product Name: Ferrari Man in Red Eau de Toilette
Description: A masculine and eye-catching bottle: a design capitalizing on the iconic Red Rosso "Corsa" with a luxurious spray cap. A tribute to the Ferrari supercar created by Maurice Roucel (Symrise). “MAN IN RED” designs a new outline of assertive masculinity in the fragrance universe. With its straight style, its beautiful contrasts and its extreme strength, it is a tribute to male's power of attraction and seduction. The top is quick off the mark! I imagined an immediate fresh and masculine top: a bright inaccessible first impression of a charismatic man who catches everyone's attention. Therefore I blended Bergamot to bring brightness, mouth-watering Red Apple and crunchy Cardamom to boost freshness. Then comes a generous virile heart composed of carnal and sweet Golden Plum, refined and captivating Orange Flower, enhanced by the sharp aromatic radiance of Lavandin “Espieur”.  Finally, the base is a condensate of sensuality and extreme power, a comfortable mix of refined Cedar wood, addictive Tonka bean and warm Labdanum with a leathery nuance. All this gives birth to the most distinctive and long-lasting signature.
ReviewText: this Ferrari fragrance is a pleasant manly smell  which is not over powering but yet noticeable , but not annoying .  perfect for every day use .
Title: manly smell

Product Name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Parfum Spray
Description: Gucci Flora is a subtle, sophisticated, floral fragrance inspired by princesses from the past, present, and future. The Flora Donna is a young, classic, and refined woman with the 'Gucci edge' of power and sensuality. The first Flora scarf was exclusively designed for Princess Grace of Monaco in 1966 and soon became one of the most popular Gucci icons. This scent is an expression of the Flora legacy. Its seductive layers mirror the playful details and bright colors that channel the heart of a fashion empire.
ReviewText: To me nothing stands out other than the peony, and even that only for a short while. It's definitely geared towards younger women like myself but I found it to be much too bland for my tastes. It's not going to offend anybody-and if that's your goal, wonderful - but it's not going to make anyone ask you what you're wearing.
Title: Buy Something Else

Product Name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Parfum Spray
Description: Gucci Flora is a subtle, sophisticated, floral fragrance inspired by princesses from the past, present, and future. The Flora Donna is a young, classic, and refined woman with the 'Gucci edge' of power and sensuality. The first Flora scarf was exclusively designed for Princess Grace of Monaco in 1966 and soon became one of the most popular Gucci icons. This scent is an expression of the Flora legacy. Its seductive layers mirror the playful details and bright colors that channel the heart of a fashion empire.
ReviewText: I love this perfume! Everything I wear it, my friends always ask what the fragrance. It has a light floral smell that isn't over powering. My boyfriend always compliments me when he picks me up! He says I smell like cotton candy.
Title: My Signature Fragance

Product Name: Lauder Pleasures For Men Cologne Spray
Description:
A clean, crisp fragrance that perfectly captures the best times in life.
Feel the energy. Welcome the warmth, the absolute ease. This fresh, woodsy, refreshingly masculine scent blends citrus and herbs with rich spices and rare woods. All clarified with a unique Sky Air Accord.
Capture the moment.
ReviewText:
Purchased this for my father as a gift to change up his scent. This is a soft yet masculine scent, not at all overpowering like some men's colognes. Reasonable lasting power. What's nice is that it IS NOT like all the young axe-type scents, so people don't think he's trying to be a teenager or 20 something.

I think it is appropriate for a middle aged male (mid 40s to 60s) and he appreciated the choice.
Title: More mature scent

Product Name: Liquid Cashmere Black Eau de Parfum
Description: Dark. Alluring. Tantalizing, with notes of ripe Black Cherry, rich Patchouli and smooth Praline—a seduction about to unfold.  Indulge in liquid luxury with our newest fragrance: Donna Karan Liquid Cashmere Black. Exposing the passion of a woman.
ReviewText:
When you first spray Cashmere Black be prepared to smell a lot of cedar wood and spices, but give it maybe 20 minutes and it smooths out into something more soothing. I think it could be worn by either sex despite being marketed towards only women; it's sexy but not overdone.
As for the price, maybe see if it's on sale from time to time.
Title: Unisex

Description: What if irresistible was the new fun? Discover the new Live Irrésistible Eau de Toilette that challenges you to live an irresistible life.
ReviewText: Received this as a gift from my husband and it smells amazing. Lovely feminine scent although the only con is the price. I feel there are perfumes that cost less and have a similar scent. Overall I would recommend to anyone.
Title: Smells great

Description: loveswept is a lively, romantic fragrance created to make a woman feel irresistibly swept away. this soft floral fragrance sparkles with energy and leaves you with a soft embrace of happiness and love. get swept off your feet again and again and feel inspired to live each day with passion.
ReviewText: Fragrance is so subjective, this is just my opinion, but I find this scent to be annoying. Every time a catch a whiff of this, I find myself being annoyed. I love wearing fragrance and philosophy has been my go-to fragrances for years, but this one is a big miss for me. When first strayed on, you can gets hints of citrus, maybe grapefruit. It is not sweet like the other love fragrances. I miss that sweetness. It dries down to a heavy floral, not pleasant. It almost smells like a cheap perfume to me. There is no richness or depth. And while I could smell it all day on myself, I asked some others if they could smell my perfume and they all said "no". I just can't recommend this.
Title: I find this scent annoying

Description: loveswept is a lively, romantic fragrance created to make a woman feel irresistibly swept away. this soft floral fragrance sparkles with energy and leaves you with a soft embrace of happiness and love. get swept off your feet again and again and feel inspired to live each day with passion.
ReviewText: When I first sprayed this fragrance on my skin, I liked it well enough. After about 30 minutes, the scent became so overpowering, strong and very unpleasant for me. Rarely do I get a headache from fragrances, but this one caused me one. I wish I could explain exactly why that was, but unfortunately, I cannot. I wish the Philosophy brand would focus more on their winning scents, rather than experimenting with newer scents that just don't quite fit in with what is considered "philosophy". It seems that Philosophy is phasing out of scents that have are tried and true. Perhaps it is time to rethink that.
Title: Not For Me

Description: loveswept is a lively, romantic fragrance created to make a woman feel irresistibly swept away. this soft floral fragrance sparkles with energy and leaves you with a soft embrace of happiness and love. get swept off your feet again and again and feel inspired to live each day with passion.
ReviewText:
On initial spray, my first thought is that this smells similar to love sweet love. Very strong and very citrusy.

That strong citrus scent fades pretty quickly and then the floral notes start to come out. The sweet notes that are in falling in love and unconditional love are not in this scent. It's much more tart than sweet. When it is dry, the floral scent is still very strong "heavy" and the scent is very long lasting. In my opinion, it's not a "soft" scent.

Only 3 stars because personally I am not a big fan of citrus notes in my fragrances--they give me a headache. I think if you like love sweet love (maybe even inner grace fans), you might really enjoy loveswept!

I'm waiting for a soft, warm vanilla musk! (and, a seasonal snow angel parfum!)
Title: for me, it's just ok.

Description: loveswept is a lively, romantic fragrance created to make a woman feel irresistibly swept away. this soft floral fragrance sparkles with energy and leaves you with a soft embrace of happiness and love. get swept off your feet again and again and feel inspired to live each day with passion.
ReviewText: I adore Philosophy's shower gels, but I never felt that the Grace line of scents was for me. I have been searching for a new fragrance for months and, luckily, Loveswept came along. One spritz had me intrigued. I met my mother later that day and the first thing she said to me was that I smelled like spring! This fragrance is light, fun, and pretty. If you're looking for depth and complexity, steer clear. However, if you're ready to put winter behind you then try out this breath of fresh air!
Title: Beautiful!

Description: loveswept is a lively, romantic fragrance created to make a woman feel irresistibly swept away. this soft floral fragrance sparkles with energy and leaves you with a soft embrace of happiness and love. get swept off your feet again and again and feel inspired to live each day with passion.
ReviewText: I love philosophy skin care products, but have never cared for the fragrance product line. However, this has become my signature fragrance. I always receive compliments on it when I wear it, whether it is the shower gel, lotion, or cologne. I don't like the shower gel as well as some of the other products, but I do use it. I love the lotion and the cologne. If I had to pick between the three products, I would first choose the lotion, then the cologne, and finally the shower gel.
Title: Favorite Fragrance

Description: loveswept is a lively, romantic fragrance created to make a woman feel irresistibly swept away. this soft floral fragrance sparkles with energy and leaves you with a soft embrace of happiness and love. get swept off your feet again and again and feel inspired to live each day with passion.
ReviewText: I LOVE this fragrance. A sample was included in another purchase and I immediately ordered the perfume and lotion package after trying. I will say, however, I am not a huge fan of the perfume right upon spraying but once it settles and mixes with my pheromones it is beyond words. I don't even know how to describe it, but it is as if the scent enhances my own personal scent - or so I'd like to think! It's light, playful, and addicting. I feel pretty when wearing Love Swept.
Title: lovelovelove

Description: loveswept is a lively, romantic fragrance created to make a woman feel irresistibly swept away. this soft floral fragrance sparkles with energy and leaves you with a soft embrace of happiness and love. get swept off your feet again and again and feel inspired to live each day with passion.
ReviewText:
i always try all the new philosophy fragrances. i had high hopes for this one but unfortunately it just didn't jive with my body chemistry. when i first sprayed it i loved the grapefruit/citrus note in it, but that dried down into a floral scent and the citrus notes were gone. the floral is too strong for me and after a while it just morphed into a pungent scent that i couldn't handle. i will say this, the fragrance lasts and lasts and lasts and i could smell it on me until i washed it off.

i admit i have a hard time finding fragrances that don't give me a headache. that's why for all these years amazing grace, pure grace, unconditional love and falling in love have been my very favorites, they smell wonderful on me and never give me a headache. i just don't associate this scent with a "philosophy-type" fragrance.
Title: too strong for me

Description: loveswept is a lively, romantic fragrance created to make a woman feel irresistibly swept away. this soft floral fragrance sparkles with energy and leaves you with a soft embrace of happiness and love. get swept off your feet again and again and feel inspired to live each day with passion.
ReviewText: I found the fragrance in Nordstrom last week. I asked for a sample and spayed some on my wrist. For the next three hours, everyone that I encountered told me how wonderful I smelled. The feedback was that the scent was very clean and pretty. It is super light and not to floral or citrusy. It is the perfect scent that makes you think of Spring. It smells nothing like the other Love Story scents. This one will give Summer Grace some good competition! #truephilosophygirl!
Title: I"m in love again!

Description: loveswept is a lively, romantic fragrance created to make a woman feel irresistibly swept away. this soft floral fragrance sparkles with energy and leaves you with a soft embrace of happiness and love. get swept off your feet again and again and feel inspired to live each day with passion.
ReviewText: I've seen so many Philosophy reviews that complain about the lasting power of Philosophy's fragrances, it's bizarre to see how many reviewers complain about the strength of Loveswept. I have always found Philosophy fragrances last very well on me, but I do believe Loveswept has a stronger sillage than the others. I don't mind this at all, and I really enjoy this fragrance.

ReviewText: Amazing Grace and Pure Grace are beautiful scents that put Philosophy on the map. Now they only lasts a few minutes so I try different scents. How about making Amazing and Pure Grace last and don't worry about new scents
