ReviewText: I've been an Amazing Grace lover for years and prefer the "Graces". Haven't been a fan of the "love" fragrances, however, got a sample of Love Swept and LOVE it. You don't need a lot because it really lasts. I don't know if this would be my every day scent, but it's a nice change in my fragrance wardrobe. Philosophy produces winners time and time again.
Title: Engaging scent

ReviewText: I'm drawn to Philosophy fragrances, primarily Pure and Baby Grace, because they are clean and subtle. Loveswept is much more prominent than most Philosophy fragrances, in my opinion. I get a sparkling grapefruit that settles into a floral, which probably will appeal to a lot of people. I think the grapefruit note is just too strong for my nose.

Title: Swept Away

ReviewText: I have to admit I do like Loveswept. It is much more enjoyable than the other "love fragrances." However, I was expecting Loveswept to be more subtle. It's not. I give it one spritz and the scent lasts all day. It is a nice scent for Spring.
Title: Favorite Philosophy scent in the love line

Title: In Love

Description: loveswept is a lively, romantic fragrance created to make a woman feel irresistibly swept away. this soft floral fragrance sparkles with energy and leaves you with a soft embrace of happiness and love. get swept off your feet again and again and feel inspired to live each day with passion.
ReviewText: On first spritz this immediately reminded me of Love Sweet Love, probably because it opens with citrus and has no berries notes like some of the other Love Story scents. But I compared the two on opposite arms and they are VERY different. LSL is a stronger fragrance with a more pronounced citrus (grapefruit to my nose) and it lasts all day on me. Loveswept has much softer notes of citrus, floral and musk, but the fragrance is so light that even with my first application of 4-5 spritzes I had to hold my arm up to my nose to smell it. I thought maybe it was just me so I wore it out several times, layered with the body lotion, and not a single person told me I smelled good. I finally broke down on a car ride with my mother one day and asked if she could smell my recently applied Loveswept and the answer was no, not at all, until I held my wrist under her nose. Philosophy, this is a lovely scent and I like the soft blend of the notes. But I want to be able to smell it and have those around me enjoy it!! I hope you'll consider a concentrated eau de Parfum or Fine Perfume version.
Title: Lovely scent, but too light and essentially undectable

Product Name: Omnia Coral Eau de Toilette spray
Description: Bvlgari Omnia Coral is a true Gem of the ocean. Coral is “the red gold” of the Mediterranean Sea for its lively, punchy, vibrating color. It strongly symbolizes “The Essence of Summer”. Dedicated to the youthful, sophisticated woman with style and a dynamic personality.  Notes: Goji Berries, Hibiscus flower, Pomegranate   Style: Fresh, Floral, Fruity
ReviewText: This is likable and pleasant; if you'd like something fruity, but not too fruity or sweet or young, it is very much worth a try. Not groundbreaking, but quite nicely done and perfectly wearable. I would think it would wear nicely in nearly any weather.
Title: A 'Red Fruit' sort of Scent

Description: Royal Revolution is a tempting, royal and Rebellious fragrance that tantalizes scents of mystical blackthorn, pink freesia and Pomegranate. Royal Revolution is the new scent of victory.
ReviewText:
This is a scent I would reccomend going into the store and trying on a card first before purchasing. Depending on what scents you like this could swing either way. I've never liked Katy Perry's scents before but this one was intriguing. I can't say I'd take to wearing it every day but interesting none the less. Price wise it's average for a celebrity endorsed scent, and Blackthorn, pink Freesia, and pomegranate are not normally smells you hear about often in a scent. I would say it's better than Killer Queen even.
I would reccomend this scent only if you've truly tried it and like what you smell after a while, maybe get a gift with purchase one or a sample tester first.
Title: Not bad

Description: Royal Revolution is a tempting, royal and Rebellious fragrance that tantalizes scents of mystical blackthorn, pink freesia and Pomegranate. Royal Revolution is the new scent of victory.
ReviewText: I bought this 2 weeks ago and I absolutely love the fruity smell. Will be buying again. I had a lot of compliments on the awesome smell too.
Title: Smells awesome

Product Name: UNTOLD Absolu Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
UNTOLD ABSOLU is a deeper, more sensual interpretation of UNTOLD. Luxurious floral absolutes, red plum and black raspberry accents work in perfect harmony with its magnetic amber base, speaking to the more glamorous and captivating side of today’s modern woman. 

Olfactive Classification: Glamorous Oriental
ReviewText: I am really difficult when it comes to scents, I have been trying different parfumes for  years in stores but most scents are too vulgar and aggressive for me, the humble ones are not interesting enough. FINALLY at an airport I found this treasure! I love it so much, if i need a warm, cheerful moment, I spray it on :-)  Sadly only 1 airport sells it in Europe, no stores or malls, so I can only buy it when I fly out from Budapest.
Title: Best parfume ever!

Product Name: UNTOLD Absolu Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
UNTOLD ABSOLU is a deeper, more sensual interpretation of UNTOLD. Luxurious floral absolutes, red plum and black raspberry accents work in perfect harmony with its magnetic amber base, speaking to the more glamorous and captivating side of today’s modern woman. 

Olfactive Classification: Glamorous Oriental
UserLocation: Cosmopolitan woman living in NH and VT
ReviewText: I enjoyed the samples of "Untold" this summer and after reading all the fragrance notes in the "Untold Absolue" , which are among my favorites for a floral Oriental fragrance, I took the plunge and purchased this as a fragrance for the fall and winter. I anticipated this eau de perfume to have similar characteristics as the lighter "Untold" but deepened with the spicier notes listed in the "Absolue" formula. But it is a different fragrance entirely. And I also expected it to be more unique as compared to so many other fragrances in this category but was disappointed that it really is not. It is long lasting and not overpowering. When I do select this fragrance to wear, I spritz on one or two other scents as well to give it sparkle and my own unique touch. THIS is when I get compliments but of course, it's not just "Untold Absolue", but my own *recipe* of combinations. Be adventurous and give this a try! And feel free to play with it by combining some of your own favorite lighter notes, too!
Title: A warm flor-iental, but was expecting something more unique

Title: Great scent

Product Name: UNTOLD Elizabeth Arden Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
A luxurious and modern floral composition, UNTOLD celebrates the sophistication and intrigue of the multi-faceted modern woman. From her vibrant optimism and refined femininity to her mysterious aura and magnetic sensuality, UNTOLD takes you on a journey through the many facets that together, make her genuinely beautiful. 

With its sparkling and fruity introduction, radiant floral heart and mysterious addictive warmth, UNTOLD captures all that a woman is. 

Olfactive Classification: Sensual Floral
ReviewText: i first tried this cologne at the Elizabeth Arden counter and fell in love with it immediately! when i first put it on, i noticed a wonderful floral scent with a little hint of warmth. when i got n my car i noticed more of the warmth and a slight spicy note that felt fun and sexy, but yet sophisticated! i went home and ordered it online from Elizabeth Arden right away! i get compliments all of the time, and when i was at the gas station, a man approached me and asked me what i was wearing, and that he was looking for an anniversary gift for his wife! he said it was the best fragrance he has ever smelled!!! Untold is my new favorite!
Title: sensual and sexy

Product Name: UNTOLD Elizabeth Arden Eau de Parfum Spray
Description:
A luxurious and modern floral composition, UNTOLD celebrates the sophistication and intrigue of the multi-faceted modern woman. From her vibrant optimism and refined femininity to her mysterious aura and magnetic sensuality, UNTOLD takes you on a journey through the many facets that together, make her genuinely beautiful. 

With its sparkling and fruity introduction, radiant floral heart and mysterious addictive warmth, UNTOLD captures all that a woman is. 

Olfactive Classification: Sensual Floral
ReviewText: I really love the balance of this scent. Not too flowery or citrusy, not too spicy or musky. It is a wonderful fragrance. My only wish was that it had a bit more staying power. I also like Sunflowers and Blue Grass by EA and they last for hours without being overpowering. This spray seems to wane after an hour or two. Otherwise, they got the formula right, and body chemistry is different on every woman, so maybe someone else would disagree.
Title: Love The Scent, Wish It Lasted Longer

Description: Top notes are bergamot, blood orange and vodka; middle notes are black currant, pink pepper, nectarine, jasmine and plum; base notes are musk, cedar, sandalwood and patchouli.
ReviewText: A predictable enough fruity floral: competent, but neither interesting nor memorable. Buy it if you are looking through Shopper's $20 shelf for a christmas gift.
Title: Inoffensive & Cheap

Description: Top notes are bergamot, blood orange and vodka; middle notes are black currant, pink pepper, nectarine, jasmine and plum; base notes are musk, cedar, sandalwood and patchouli.
ReviewText: LOVE LOVE LOVE this scent.  I wear it daily and feel naked without it. ;-)
Title: Ed Hardy - Women Eau de Parfum

ReviewText: Not a usual perfume wearer as I find the smells overwhelming, but this one is light and fresh with an almost soapy undertone. Develops nicely on the skin and doesn't lean too far in the "vanilla cookie" zone. A suprizingly nice fragrance from a boy band!
Title: Light and Fresh

ReviewText: I got this as a gift and was pleasantly surprised, only a light mist during the day. Sweetand floral.
Title: Lovely scent

Product Name: Red Door Aura Eau de Toilette Spray Naturel
Description: Red Door Aura, the vibrant floral fragrance inspired by our luxurious classic Red Door. It takes a master perfumer to create a fragrance this luminous and sparkling and contemporary while maintaining the elegant sensuality of our famous Red Door scent.
ReviewText: I have been searching for a tasteful, feminine, classic fragrance that does not overpower those around me. (I live in the Deep South, and too much sillage is not a good thing!) Red Door Aura is perfect and balanced: bergamot keeps the floral notes from being overly sweet. It is lovely for the office, church, and social occasions, My "twenty-something" daughters will be needing their own bottles in the very near future, or mine will not last long!
Title: Simply Divine!

Product Name: Red Door Aura Eau de Toilette Spray Naturel
Description: Red Door Aura, the vibrant floral fragrance inspired by our luxurious classic Red Door. It takes a master perfumer to create a fragrance this luminous and sparkling and contemporary while maintaining the elegant sensuality of our famous Red Door scent.
ReviewText: I chose Red Door Aura EDT because it sounded lighter, a bit sweeter than traditional Red Door. Sounded like a good choice for summer. Actually, it is stronger with a dusty scent (Base Notes sandalwood and musk?), not clean and fresh (Top Notes of Freesia, Raspberry and Lily not evident).  Will not purchase again.  Disappointed.   Not at any local stores for me to try it before ordering direct.
Title: disappointed

Product Name: Red Door Aura Eau de Toilette Spray Naturel
Description: Red Door Aura, the vibrant floral fragrance inspired by our luxurious classic Red Door. It takes a master perfumer to create a fragrance this luminous and sparkling and contemporary while maintaining the elegant sensuality of our famous Red Door scent.
ReviewText: i actually purchased this by mistake , opened it an instantly knew it was not my Red Door.. does not even compare.. it was not for me but it may be for you, ,it was so different that i returned it & ask to have my Red Door instead an it just arrived today, so i am smiling, IF YOU ARE USED TO RED DOOR ..YOU MAY NOT LIKE IT!

Description: joy—it’s the special ingredient that fills life with color. it makes us sing. it invites us to dance. simply put, joy is embracing life…joy is what sets us free. experience an expressive, floral scent wrapped with inviting and intimate notes that express a passion for life. sparkling tangerine opens with excitement; pink peony blossoms with a dynamic femininity; warm patchouli envelops in a passionate embrace. live joyously eau de parfum is formulated with the richest, most refined blend of fragrance oils to provide a finer, stronger, longer-lasting scent. wear an expression of joy itself and expect to live joyously.
ReviewText:
A small sample bottle of Live Joyously arrived in the mail a few days ago. I was surprised, hopeful, yet dubious. Ever since Coty bought out Philosophy the fragrances have been nothing but sweet...yes, even Fresh Cream. But Live Joyously takes the top prize! I sprayed a bit of it in the air and coughed. Tangerine, pink peony, patchouli, really?

I refrain from writing reviews unless I absolutely LOVE something --- be it a clothing item, skincare product, a book, etc. However this fragrance is so disastrous and NOT the Philosophy philosophy Cristina Carlino envisioned. Just in case TPTB are wondering what I would LOVE: A fine fragrance of Partridge in a Pear Tree, please!
Title: WARNING: Elevator Fragrance!

Description: joy—it’s the special ingredient that fills life with color. it makes us sing. it invites us to dance. simply put, joy is embracing life…joy is what sets us free. experience an expressive, floral scent wrapped with inviting and intimate notes that express a passion for life. sparkling tangerine opens with excitement; pink peony blossoms with a dynamic femininity; warm patchouli envelops in a passionate embrace. live joyously eau de parfum is formulated with the richest, most refined blend of fragrance oils to provide a finer, stronger, longer-lasting scent. wear an expression of joy itself and expect to live joyously.
ReviewText: I don't know how anyone could not love this delightful fragrance! I was in the book store and the woman who waited on me was wearing the body lotion and caught my attention. It was delicious. She told me it was sold in a store in the same shopping center just a few doors down. I jumped in my car and went in and purchased the lotion, later going back for the spray on fragrance. This is my new "go to". I have worn Estee Lauder fragrances most of my adult life, but this has won me over. Philosophy, has a new customer as I familiarize myself more and more with their products. Amen
Title: Loving It!

ReviewText: I'm really sad to see this fragrance in the outlet, guessing it will be discontinued. I agree with another reviewer that if you loved Inner Grace (which both my mother & I did), you'll love this one. It's clean, just like all other Philosophy fragrances, but it's more complex than Amazing or Pure Grace. It's hard to really describe this one but it's very floral-y and there are fruity, musky hints as well. I'm going to grab a few bottles because I adore this scent (as I did/do Baby Grace, which broke my heart when that was discontinued).
Title: Beautiful Scent

Description: joy—it’s the special ingredient that fills life with color. it makes us sing. it invites us to dance. simply put, joy is embracing life…joy is what sets us free. experience an expressive, floral scent wrapped with inviting and intimate notes that express a passion for life. sparkling tangerine opens with excitement; pink peony blossoms with a dynamic femininity; warm patchouli envelops in a passionate embrace. live joyously eau de parfum is formulated with the richest, most refined blend of fragrance oils to provide a finer, stronger, longer-lasting scent. wear an expression of joy itself and expect to live joyously.
ReviewText: Live Joyously is one of the strongest scents Philosophy has. I find the cream is more than enough without adding the spray and it does seem to have a smell for an "older generation". Mine and my daughter's favorites are Summer Grace, Sunshine Grace, Living Grace and Pure Grace, in that order. It's a shame Summer Grace is discontinued...it was perfect! I will not purchase Live Joyously again. So sorry.
Title: Not My Favorite

ReviewText: This fragrance should be called "Mature Life" or "The aging Woman"! I expected a light, fresh, clean, uplifting scent with the "Joyous" name and lovely rose label but instead it was very heavy, old smelling, almost putrid! I normally would pass products along to my sisters, friends or my mother but I tossed this instead. I wouldn't want anyone in my family smelling like this sickening fragrance.
Title: Un-feminine Fragrance

ReviewText: I am in love with live joyously perfume! I was a fan of inner grace and was upset that philosophy no longer has it in their fragrance line, but this is the next best thing! I get so many compliments when I wear it and have been stopped by a stranger to ask me what fragrance I was wearing. PLEASE make this super size! And DON'T STOP making this unique, pretty and long lasting perfume!
Title: I'm in LOVE with live joyously!

ReviewText: This is more strong than inner grace was but smells remarkably similar. It's more of a nighttime fragrance for me and I used to wear inner grace during the day. This is just a tad strong for daytime wear. Pretty close to inner grace but more...powdery maybe? I can't put my finger on it. If you liked inner grace this is not a bad substitute, but it's definitely not inner grace.
Title: Stronger version of inner grace

Description: joy—it’s the special ingredient that fills life with color. it makes us sing. it invites us to dance. simply put, joy is embracing life…joy is what sets us free. experience an expressive, floral scent wrapped with inviting and intimate notes that express a passion for life. sparkling tangerine opens with excitement; pink peony blossoms with a dynamic femininity; warm patchouli envelops in a passionate embrace. live joyously eau de parfum is formulated with the richest, most refined blend of fragrance oils to provide a finer, stronger, longer-lasting scent. wear an expression of joy itself and expect to live joyously.
ReviewText: In searching for a new signature scent, I came across Philosophy's Live Joyously. It literally came to me in my inbox! After reading up a little further I decided to order the duo, firming body emulsion and eau de parfum online. Initially, I wasn't sure what to make of the scent but I gave it time to react with my body chemistry. After the results, I have been wearing this scent generously, confidently, and daily. I have sensitivity to many fragrances resulting in nausea and headaches. Not with this scent! A sign of a quality product. At home and at work this scent was met with rave reviews to my surprise. Plus, I work around children and am conscientious of the scents I expose them to. This scent seems to draw others toward me. It lasts throughout the day and mellows to a softness by day's end. I do not plan to switch from this fragrance anytime soon. I am ready to purchase my second duo. I use it day and night.
Title: Lives Up To It's Name

ReviewText:
This is my 10th philosophy fragrance, I have most all the "graces" and a few others. (I use them all!)
I love this fragrance!
Being eau de parfum it last a very long time.
I love how it evolves through out the day, on me it starts out bright with the citrus note then softens into the floral essence, ending warm and soft. And this is over 8 hours!

SuAnne

ReviewText: I love Live Joyously! Every time I wear the body lotion someone stops and smells me, rave reviews. Have not tried perfume, anxious to order.
Title: I live with Joy

Description: joy—it’s the special ingredient that fills life with color. it makes us sing. it invites us to dance. simply put, joy is embracing life…joy is what sets us free. experience an expressive, floral scent wrapped with inviting and intimate notes that express a passion for life. sparkling tangerine opens with excitement; pink peony blossoms with a dynamic femininity; warm patchouli envelops in a passionate embrace. live joyously eau de parfum is formulated with the richest, most refined blend of fragrance oils to provide a finer, stronger, longer-lasting scent. wear an expression of joy itself and expect to live joyously.
ReviewText: I don't like your shower gels and certainly not that awful Amazing Grace, but Purity and Live Joyously---YES!!
Title: this is it!

Description: joy—it’s the special ingredient that fills life with color. it makes us sing. it invites us to dance. simply put, joy is embracing life…joy is what sets us free. experience an expressive, floral scent wrapped with inviting and intimate notes that express a passion for life. sparkling tangerine opens with excitement; pink peony blossoms with a dynamic femininity; warm patchouli envelops in a passionate embrace. live joyously eau de parfum is formulated with the richest, most refined blend of fragrance oils to provide a finer, stronger, longer-lasting scent. wear an expression of joy itself and expect to live joyously.
ReviewText: Love this fragrance in the firming lotion and perfume. My new go to scent!
Title: Joyous when wearing Joyous!

Description: A modern free spirit with an irresistible attitude. Lola is an intoxicating swirl of rich layers, wrapping the skin in sensuous florals blooming with a signature note of fuchsia peony. Playfully alluring and irresistibly tempting.
ReviewText: I'd say this is an older, more grown up version of Daisy. It starts out rather loud — lots of pink pepper, lots and lots of pear, but it does tone down to a muskier flowery scent. While Daisy was for everyone, Lola might not be so easily adoptable since it's a heavier, sweeter scent.
Title: Daisy's Older Sister

Description: A modern free spirit with an irresistible attitude. Lola is an intoxicating swirl of rich layers, wrapping the skin in sensuous florals blooming with a signature note of fuchsia peony. Playfully alluring and irresistibly tempting.
ReviewText: This is more of a wintery perfume. Lasts a long time, spray it on once and I smell it the next morning in the shower. That's how you know it's good perfume!
Title: Long lasting and fun

Description: Anti-Perspirant Stick offers two-fold effectiveness: 1. Anti-Perspirant Action: effectively regulates without blocking perspiration. 2. Deodorant Action: fights against the development of unpleasant odour causing bacteria.
ReviewText: This deodorant replaced the now discontinued Day Control antiperspirant deodorant. Unfortunately, it is a much inferior product. It goes on wet and sticky. It also stings upon application. And, the fragrance is unpleasant. Most importantly, the supposed 48 hour protection is inaccurate and does not last. This is yet another example of a failed marketing concept replacing a perfectly effective product. The discontinued Biotherm Homme Day Control Antipersperant Deodorant was a superior product in every way - application, feel, fragrance, and protection. Please bring back this product. Many other customers feel the same way.
Title: Disappointing Replacement

Description: Anti-Perspirant Stick offers two-fold effectiveness: 1. Anti-Perspirant Action: effectively regulates without blocking perspiration. 2. Deodorant Action: fights against the development of unpleasant odour causing bacteria.
ReviewText: The smell is excellent! Non oily and it stays long, the only drawback is the light yellow stain it left on white clothes, other than that, a must-have for Biotherm gentlemen.
Title: Excellent smell

Description: Anti-Perspirant Stick offers two-fold effectiveness: 1. Anti-Perspirant Action: effectively regulates without blocking perspiration. 2. Deodorant Action: fights against the development of unpleasant odour causing bacteria.
ReviewText: I bought this few months ago and I am so happy I bought it
Title: Great product

Product Name: Brit Rhythm for Men Deodorant stick
Description:
A refreshing stick deodorant infused with the fragrance of Brit Rhythm for men.
The connection of sound and scent. Sexy and provocative, Brit Rhythm is inspired by the exhilaration and adrenaline of live music and the electric energy of the crowd. The scent if a fougere oriental with top notes of fresh basil verveina, a heart of black leather and patchouli and a base of cedar wood.
ReviewText: I'm waiting until I finish my current Old Spice deodorant stick, but am looking forward to trying this deodorant. It smells quite sophisticated, and packaged in sleek black container.
Title: I have yet to use it...

Product Name: Bvlgari Goldea  Eau de Parfum Spray
Description: Bvlgari Goldea is an Emblematic, Feminine Eau De Parfum - A Tribute To Gold and Femininity with notes of crystal musk, orange blossom, ylang-ylang, amber, papyrus and vetiver.
ReviewText: A sweetish musky scent, it's definitely not geared towards teenagers. The musky smell isn't so strong as to be animalistic and it does start out rather fruity, but the flowery smell inbetween it all makes for a nice combo. The lasting power is very good too since it's a heavier fragrence. Not for me but I'm sure it would be liked by others.
Title: Corny Name but Nice Enough

Description:
Unveil the goddess within you. With Dahlia Divin comes the birth of a modern icon. 
A timeless and quintessentially woody Eau de Parfum, it enchants with lush, sweet top notes that caress the senses with radiant sensuality—like a Haute Couture gown.
ReviewText: It starts sweet and fruity but turns jasmine-ish blended floral with a woody musk once you've worn it for a bit.  It's full-bodied enough to stand up to cool weather too, say september-november. Dahlia Divin is 'prettier' than Dahlia Noir but I still liked the toillette version better than the parfum.
Title: Preffered the Toillette Version

Description: Extraordinary, Astonishing, Marvelous and Remarkable! She’s an enchanting force, whose beauty and charm beguiles. She unleashes her magic, creating a wondrous potion. To stir up a little madness…WORK YOUR MAGIC!
ReviewText:
Since the description of the scent doesn't tell you anything about the smell, I'm telling you right now it smells like cotton candy; candy floss, if you are from the UK.
While it isn't terrible, it won't be for a person who is looking for a complex scent. A young woman who greatly enjoys sugary scents would like this scent, especially if she was going out to the bar, but it's not for everyone.
Price wise it's average for a celebrity endorsed scent.
Title: Not for Me

Description: Extraordinary, Astonishing, Marvelous and Remarkable! She’s an enchanting force, whose beauty and charm beguiles. She unleashes her magic, creating a wondrous potion. To stir up a little madness…WORK YOUR MAGIC!
ReviewText: Love this scent. Had wanted it for a while and was pleased to receive it as a gift. I love sweet-candy type scents and this one fits the bill perfectly - sort of like bubble gum and cotton candy. Only one drawback: it does not last :(  Other than that - it's a fun, flirty scent perfect for any season in my opinion.
Title: Sweetly perfect

Description: Extraordinary, Astonishing, Marvelous and Remarkable! She’s an enchanting force, whose beauty and charm beguiles. She unleashes her magic, creating a wondrous potion. To stir up a little madness…WORK YOUR MAGIC!
ReviewText: This isn't her best of fragrances she's released, I found it not to be very potent and long lasting which for me when I buy perfume i'd like to be able to smell it throughout the day..especially when i first put it on.
Title: Meh

Description: Extraordinary, Astonishing, Marvelous and Remarkable! She’s an enchanting force, whose beauty and charm beguiles. She unleashes her magic, creating a wondrous potion. To stir up a little madness…WORK YOUR MAGIC!
ReviewText: Every time I go into shoppers I smell this perfume and it's incredible! I finally bought it and am in love with it! Definitely a great purchase
Title: Best Smell!

Description: Feel the Mediterranean notes of WOMANITY, and enjoy an overdose of sun and wild strawberries in this new Eau de Toilette – a tribute to the girls around the world!
ReviewText: I find this to be quite a sweet scent. It makes me think of pink, strawberries and cotton candy. I like the bottle design, with the contrast of gunmetal shade and pink or hard and soft.
Title: Sweet scent
